CommentsTitle: Won't power on after 6 months and nordic track did not honor warranty
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 28, 2020
CommentsContent: I've had the nordic track for 6 months and I tried to plug my tablet into the machine and all of a sudden it went dark and it won't power on. Well I've called nordic track a few times and it's been an awful experience. The first person I talked to was quite nasty and I couldn't believe the things she was telling me over the phone. She asked me if I heard about the "maskless protesters" in my state and called them a bunch of "Karens". I honestly didn't even know what to say back to her. But the good news is she did her job and mailed the part to me that I needed and gave me the number to the technician who was supposed to install it. The only problem is I cannot reach the technician. I have been trying to get ahold of the technician for over 2 weeks now with no success. I've literally called him at least 10 times.  So I have called Nordic track back twice to ask them to reach out to the technician for me and they write in their notes that they will reach out but it's becoming pretty clear that I'm going to have to try and figure out how to install the LCD screen myself. The machine comes with 1 year warranty on labor and 2 year warranty on parts so to be clear, the parts warranty was honored but not the labor. It doesn't surprise me that the product failed seeing as how nordic track has weird people working for their company.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 23, 2020
CommentsContent: Putting the treadmill together was difficult due to several screw holes not compatible.  After fully assembling and inspecting the treadmill, we found that there were two large cracks - one on teh back of the display assembly and one at the bottom left rear "foot".  We do not want to try to disassemble and return the beast but we are extremely disappointed to spend this much money to have a broken piece of machinery (and we hope the broken foot doesn't impact safety or stability).  The treadmill works well and we are happy with it's function, but having it cracked is not acceptable.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Perfect Treadmill for Kids and Adults across age groups
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 4, 2021
CommentsContent: I am extremely satisfied and proud of my decision to go ahead with the purchase of this Treadmill. It's been close to 3 months since we bought this and my teenage kids are addicted to it and haven't missed a day running on the Treadmill. They are glued to the challenging programs that i-Fit programs provide and in due course have become good long-distance runners. It's just a perfect Treadmill with a boatload of capabilities that can be tweaked for seniors, young adults, and teenage kids. I just love the engineering behind it and it doesn't make a squeak even when a heavy weight like me runs on it.The assembling took a little effort and once done it was worth it. I would recommend this Treadmill to anyone who is planning to have themselves or their kids have a good workout routine or start on a good habit of incorporating work out in to their daily life and i promise this wont disappoint you as it has done wonders to my family.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 28, 2020
CommentsContent: I had difficulties with assembling treadmill in couple of areas.1. With the ground wire having self drilling screw . The given screw was not a right fit for the hole in treadmill. I had to struggle a lot to identify the correct one.2. With the hydrallic bars ; The bar had a small plastic to hold the lever inside the bar but the lever came out as soon as the plastic holder was taken off which made the alignment fall off and complicated the fixtures.As for as the treadmill is concerned, the product is good and sturdy.  I have had few walk/jog in the last few days and all the time it was perfect. Pretty good product. Overall its good but little bit of difficulty with the assembly.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 27, 2020
CommentsContent: I love my NordicTrack treadmill. I was very sceptical and searched all around the web to find a really good machine that would fit my budget.After searching for quite some time I came across my New NordicTrack treadmill and read nothing but great things about it.First and foremost the money is worth it. Of you go for anything less than $700 to $900 on a treadmill. Most likely you are going to get a cheap device that will work for you but won't last. My NordicTrack T series 6.5 has sensors for you to place your hands and see your heart rate like you do at the gym. The same is pretty neat. It is as if I was at the gym. Not to mention I was concerned about the weight limit capacity and it is able to withstand up to 300 lbs. The width of the belt is wide enough for running. Something you can't do on other treadmills that are around the $300 range. Another thing I love is being able to fold the treadmill by raising the belt mechanism. I also have the option of connecting using a 3.5 mm jack any decive to play music to the integrated speakers the treadmill has. Another thing to love is the two empty sections it has that will allow you to place your bottle of water or thermo. It's just great.I wish it was able to connect the speakers via Bluetooth, but things like that cost more money.  I just needed a machine that would allow me to work out and get into the shape a need to stay healthy. This NordicTrack T 6.5 does exactly that. I have presets for workouts and if you are willing to pay extra for a personal coach the treadmill has the capability to connect to your account and get iFit. There is a membership involved and I read you get great workouts by subscribing. At this point I won't do this but maybe in the future I will. I am happy with my treadmill. If I had to plan on buying a treadmill again I would definitely go with NordicTrack without any regrets.Thank you NordicTrack. I hope you guys keep up the good work with your equipment.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 23, 2021
CommentsContent: I didn't know that you could bypass registering the treadmill for $15.00 a month and even though I was incredibly frustrated,  it took me 4 weeks to put it together all by myself and there was no way I was sending it back. If you don't register it will literally beep at you basically torturing you until you sign up. I have yet to try the bypass or cancelling my membership but I do feel incredibly frustrated with how NordicTrack is marketing this product and forcing people to sign up  for a membership. Also, don't be further scammed and make sure that if you purchase you only pay the $600 because they like to raise the price to over $1,000 in high demand. I had to order twice and they cancelled my first order in order to sell it to someone else for a higher price.Speaking to the actual treadmill, I think that it works very well and the shock absorption makes the running experience a lot smoother than the NordicTrack that I got 15 years ago. I really enjoyed it once I got running on it but due to the bad business practices ad blatant deception, I cannot recommend that you get this product from this site.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 21, 2021
CommentsContent: We have had this treadmill a week now. I have done two iFit classes every night and have been so much more motivated to use my treadmill.  This treadmill lowers and lofts very easy. The treadmill itself is very heavy when it is delivered. The treadmill is made of very durable material and is a great value if you don't care for all the tablet stuff they try selling you on these days. This one does have a spot you can place a tablet if you wish.That being said...on another note don't expect Amazon to follow their own delivery instructions. Our delivery was supposed to be delivered inside and they blocked our garage trapping me inside all day until my husband was home! Amazon basically stated they can't control what their own drivers do.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Guided Runs and Big Display - Skeptic turned around
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 26, 2021
CommentsContent: I got the 8.5S with the 10in display. In my initial research, I was very skeptical about getting a 'smart' treadmill, I thought that all I need was just a mechanically sound machine and the iFit (or any other digital connectivity, online classes) doesn't worth the cost. After using the guided run/workout sessions with iFit I'm left very impressed. And I totally understand now the benefits of really large displays (like a 27in screen on Peloton Thread) - that immersive experience makes all the difference!Few small comments:- Bluetooth speakers work great, with plenty of sound volume.- Built-in fan has good airflow.- It doesn't look like it will be easy to disassemble the rails/control panel from the thread part in case you decide to move your treadmill from one floor to another. There is a cable that runs from the control panel to the motor and once you connect it during assembly, it's in it for good.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: T 8.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 2, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this for my wife to use but I will be using it also.. The bottom line is, I was impressed with this treadmill.It arrived on time and was moved in the house. This is a heavy unit around 200 lbs so if you are going to use it in a upstairs room I would pay the extra charge to have it delivered to a specific room. If the engineering on the treadmill is as good and the engineering  they used for the packaging it is going to be a great machine.The assembly is straight forward and very simple, I started in the afternoon and finished it the next day but it could be done in 2 hrs or less. All the parts are labeled right of left and the hardware is plastic sealed on a card with each item labeled and and what step on the instructions to use them. The instructions call for a crescent wrench but it is better to use a 1/2 inch ratchet wrench. I'm not sure it is a 1/2" or 9/16" but is give you more room to work to tighten the nuts.This came with one year of ifit and you can add 3 other persons to the account. It is a nice add on to use trainers and different location to run of hike. When the free time is up I will be extending the account.We have been using the treadmill for 3 weeks and the only thing that seems to be a negative it the touch screen unit is slow to boot up.I don't see how you could go wrong buying this treadmill.  Good value for the price..
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: T 8.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsTitle: Missing parts...Difficult assembly...Needs program before you can use it...and then, it wobbles...
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 9, 2020
CommentsContent: So far, this treadmill hasn't lived up to expectations. Upon opening the box, I discovered it was missing parts. The packaging is a cardboard sheet, heat sealed, so this is an issue from the manufacturer. Once I finally received the parts from the company, I realized how difficult of an assembly it truly is. Don't try to assemble this by yourself. After I finally got the treadmill assembled, it was a hassle just getting the basic "manual" mode on, because nothing works until you set up the "ifit" program. And finally, after all that, the treadmill is up and running, but it wobbles, because one side of the unit has a rubber block on the bottom and one doesn't...not part of the assembly, from the manufacturer...does it belong there or not? Still waiting on a response from the company. Overall, not a good experience. I could've gotten a lemon, but I will be very hesitant to buy a NordicTrack again.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 7, 2020
CommentsContent: Have had treadmill for over a month so far and can’t complain. It does what a treadmill should do. Speed goes plenty fast for my household and incline goes high enough to get a strong burn going. Of course, they don’t tell you in the manual that you don’t have to sign up for iFit, but it can be bypassed by holding the iFit button for 30 seconds. All stickers and indicators say you have to sign up to active the treadmill, and if it’s something you’d like to try go for it. However, don’t think you have to sign up to use the treadmill. The only negative I’ve had so far is that every know and then it trips by Arc flash breaker. I’ve noticed that it usually does it if a person is standing on the belt when trying to start. If standing to the side until moving it doesn’t seem to happen.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 28, 2019
CommentsContent: This is a great home treadmill.  It took me about an hour to assemble.  Instructions are straight forward. You will need someone to assist when installing the locking bar. Speakers are adequate; you will need an aux cord. You will find that there is a lot of literature indicating the treadmill is locked until the ifit app is activated. Fear not, after you assemble it, just press the ifit button for about 30 seconds.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 31, 2020
CommentsContent: I love this treadmill!  It is very comfortable to walk on because it has shock absorbers.  I paid Amazon to put it together, for $89.00 it was well worth it. I know that it has been adjusted properly and ready to go.  Very great treadmill for the money
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 18, 2020
CommentsContent: Ordered the 8.5 after trying a less expensive treadmill from xterra. This is definitely worth the money if you are looking to make an investment in your health. It’s first of all a great treadmill. The shock absorbers work well and it’s great to be able to fold up if necessary. The 3.5 CHP motor makes for a smooth run. The 12% incline adds a serious challenge. The iFit subscription is quite fun so far, though it remains to be seen if we will resubscribe after the free year. The fact that it can control the speed and incline is honestly really cool. I recommend the 8.5 esp because the slight increase in price over the 6.5 is worth it for the larger motor. Five stars.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: T 8.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsTitle: Delayed Delivery, Hard to assemble if you are not a handy man
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 25, 2020
CommentsContent: First of all, I am totally DISAPPOINTED on my order because AMAZON used XPO delivery service where it took another week for me to get the order. I placed this item as PRIME order and waited for 2 weeks to get delivery which is the expected date. On July 17th, nothing came and I have to call XPO and Amazon to track where my delivery is. Amazon's excuse is that it's not their fault, but in their tracking, they are being updated by XPO and nothing shows that there was a delay nor contacted me by both parties. I had an argument with XPO and same time with Amazon customer support as they can't resolve the issue. XPO promised to deliver a week later and it came, but still late. As an AMAZON PRIME MEMBER, we shouldn't be treated this way as we are a paying member. I should get something back for the trouble AMAZON and you did nothing.Now for the treadmill, after assembly the treadmill is SOLID. I really didn't expect a BIG size of a threadmill (same size as in the gyms) and now I need to find a bigger place for it. It took me 2.5 hours to assemble as the manual is not details and crappy. I did figure out that there is a page at the back for parts with numbers to match the guide but still took me longer than expected. The holes are very tight and you need extra muscle to tighten them. When you install the left and right arm and about to install the sensor bar for the pulse, you'll see that there is a few inches GAP so you need another person to squeeze the other end to screw that bar in place. You will also need another person to install the lift bar (hydraulic) as that person needs to hold it up until you screw everything in.Nordic could have made the assembly better. I wish they had a lower model that is lighter and slimmer. Be careful moving it as it can scratch your wood floor. The weight is about 200+ lbs so if you plan to move it upstairs, Good Luck!! The wheels are too small and no wheels at front. Hard to move it The speakers are garbage and pretty much useless. That's all about it...let's see after 6 months how this thing performs with 5 people using it. I recommend the product but not XPO to deliver this item.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 28, 2020
CommentsContent: My old treadmill go sick in the pandemic.  Probably wasn't covid but it was probably old age.  I saw the NordicTrack T Series Treadmill on Amazon and it seemed to fit my (simple needs).  Package arrived damaged but the treadmill largely survived.  I had some broken plastic pieces (console tray) but after minor rigamarole NordicTrac  sent me replacement parts and the installation went relatively smoothly.  For some reason one of the bolts for the arm was too short but I got another from Home Depot that sufficed.  Instructions were straightforward.  My wife helped when I needed four hands and everything worked when we fired it up.  I have used it for several weeks and have had no problems.  It is a little noisy at low speed but not so much that it is a bother.  Folds up well and is just right for my basement room. (the delivery manipulated it down smoothy and efficiently)  I bought the third party (UTS) maintenance service for three years.  NordicTrac offers their own and I am still debating whether that might be worthwhile. (Does anybody have any input?)  All in all I am satisfied and enjoying (?) the treadmill.  I am no longer an athlete and just want to have a nice workout and I think this will do the trick.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Poorly machined / engineered - do not buy
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 9, 2020
CommentsContent: 3 of 4 screws for the cross bar do not fit making the treadmill un-usable.  See photos.  Even with the cross bar removed, these 3 screws do not fit.  It really would be easy for NordicTrack to figure out standard bolts or screws for the entire machine rather than unique screws and bolts for each section.  Be ready to find alternative screws that fit for the cross bar.Regarding the instructions, it is passable but NordicTrack should hire a person from Lego or even IKEA that knows how to write instructions.Very disappointing.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Pay for delivery and Assembly but not for ifit
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 23, 2021
CommentsContent: This treadmill is professional quality but extremely heavy and difficult to maneuver. Thank heavens I had the prudence of paying extra $20 for delivery to a room of choice. I ended up giving the delivery guys another $30 as a tip...and it was completely worth it. My husbsnd is extremely handy with tools, it still took him a solid 3 hours to assemble it. We did it over multiple days. The manual booklet is 7/8 pages long. I advise watching instructional videos in you tube. Lastly the trick to bypass ifit as advised by several users came handy. Put the emergency stop key in place and keep holding the ifit logo...it will work. It is a really good treadmill hopefully the effort we put in will be worth it.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Great treadmill, helping recovery from Covid
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 23, 2021
CommentsContent: I ordered this treadmill after the one I had for years broke.  It arrived and I had no difficulty assembling it the same day (possibly because of Covid, delivery was to the door or garage, so it took two of us to get it to the den).I used it once before I myself came down with Covid and ended up in the hospital for 11 days.  When I came out I didn’t have strength or lung capacity to walk down the hall.  After a couple of weeks back at home, I start using this treadmill for recovery.  I started out slow, no incline for 20 minutes and increased 1 minute per day until I got to 30 minutes at the same time gradually increasing my max speed and incline.  I have now used it for 47 days in a row.The treadmill comes with a year family membership to iFit.  Both my daughters and I have started using it and love it.  This treadmill has a large screen and doing an iFit walking program lets you follow the trainer and see all the scenery (currently working a Costa Rica walking on program).  The program includes beach walks and mountain hikes.  The treadmill automatically adjusts speed and incline as the program starts climbing hills/mountains (max incline of 12 is higher than I want to go, but I’ve done it on this treadmill as part of the Costa Rica program).I have not fully recovered and because of lung scaring I may never get back to where I was pre-Covid, but this treadmill is helping me get there faster than I expected.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: T 8.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 24, 2020
CommentsContent: Purchased this treadmill a few months ago on Amazon. Arrived within the expected time frame and wasn’t damaged. We decided on a lighter treadmill since we would be placing it in an upstairs bonus room. Glad we did after we got it upstairs. Assembly was easy, only needed an extra hand for a couple steps. Had no issues with the instructions. Treadmill started out working great. After about a week, we had some issues. The incline no longer worked and the unit would just stop running after approximately one-quarter mile.  I reached out to Amazon for assistance and was only told it could be replaced AFTER I disassembled, repackaged, re-palletized, and shipped the old unit back. At least they offered to replace but this was out of the question. So I reached out to the manufacturer. I used the on-line  chat option. Was able to identify the issue and a replacement part was immediately shipped out to me. I replaced (I offered to replace the part, wasn’t asked) the part and the treadmill works great. Typically I would be upset, but after receiving such  prompt service as I did from the manufacturer with the issue. Any purchase you make may have issues, but not every provider will stand behind their product. NT did and they’ve earned my future business.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 7, 2020
CommentsContent: I received the treadmill with 2 broken parts and after a quick phone call to NordicTrack, they quickly sent me the new parts. The parts took 4 days (business days) to arrive and the assembly began. The hardest part for me was getting my daughter to hold the rails correctly so I could put the 4 bolts into them. It was the hardest part due to her not wanting to put her cell phone down and pay attention to what she was doing, lol. It took me about 3 hours to assemble, but that included replacing a broken foot rail and several trips to the basement for more tools. Overall we are very happy with the product and bypassed the Ifit registration by pressing the Ifit button for a few seconds and it turns on, just remember to put the "safety key" on the machine first. We forgot that part and it took a few tries to bypass it, until we had the "ah haa" moment and put the key on the treadmill. It then quickly turned on.  I'm very happy with the treadmill. I was going to buy a much cheaper one, but I am very happy and pleased that I decided to buy a brand that I've heard of and one that offers more features.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 29, 2020
CommentsContent: This was very easy to assemble.  Instructions were straight forward.  It folds very easy and fits well to take up as little space as possible.  It's still a good size for running with lenght and width.  If you're a hardcore runner running at 8mph for 30 minutes or longer might want the next level up. But for any average running pace with sprints and walking intervals it's perfect. Has a nice incline, but might not be as steep as some people want. But when you can't run outside or are short on time this is a great treadmill to cover you. Controls are easy to use and see while running.Down side is it's a little loud like most treadmills and there isn't anything to really see on the small display screen. It'll show calorie counts and laps but isn't that accurate as you can't put in your weight.  But for just a nice work out it works out well
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 17, 2020
CommentsContent: When the gym that I had been going for over 20 years closed due to COVID-19 pandemic I did not know what I was going to do to continue exercising. A month went by and one day my friend said why don’t you buy a Treadmill. I thought about it and by the next day I had ordered a NordicTrack Treadmill.  I received it within a week.  My son assembled it, the same day it was delivered. I did my first workout that day, for two hours, and since then, I use the Treadmill six days a week.  The machine is very sturdy with a high end motor very similar to a treadmill at the gym. This machine though has added features such as a screen to watch the iFit videos, a built in fan, an extra-long wide deck to put weights, bottles of water, towel, cell phone, iPad, etc. It also has a Bluetooth feature to listen to music or plug in a device. It starts right away. The speed picks up very quick. Incline and decline work excellent. The noise level is very low. I alternate workouts between manual and the iFit videos. The machine is very strong and I feel really safe whether I’m running, inclining, jogging, or simply walking. It keeps track of my workouts and this helps to see my progress. Purchasing a NordicTrack Treadmill is one of the best decisions I have made.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 7 InchesStyle Name: T 7.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 9, 2020
CommentsContent: I just received and had my machine installed yesterday. Haven't quite used it but can't wait to. When I tried it, it's everything I was hoping for. Again, I haven't fully used it so nothing has gone wrong. One thing I will point out is that it's noisy. You will hear it from one room to another to another, unless you have a huge home. I am going to say thiat if you have it in the home, and you try to workout in the morning, whomever is sleeping will definately hear it.Other than that, so far so good.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 26, 2020
CommentsContent: I left a four for ease of assembly but to be clear, we had the expert installation done. It won't let me not select a rating.First time treadmill owner and not much of a gym runner before this, so I don't have a ton to compare it to. It's easy to fold up if need be, and seems nice and padded when running. The iFit workouts are a nice distraction from the pain of running although I'm not sure if we'll be renewing when it's time to pay.My annoyances with this product are:- no way to export treadmill audio to headphones. This was confirmed by a NordicTrack live chat. Yes, of course running on a treadmill is noisy in and of itself but it would be great to have the iFit audio in my ears...both so I can hear it better and so I'm making less racket. Short of loading the same workout on your phone and trying to play it at the same time, I don't have another solution. The sound is decent coming out of the treadmill but it's hard to not constantly fiddle with the volume if you're doing intervals. There's bluetooth connectivity, but only for streaming audio from that device through the treadmill. There's an aux jack, but again it's for playing your device's music through the treadmill which again seems really stupid. I'm going to go ahead and say my headphones are better quality than these treadmill speakers.- I don't know how to touch the speed/incline buttons or anything on that horizontal bar without getting shocked, and it sucks lol. Doesn't matter if I deaden myself on something else first.All told, this definitely meets our needs and we're satisfied with the product. The headphone issue is a big disappointment though and given the fact this advertises bluetooth connectivity and an aux jack, I never would have guessed I couldn't use headphones.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: T 8.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 13, 2020
CommentsContent: This is a very nice machine, however, it's huge! It's definitely a size you would expect to see in a gym.  I wanted a mid-range treadmill that would have a good width and good weight limit.  This definitely meets those expectations, but you need to have a big spot for it in your house.  It's too big for a small bedroom or small office.  It won't be inconspicuous in a living area! That being said, it's a good, sturdy machine with lots of features.Also, bonus info.......you do NOT have to sign up for the Fit app program they claim you need in order to activate!! Just hold the FIT button that is right on the front of the machine face for 30 seconds and it will bypass the need to register and join.  Apparently this is a membership, but it's not necessary to run this treadmill.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 12, 2020
CommentsContent: I opened the box and could hear flying insects buzzing, trying to escape the plastic wrapper around the treadmill! I few began to escape and I had to step on them. It freaked my wife out. I closed it back up and contacted Amazon, ordered a new one. The sad/bad thing is that I was told that since it was a Friday, the truck would not be able to pick up the bug infested treadmill until the following Monday. That was a nightmare. The package is extremely heavy and I could not move it alone. A package full of insects had to lay in my garage for days before it could be retrieved. Bad. Finally, the package was picked up, a new treadmill was dropped off, and now it works great. We love it—just wish we had not been subjected to a possible infestation or unknown origin.The Amazon associate who I spoke with to organize the return was very professional and helpful.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 8, 2020
CommentsContent: You will need to put in your patience pants to assemble. It’s not hard, just need to pay attention and take your time! The directions are good and the nuts & bolts package are labeled by steps to make it super easy. I was very happy to figure out how to bypass the ifit sign up/ activate. The treadmill comes with a big red sticker that says you won’t be able to unlock the treadmill w/out registering the Treadmill . BS!! That’s so misleading and not necessary. To get around it all you need to do is put the key in place,hold down the ifit Bluetooth symbol for 10 seconds or so and it gets rid of the locked screen and you are ready to go. It’s really very sneaky of Nordic track! Not everyone had $400 or more when they’ve bought the product. You should be able to choose if you’d like to sign up for ifit workouts or go on your own. I didn’t rate the treadmill too high bc I want to try it for week or so. I did start it up and walked for a bit and it seemed good. Overall I say it was easy to assemble ( I did it alone) & it’s priced great , it looks nice and I like that the bed fold up for easy storage and the wheels at the end make it super easy to move around .
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: You don’t have to activate iFit
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 25, 2020
CommentsContent: Even though the screen says “your treadmill won’t activate until you register at ifit.com”, this is not true. Make sure the red stop key is on, then press the iFit button on the screen and hold down for 10-20 seconds, until the screen unlocks. Just assembled mine. Some screws wouldn’t screw all the way, but I am too tired now, will try again later. First impression: looks very sturdy and well made.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 7, 2020
CommentsContent: I have a small-ish apartment but I wanted a treadmill I could use to make cardio a bit more manageable instead of spending a huge chunk of time at the gym. It's sturdy and a decent size but not obtrusive. My boyfriend put it together in about 30 minutes, I did have to help a bit to hold up the top part. You can get around registering it on iFit. It goes to an incline of 10 and both the incline and speed increase smoothly. My only complaint about this product is the stopping function. There is no cool down button which is totally fine but the other problem is that when you push stop, it just stops. So DO NOT stop when you are going fast and I can imagine if you accidentally pulled off the emergency shutdown button, you'd literally faceplant into the console or fly backwards.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 24, 2020
CommentsContent: We embarked on purchasing a treadmill to keep relatively in shape during this time of covid.  I was honestly skeptical of having such a large/heavy item shipped and assembling it.  It arrived right on time and the Amazon delivery guys placed it exactly where needed.  Be careful, it is heavy, so assemble with care.  It went together easily and I took their advice of plugging it into a surge protector since it is an expensive purchase.  I enjoy how smooth it works, both the belt motor and the incline motor.  The controls are intuitive and you can use this with or without the Nordic Track app.  We use it almost daily and am glad we purchased it.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 3, 2020
CommentsContent: We’d been searching for an affordable treadmill since the pandemic began, but things continued to be pretty much sold out everywhere. So happy we were able to finally land this one! Assembly is VERY tricky. Not gonna lie - it took my fiancé and I about 4 days to get it up and running. It comes in a VERY large, VERY heavy box. But the delivery guys were great. They were on-time and brought the box inside for us. I like to do inclines and was skeptical about what this machine could handle, but let me tell you - I get just as good or better of a workout on this treadmill than I did on the machines at our local gym. Thank you to all the reviewers who posted the cheat code on bypassing the iFit activation. Once we got it assembled, we held the iFit button down for about 30 seconds and everything was good to go! Highly recommend.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 3, 2021
CommentsContent: This review is not about working out with the machine. I bought this product with the professional installer option in late December. The installer came around the second week of January, put it together and the belt came off and broke two days later. I found a bunch of bolts and pieces that the installer just flat out didn't use. I called to get replacement part, that took two weeks to get here. The technician was supposed to call after the part came but did not. I called to get in touch with technician and was just told its going to be three weeks until they can come out. at that point I will have paid for this product two months prior and been able to use it once before it broke.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 9, 2020
CommentsContent: I have gone to the gym for the last six years and was use to the commercial grades there. Covid-19 came around, and I stopped going to the gym for safety concerns. Overall, really like this treadmill and the quality. With the iFit compatibility I didn't feel like I lost anything from leaving the gym. I did 50 miles on it in 10 days, and feel that it will last. I hadn't used the iFit before and like it.I am 5'5, 260 when I got this and feel it is sturdy and will hold up. The speakers are not the best, but I normally run with headphones anyways. I have used my Aftershokz, the adjustment on incline going up is the loudest part. Doesn't cause a problem for me. The emergency cord is a good length, but doesn't stay well on my workout shirts- again not the end of the world. I would recommend taking the emergency stop off when done, otherwise the screen will stay lit up.You do not need to do the iFit, but I like it and will keep it as it reminds me of classes at the gym. I also like the scenic walking hiking paths. To BYPASS iFit just hold the button down for until it turns green, and you are in manual mode.INTERVALS can be done by the whole number and the plus or minus signs. OR by hitting the numbers quickly. IE 4.7 by hitting 4 than 7 quickly.I do not feel that it is noisy, nor does my roommate. Single floor house, tile throughout and he is down the hallway and doesn't hear me running awake or when he is asleep (very light sleeper) if his door is shut. He can hear my TV for reference.You will need two people to help you assemble. Do not tighten too much when putting the console on, wait until its all together than tighten. Either wise you will have trouble with it pulling to one side or the other and folding will be problematic.The feet are able to be adjusted, which is great because floors are rarely even. Do a couple of test miles to see if you have this right.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: New Treadmill did not work, NordicTrack did not honor warranty.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 27, 2020
CommentsContent: NordicTrack T7.5S  treadmill did not work. Icon Fitness charged me $159.00 for work covered by both factory warranty and extended warranty.  I called Icon Fitness for Technical assistance and Ms. Brittney Baker insisted that no on-site technical assistance would be forth coming unless  I provided my credit card number.  The treadmill was delivered on January 15, 2020 and was finally repaired on April 24, 2020.  The extended warranty cost $96.57 and that should have covered necessary replacement of the "pulse bar".
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 7 InchesStyle Name: T 7.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 26, 2020
CommentsContent: Like many reviews, the screw holes were not properly drilled. Cross threading is easy to do with some holes. I do suggest paying a little extra to have the treadmill placed in the location you want it. It’s very heavy. As far as the performance, I have been using it every day since I bought it. I did subscribe to IFit, and I am enjoying it so far. I like the various workouts they have available. I think this was a smart purchase since I don’t feel comfortable going to the gym at this time. I would recommend the product. Hopefully I will have it around for awhile.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Nice treadmill for walking - not much fun to assemble
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 26, 2020
CommentsContent: First of all, the delivery guys were great.  Initially they were going to leave on the porch but I asked them to put in my garage - on the SECOND floor!  Took a bit of persuasion but I would not have been able to move it up there myself so grateful for the assist.  The box was beat up and had visible holes and tears.  However, the packaging on the inside was really amazing.  No damage at all to the treadmill.  I did have several problems assembling - my lack of paying attention to the ground wire when I put the wire harness on caused the first issue.  If you don't keep the ground wire on the outside of the hole, you will find out how sharp the holes are in the metal.  It took me a good 20 minutes to fish out the wire and I also cut my fingers up pretty good.  I did ultimately get the ground wire out and connected.  However, the screw hole wasn't tapped completely so I had a hard time getting it tight enough to actually function as a grounding wire.  I also had a lot of trouble getting the front bar to align properly.  The left side was simple but the right side was difficult.  The tab on the upper side did not fit neatly into the lower part.  I was concerned that it would break if I put too much pressure on it so I went very slowly and worked the piece from the far left across and finally got it to go into place.  The belt was misaligned out of the box but the website has clear instructions on how to adjust.  I have used every day since I purchased and am very happy with the product itself.  I read the reviews about problems with iFit.  Since I am just using it for walking I don't need the subscription.  I  cancelled on line probably on the third day.  No issues and very simple for me to cancel.  I wouldn't let that stop you from purchasing and I thought a few of the programs would have worked well for me 20 years ago.  Just not my thing.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 18, 2020
CommentsContent: This saved my sanity during Covid-19!! The world stopped in March when Gyms were closed and for a mama of 4 young kids, I don't have the time to schedule baby sitters to run and workout outside. I am also one that likes to workout in peace with no kids and I like to be distracted while running. So this treadmill is perfect and checks all my boxes for that. You can choose between hundreds of different kinds of workouts. Beginner level all the way to advanced.  I love the warm up and cool down features. I just got this treadmill at the first of August so I haven't had it long enough to give a thorough review. BUT so far I love it and it gets me excited to run every morning by choosing a different workout each day.PROS:perfect size for a in-home treadmill and folds up nice to save space. We have it in our bedroom and it doesn't bother me too badhas 2 nice sized cup holdersspeakers are loud and you can adjust the sound of the music, trainer and background noise100's of different workouts to choose fromI love that the trainers adjust the incline automatically so you get a better workoutCONSNO FANS!! I read reviews before buying and some were saying it had fans. This model DOES NOT if you want the feature with the fans with a little better motor spend the extra $$ and get the 8.5 S model with the  10" or 14" screen.Motor is a little louder than I thought it would be for the price, but not worth dropping stars overTouch screen is sometimes hard to use. The features just need to be updated a bit for a more modern better experience to find workouts/ fitness level.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: NordicTrack T 6.5 Si Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 5, 2019
CommentsContent: I am addicted. I love the Bluetooth capability. I love that loud speaker it has and the fan that blows air in your face when you’re sweating and the fancy touch screen with workouts. I opted not to do the ifit. The machine works great so far. I have no complaints.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 7 InchesStyle Name: T 7.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 5, 2020
CommentsContent: I'm loving my treadmill. I think it's the best for the price. I walk or light jog here and there at home. Nothing crazy.  It's a perfect size. Not the huge machines from the gym but not the tiny $300 walmart tread I originally ordered that was so small I felt like a giant walking on it. I have had it for about a month now.For me, it was extremely important to get something that would feel sturdy and support my weight, give me good range of speed and incline and not feel like I was heavier than the machine. I weight 230 and am 5'8. It was disheartening to see so many machines max out at 200lbs. I didn't want to break the bank buying a tread, but I couldn't buy anything that wouldn't support me either. I don't think the assembly is easy. My husband did it and thankfully he is quite handy, but for me it wouldve taken me days! The only thing that really bothered me about this tread is that they want to force you to purchase a monthly service and you technically can't turn it on without providing your credit card info to even turn on the machine. I am so grateful to everyone in the comments who posted about how to avoid that.  It's really unthinkable to me that I would have to purchase MORE to use a machine that I have already fully paid for, so shame on the company for that! Definetly don't do that and just follow all the advise on herw on how to go around it. Other than that, I really couldn't be happier. It's sturdy, great range of levels, good motor. I love it! Especially during the pandemic. I've been walking 30 minutes a day and it's been great!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 22, 2020
CommentsContent: I writing this as I'm assembling the machine right now and I'm borderline losing my mind. Some of the screws don't fit and I actually had to find alternate screws to fit. Thank God I actually had some screws lying around the house that actually fit. Particularly steps 3 and 8, the ground screw wouldn't fit and the screws for the crossbar to the handles wouldn't fit.  I'll update my review once I use it once assembled.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: I'm in love with it, highly recommend.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 18, 2020
CommentsContent: You do need to register first on ifit and download the app, but after the first month, you can cancel the membership and use it with any problems. The speed is from1-10, and believe me, I had been to the gym and on their treadmill the speed 6 will be a 4.5 on this one. You can easily lower and increase the speed as you need it, the incline is amazing, this treadmill is very solid (no shaking or sturdy), the settings are very easy to use, the cup holders are wide and large enough, it has space for your phone ( I had put my laptop on top of it and is perfectly fine). My kids used them too and is very easy for them as well. Great product, you won't regret it after you understand you don't need the app after the first month.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 20, 2020
CommentsContent: This treadmill had only 20 minutes on it when the belt moved to one side and would not adjust with the instructions in the product manual.  After almost 2 hours waiting on chat, I find out it is a known issue.  They are sending me 2 screws to replace the failing ones; the problem is the placement of these 2 screws is behind a preassembled unit on the back of the unit.  I have a 3 month warrantee, plus another 3 month warrantee for registering it online, plus I bought a 3 year extended warrantee.  Yet they want ME to do the labor to replace 2 screws that I cannot possibly reach and that could affect the performance of the product.  I had to fight with them to send out a repair tech to do the job.  Only when I threatened to dispute the charge on my credit card did they schedule a tech to do the repair.  Really?!?!  What's wrong with this picture?  Now I'm in a waiting mode, unable to use the treadmill for what could be 3-5 weeks until the parts are received and the repair done.  I have a NordicTrack elliptical and a NordicTrack recumbent bike and have been happy with both which is why I went with NordicTrack treadmill.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2020
CommentsContent: You do need help to attach the safety bar on the bottom of the track but you don't need it for operation. But other than that, you CAN put it together yourself. I'm a not-so-handy single mom and I did it. Took me all morning lol. And be sure to put in the red magnet lock to turn on the treadmill and HOLD that ifit icon for like a minute. Until it turns the machine on. DONT FALL FOR THE "required" ifit subscription. Just hold the button down and it works! Heavy as all get out btw. Put them little slider disks under it so you can drag it around the house and it will be fine though, even for a heavy, out of shape girl =)
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 8, 2019
CommentsContent: This dumb company makes you give them your credit card number and sign up for a free trial before telling you how to unlock the treadmill. Hold the blue button for 30 seconds. There, now you can use your treadmill.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 31, 2020
CommentsContent: The treadmill is very heavy so try to get it delivered as close to where you want it as possible.  After you destroy the box to open it you will find the instructions that state you need to save the packaging material in case there is a problem. The instructions are very well put together and the hardware is clearly marked.The actual assembly is fairly easy except for the fact that the bolts that hold the uprights to the bottom frame are cheaply made.  They are not tapered for easy thread engagement.  On top of the problem with the bolts, some of the built in retaining nuts have coating on the threads making screwing in the bolts an unnecessary challenge. After struggling with the first four bolts, I found a spare bolt I had on hand and ran it into the threads clearing the coating before installing the other four.  This may sound trivial, but the bolts are not high quality and I seriously thought I was going to break one off in the frame.Thankfully there are reviews the state how to bypass the built in lock by pressing the iFit button for 30 seconds.We were up and running after about an hour of assembly.  So far the treadmill works as it should.  I will update if there are any changes.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2021
CommentsContent: 3 stars because what they didn't tell you is that you are getting either a returned item, used item, or refurbished item. That's why they can sell it at such a mark down from retail. Just look at the pictures i took when i got the machine out of the box. There were a few more scuff marks then just that. Machine worked though and everything running okay til this day. Kind of false advertisement that this is brand new. I waited a few months to put out this review for that reason. To make sure it was still functioning and it is.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2021
CommentsContent: I have had this for about 3 months now, which is long enough to know, that I really love it! It pretty much checks all the boxes; it works flawlessly, is built tough, and is good looking too. The only thing I would recommend is to pay a few extra bucks and get the in-home assembly. It is a bit of a long and complicated assembly, so spare yourself the hassle. Two of the holes in one of my brackets were not large enough to fit the screws through, so I had to go to Lowe's and get a metal drill bit in order to make the holes slightly bigger. Not an ideal scenario, but it all worked out. Again, PAY TO GET THE IN-HOME ASSEMBLY. Otherwise, this is a really nice unit.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 7 InchesStyle Name: T 7.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 11, 2020
CommentsContent: This thing has changed my Covid life. I use it 1-2 hours a day. I am a female, I live in a climate that’s freezing cold for many months out of the year and while I love to walk alone, I won’t do it after dark. I walk fast - occasionally I run in bursts for a minute or 2 and I use the incline a lot. This treadmill is solid and quiet. My boyfriend is 200+ pounds and also walks on it and feels supported. Get the delivery option to have it left where you want it. The box is big and heavy and it doesn’t have wheels to move it around from room to room. The lift feature for space saving works really well but don’t get this if you need to move it around.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 19, 2019
CommentsContent: I waited to write a review until I had some time to get used to my new NordicTrack.  I had a treadmill previously but after two weeks of walking a dog in the hills of Oakland, CA I decided I wanted a treadmill with an incline and greater speed. This has both. I am 72 years old and the treadmill gives me a great workout and the incline is great for losing weight and building nice glutes!  It came with a free month of iFit, which you are required to sign up for to get the thing to work.  I didn't like that but I did enjoy the free month.  I was able to map the walk I had taken in Oakland and walk it again.  I could see the path and the treadmill would automatically incline where it should on the walk.  I didn't continue the iFit due to the price but I do love the treadmill.  I have it in front of my TV, put on a series and go for an hour with entertainment.  This was a great investment for me!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Decent treadmill at a great price, no subscription required
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 21, 2020
CommentsContent: Disclaimer: I have never worked out at home or at gym for any meaningful period. I can't remember in my whole life if I had an occasion of outside jogging.Bought this while it's on sale at $599. Great price! Couldn't be more happier. Mine has a small display with the monotone blue background color that I don't think has the capability to cast movies, but I don't care. The front panel has a small stand area where I can put a laptop.Before purchasing, I did my research and figured out that you can activate (or I should say unlock) and use the treadmill without buying the ifit subscription. As others said, I just pressed the blue ifit button for ~10 seconds (some people say 30 seconds), and it unlocked itself.Installation: I had a little issue with running a wire during assembling (made a mistake to run a wire below a metal bar whereas I should have run the wire over the bar), so I had to disassemble almost everything after I completed assembling! I'm pretty infirm, so having to disassemble all the way back felt like a total disaster. The manual could have been improved to stress how the wire should run. But once I've done installation, that's it! I am very satisfied with the product.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 28, 2020
CommentsContent: I have been shopping for exercise equipment since COVID so I can do some cardio from home. I was super excited to find an affordable NordicTrack treadmill on Amazon. I opted for the delivery option to have the driver bring the treadmill inside the doorway. They never knocked and just left it outside. This is the only complaint I had about the Amazon service. One bolt was not able to thread during assembly of the arms that support the console but we continued without it. The iFit registration was a bit confusing but after looking up videos on YouTube I was able to figure it out. Total assembly time was about 2 hours with two people. It is very heavy so definitely bring a strong friend to help move/assemble.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2021
CommentsContent: Good treadmill. I really like the ifit training. Assembly was difficult and i am a person that likes to assemble things. Some of the predefined holes didn’t line up perfectly so the plastic has uneven gaps from one side to the other and some of the plastic doesn’t lay flat or fitted as i would think it would. Sometimes there is weird noises when it is adjusting incline. Incline numbers go to like 10 or 12 can’t remember from my couch, but the incline doesn’t seem that high. Overall i really like it and use it daily, I am glad i bought it. It came with one year free trial of ifit for on the treadmill and i even downloaded it on my phone to do ifit workouts while traveling for work.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 7 InchesStyle Name: T 7.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsTitle: It's DECENT but expected better for the price.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 23, 2020
CommentsContent: It started off bad due to the poor delivery.... The delivery company wedges the giant heavy box on a little side porch I have and it was extremely hard to remove and take to my actual door. The box was ripped in many places and practically falling to pieces...Then began the process of putting it together. I'm a handy person and this still took me about 3hrs to do. I had many problems due to poor instructions and design, but eventually got through it.Luckily I read prior reviews before use and knew to hold in the ifit button for 30seconds to bypass that crap and just use the treadmill like normal.I then noticed the belt was severely off track to the left. After some quick youtube videos I was able to adjust the bolts to fix this and align it to center... You think they would have had alignment and tightness set on a new treadmill but I guess not?I also notice that the belt slows when you step on it to begin walking. I have tried adjusting tightness and the problem still persists.After going through the initial hell of the shipping and getting everything set up, the treadmill seems decent and seems to work fine besides the belt slowing issue mentioned above. If I can solve that issue it will actually be a overall nice unit. I expected alittle more quality out of the box given the price, but oh well.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Poor quality, broke within 2 months and nordic track wont fix it with the coverage plan!

CommentsContent: This was good while it lasted, which wasn't long at all.  Two months of 1 user, 30 minutes of walking 5x a week, the belt bent over and is now useless.We purchased the warranty/extended coverage and they told us they would fix the belt. We've waited 3 months, no help. We've called the company and they told us they'd ship the belt and we can replace it ourselves.After a $700 machine plus $200 on the warranty, we were compleltey ripped off. So its just a huge, heavy, item that I need to dispose of.Do your research and get something that is more reliable and not built so cheaply and save your money - don't get the warranty.

I’m frustrated why amazon would allow this vimos y yo do business with them , I bought extended warranty and nothing happens because there is no part there is no help, nothing! CommentsTitle: GOT TREADMILL YESTERDAY, MOTOR DOES NOT WORK
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 18, 2018
CommentsContent: We received our treadmill yesterday and built it from top to bottom. To our disappointment, when we turned on the treadmill, the belt would not move no matter what speed we put it on. The next day, we had a friend who is a technician look at the treadmill and he told us that the motor is defective. Even though the incline on the device works and the screen turns on, the belt still does not seem to move. We spent 4+ hours setting this treadmill up from top to bottom. We are certain we did not skip any steps or install it incorrectly as we used the instruction manual religiously throughout the entire process. It is downright egregious that we would drop over 600 dollars to receive a product that is defective. We are disappointed in Nordic and would not recommend this product to any customers. There are many other customers including myself who are experiencing several failures with this product. Listen to us and STAY AWAY. You should rather buy your treadmills from Sole or Proform as they have better products and WAY better customer service.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 23, 2021
CommentsContent: OKAY FIRST OF ALL I READ THE REVIEW ABOUT HOLDING THE iFit button down for 30 seconds so i was prepared to do that and thank you for your advice but surprisingly mine came with the screen already operational nevertheless thank you.I love this treadmill it is perfect for me the capacity is 300 and it's one of the reasons I got it because I weigh 280 it doesn't squeak or make weird noises. IT'S SUPER HEAVY  i would recommend when ordering you ask they bring it indoors for you that was a huge mistake i made because it was soooo heavy and they put it by my neighbors apartment not mine so you can imagine my struggle.During the time putting it together there was only a few issues 1 was the bar the is holding the screen panel part was not lining up this alone took my husband and I almost 20 minutes because it would not line up nor would it screw in (we even broke a screwdriver that's how hard it was) I would have got an assembler to come out but he didn't want me to. Anyways I used it for 30 mins this morning and it worked flawlessly. I WILL UPDATE if any problems I haven't noticed yet show up
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 24, 2020
CommentsContent: This treadmill is everything I wanted for the price.  The layout of the controls is really nice with large, responsive buttons.  The digital readout is clear and gives all of the information I was looking for.  The build quality seems really quite nice and solid.  It’s generally pretty quiet for a treadmill, similar in noise level to what you’d use as a gym.  My wife and I got it 3 months ago and we’ve put a lot of miles on it so far.  It’s been great for us as we don’t like running outside in the winter rain/snow.  You could spend $200+ more and get basically the same treadmill with a large, tablet like touchscreen display but we didn’t need this.  I’d suggest saving the money and getting this model instead.  We didn’t see much value with the iFit app so we didn’t keep it beyond the free trial period.  Overall a great treadmill for the price and I highly recommend it.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 3, 2020
CommentsContent: I’ve been using this machine for a while now, and so far - no complaints. It does what it’s supposed to do, and while it is relatively new, it seems to function as a reliable piece of equipment. I’ve not owned any other treadmill before this one, but I’ve used a few in the gym. The comfort level on this one is pretty similar to the gym ones. It has enough room for a tall person no to feel confined. The only comment that I’d have for the manufacturer is that the heart rate monitor is located not on the side bars that you’d use to put your hands on, but on the bar that’s right under the control panel, and, at least, for a tall person they aren’t located conveniently, but rather too low. I don’t really use it for this reason, although I would if they were located on side bars. Other than that - it seems like a very solid piece of exercising equipment, and I do enjoy using it so far!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 29, 2020
CommentsContent: Serves it's purpose. Easy enough to set up and adjust as needed (follow ALL the directions, they are there for a reason). Despite it being delivered with the box beat up in parts, the contents were luckily protected well enough. If you're expected a gym quality beast with all the bells and whistles, this isn't it, but for a simple at home option that allows you to get a run/walk in, it's great. To repeat what others seem to still be missing - if you hold the iFit button down, it allows you to bypass the subscription option.  I'm 5'4" and my hubby is 6'4" and neither of us have a problem using it, inclined or not, so please take those not picky "complaints" with a grain of salt. Jury is out on the accuracy of the speed/distance, it's constantly at odds with my Garmin watch, but no biggie for me because I'm not super serious about that. The fold feature works, but personally I don't trust it and it doesn't fold up enough to make any space saving difference, so I leave it down. There are no clear instructions on lubricating the track though (unless I missed it), other than pushing their extended warranty, so that was kind of irritating.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: No Safety Latch, goes up 2/3 way without locking in place, hold blue button 30 seconds to unlock
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 20, 2020
CommentsContent: I purchased this to replace a 21 year old ProForm Treadmill I paid 1K for (that had a safety latch, and went all the way up, not just 2/3rds of the way up), that finally bit the dust about two weeks ago.  I ordered this treadmill the morning the old one died. It arrived on Friday and we put it together Saturday.  It took a few hours because getting some of the screws in the holes, was difficult.  It also doesn't have the wheels like the ProForm did so it made it a little hard to move once we got it together.  Unless you want to purchase the Nordic Track training, just hold down the blue button for 30 seconds and it will unlock regardless of what the manual says.  I've used it twice now.  And while I wish I had spent a little more and got the one with the fan, like the ones at the gym have, it does get the job done.  I have a gym membership so I have cardio training on the ap while the gym Is closed and it worked well, smooth incline and decline.  You can adjust the speed or just push the numbers and it will take you to that speed, and then you can go the .1-.9 in that speed zone.  I haven't tried to synch it with my iPhone yet so not sure what the stereo sounds like, but for now that's not something I'm going crazy about getting done.  Would I buy it again, probably not and I've only used it Sunday, and this morning.  I don't like the fact that it doesn't go all the way up, and more importantly there is no safety latch.  I have a disabled daughter who I am afraid would kick the mechanism by mistake and it would come down on her.  She's like a toddler, and I could also see a toddler going over to the pump, kicking where the foot is, and while it does come down slowly maybe wouldn't move in time and get seriously hurt.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Machine won't start unless you sign up for a free trial of iFit.com
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 6, 2020
CommentsContent: Machine won't start unless you sign up for a free trial of iFit.com. Since I love dealing with a communist company, I did sign up to activate the machine. The is the reason for one star. I have yet to use the machine. You cannot exercise at home without giving your email address and name and weight and age to iFit.com. I am loving it but I might return this machine because of these strings.I downloaded the app but I can't figure out how to use the treadmill from the console without going through the app. I have to do some reading. So far, I have to use the app in order for the treadmill to function which means I have to consent to share my location.I am sure I can cancel the trial after a month and use the machine without paying a monthly fee for iFit.com. I am keeping my fingers crossed until I read or call.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 24, 2020
CommentsContent: This expensive piece of crap came with wrong screws for the front pillars. Just impossible to assemble. Had to call the atrocious customer care (which wasted a lot of my time to be able to talk to), and got the correct screws in about 10 days. For 10 days the junk was just taking space doing nothing. 10 freaking days!!!!Then finally when the screws arrived and I finished the assembly, and gave it a try, at the very first attempt of trying the incline/decline feature; inclining was OK (albeit painfully slow and noisy); but declining resulted in a loud clang when going down. I looked under the belt to see if something broke, no, everything looked ok. Turned off and on and tried again, same result.Tried to reach customer care again but due to long hold times every single time, I just gave up and returned this nightmare. Thanks to Amazon for making the return smooth.THEN - about a month after this return, I get an email from NordicTrack (who apparently have no idea that I have returned their piece of crap), that I will get a free treadmill mat if I leave a positive review.Here NordicTrack, here is your positive review which is what all you care about. Now I know why this product is so highly reviewed. This company bribes the customers.I now use Horizon Fitness T101 treadmill and it took 15 mins to assemble and is AMAZING. Please return/sell your NordicTrack PoS devices and switch to Horizon Fitness. You will thank me.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Very disappointing with manufacturer...machine seems to be great but I wasn't able to assemble it!!!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 19, 2020
CommentsContent: I received my treadmill delivered yesterday, Very heavy box, for lifting it requires at least 3 people. Unfortunately due to Covi19 they are not offering home install service. User manual is very confusing, my husband usually is very good for assembling and building any type of thing but this equipment is a pain, specially setting up the side bar with the proper screws. After a few hours for figuring things out, we found out that the pulse crossbar and the console is not wider enough to be attached to both side of the machine!!! (it needs at least 3 more inches) I checked the norditrack website and we had the right console which is a little smaller for the model 7.5s but it was manufactured wrong.  Amazon customer service for heavy items was very helpful and they're picking up the machine in a few days.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 7 InchesStyle Name: T 7.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsTitle: Product quality leaves a lot to be desired
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 24, 2021
CommentsContent: First off, let me say that maybe the best thing about my experience with the Nordictrack T 7.5 S treadmill was the Amazon delivery.  Although I requested "any room delivery" I received a text from the shipping company saying they would deliver it to my front door.  But, to my relief, the two young delivery men carried it to the second floor of my home.  They were also extremely careful to not mar the walls.  Exceptional!My wife and I proceeded to assemble the treadmill.  This would have only been a moderately difficult task, except that one of the wheels that is supposed to bolt to the front of the frame for maneuverability, wouldn't go into place.  This is because there was a protruding excess weld globule that extended about 3/8-inch from the frame.  I called NordicTrack and they said they would process a replacement, which is ridiculous.  If I had purchased assembly, no doubt they would have attempted to fix it on the spot.  Nevertheless, I did not dissuade them for initiating this.  It's been 7 weeks and I have as yet to be contacted by Nordictrack, although they acknowledge that they need to correct the issue.  In the meantime, I purchased a die grinder attachment for a drill and after a significant amount of grinding the very hard weld material, I was able to get the wheel to fit into place.  This added a trip to the hardware plus an extra hour or so to the assembly process.Once the wheel could be attached, the entire assembly was pretty straightforward and took my wife and I about 4 hours.  The fit of the plastic pieces is mediocre in several places.  I've included a photo of the worst offender where the control panel attaches to the base.I was under the impression that it would be possible to connect an iPad via Bluetooth to the treadmill for viewing the iFit videos on a larger screen.  Unfortunately, that is not the case.  A significant disappointment.  Nevertheless, although the screen is small it is sufficient for viewing the videos.  And I must say, I was not intending to subscribe to iFit after the 1 year subscription ran out, but the quality of the content is exceptional, including hiking around several different countries with entertaining and informative trainers.  The treadmill speed and incline adjust along with the trainer and the terrain being traversed.  Those can be overridden if more or less effort is desired and then return to the iFit intended speed and incline when desired.The 3.0 CHP motor is barely sufficient when attempting a cool-down walk at less than 1.5 mi/h.  I weigh 175 lb and the treadmill slows significantly with each step.  It also seems to labor when changing the incline.  Although it isn't too loud to hear the iFit videos through the speakers, the treadmill isn't as quiet as I expected, especially when the incline is changing, which is fairly frequent when hiking through hills and mountains.  But, it's tolerable.When shopping for a treadmill nowadays, you will see the lifetime warranties of yore are rare.  I have a suspicion that due to iFit commanding frequent incline and speed changes, the life of the motors isn't what they would otherwise be.So, in all, I am generally happy with the purchase and function of the treadmill.  It makes exercising on a daily basis easy and enjoyable.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 7 InchesStyle Name: T 7.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 18, 2020
CommentsContent: Item arrived on time, no problems with the delivery.  So far, it exceeds expectations.  The assembly definitely requires two people, it is very heavy, approx. 200lbs.  We were able to assemble the treadmill in about 3 hours, using the instructions and Youtube videos to clarify a few of the drawings in the instructions, overall no problems, 20 step assembly process.  The treadmill itself is fantastic, better in my opinion, than the ones at LA Fitness.  I like the bluetooth, and the display, touchscreen is amazing, with the ability to participate in various courses via internet  (subscription req.), or manual mode.  Would definitely recommend this treadmill, will have to update my review once I have used it a little more.Update:  Purchased in May,  now Sept., product is still excellent,  highly recommended!!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 14 InchesStyle Name: T 9.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsTitle: Comfortable way to exercise at home
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 7, 2020
CommentsContent: I enjoy the ease of use of the treadmill, it is quiet and works extremely well. With the current health risks, this is a great option for exercise at home to maintain fitness at any time. No exposure to sick people, weather not an issue and I can get a good work out. The assembly is a little annoying at times but not particularly difficult. i am happy with my purchase and can easily recommend the product.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership
