CommentsContent: I was supposed to get a 1 year membership with my purchase - the card/code must be invalid as the iFIT app was not functioning until I provided my CC information and paid $432 for a one year membership, that is not free! I think it's false advertising... so I chatted with Amazon rep and was informed my question was being pass along to NordicTrack, it's been 5 days and not a word from anyone - very sad customer service.On another note, the Amazon assembly was difficult to schedule (had to reschedule 3 times) although the final assembly looks fine.So, beware - the NordicTrack seems ok, the membership is a cheat, and the assembly is frustrating.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: T 8.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsTitle: Belt is not moving out of box
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 20, 2021
CommentsContent: Amazon made a good delivery of 200+ pounds treadmill. Assemble was ok. I did it by myself most of it in 2 hours. At the end I found out that the belt wasn't moving, which turned out it was the motor controller board. I contacted Amazon for return, but Amazon said they will take some time to investigate. I contacted NordicTrack for support. It wasn't easy, but I made it through. Their customer service was good, they agreed to send the part to me. I'm still sitting here and waiting for the part. Amazon still hasn't gotten back to me. Overall, it was bad experience with the product, also with Amazon. I wouldn't recommend this treadmill to anyone.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 1, 2021
CommentsContent: First treadmill that was delivered was either damaged in shipping or it was a return that they tried pawning off on me. The bottom cover for the motor was cracked and the clips that hold the top of the cover on were all snapped.. Second one was perfect. If you receive a damaged one do not put up with that, you're paying over a grand for it, it should be in brand new condition.Assembly was easy enough but I can see the directions being confusing to some. In the pack of paperwork with the directions and bolts you'll find a gift card for your free one year of ifit. Even though you get a free one year of ifit youll need a credit card to set up your account, that is if you wish to use it. You can bypass ifit all together if you want it but if you're getting a free year might as well use it. You can always remove card info after setup.Anyways after using it a couple of time I'm very satisfied with my purchase. Ifit seems cool but I don't know if the yearly renewal will be worth it, it's a little pricey. I have a year to figure it out though.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: NordicTrack T 6.5 Si Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 19, 2020
CommentsContent: The treadmill itself is pretty nice: wide / long belt gives plenty of room to move quickly, the assembly was pretty straight forward and can mostly be done by one person (need a bit of help to hold things in place while screwing), and the larger screen on the 9.5 model I think was worth the additional expense (though I wish you could turn off the screen without having to power down the whole machine).The real standout is the combination of iFit with the interactive motor. Classes are pretty engaging, taking you to international destinations –  and it helps a lot that you don't have to adjust the motor along the way because it automatically follows along with the class you're taking. I'm not really a class person but this system changed my mind (for half of my workouts, at least). My one gripe is that the Android based system is REALLY slow so you have to be patient with the machine when getting set up.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 14 InchesStyle Name: T 9.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 16, 2021
CommentsContent: Regarding the "easy to fold" evaluation: I am an 80-year-old female recovering from severe anemia.  If I were a decade younger and at full strength age-wise, "easy to fold" might be rated 5. My son-in-law assembled the treadmill readily, except for the need to adjust out a few squeaks--which he was able to do. Other than its being noisier than anticipated, I have only positive things to say. I appreciate the range of selections for speed and incline, and I think I will like iFit, which I am now learning to use. It seems straightforward; I just had to acquire  a device (iPad) to use it. The screen of my iPhone was too small to be helpful.My strength and endurance goals that center around walking were set in collaboration with my PT.  I now live where there are long, cold winters, so having the treadmill means that walking is no longer weather-dependent.  I can think of many incentives for meeting these goals, primarily the desire for better overall health, in and of itself. At the same time, who wants to miss a good trip whenever COVID allows for it? Have stamina, will travel (Lord willing)!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 14, 2020
CommentsContent: The treadmill came damaged and inoperable (doesn't operate, not like a surgeon, it just doesn't work) and when they came to return the product, I was told they could not take it back because it was partially assembled, which I paid for through the professional assembly option and now I have a treadmill that doesn't work that they won't take back and I seemingly can't get my money back. I guess it's going to be cat food for supper for a little while (not really)Update: I contacted Amazon about the problem and they stated that I had to disassemble the product and put it in the box it came in so it can be returned. The problem is it took two people to take it out of the box and it was professionally assembled. I don’t have neither the tools nor the ability to take it apart and place it in the box. I’m going to have to pay to disassemble it and the place it in the box. I just spent over $200 on nothing If I go that route, a product that was delivered damaged. I do have a Louisville slugger, that should disassemble it.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 14 InchesStyle Name: T 9.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsContent: Problem is with manufacturing. Delivery and assembly personnel were great.  Once treadmill was assembled, there was a cut and dent on the motor hood. Contacted Icon and arrangements were made to ship me a new hood and board part for the incline feature. I am waiting for a technician to replace the parts. I was planning to purchase a stationary bike in the near future but will be looking at other brands.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 30, 2020
CommentsContent: For this price, I'm not sure you could get something much better. Has a good range of speed up to 10mph which is plenty for my purposes. Also, you DO NOT need to subscribe to iFit to use this. Once plugged in and turned on, simply press and hold the iFit button until the screen comes on and it's ready for use. Maybe ~20-30 seconds. Feels very sturdy and the cup holders are large enough to put a 32oz water bottle. Overall a great purchase, especially with payment installment options.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Good, but cheaply made and broken out of the box
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 7, 2020
CommentsContent: I would have given this a 4 or 5 star review, however it's cheaply with lots of plastic parts and I'm super annoyed with the fact that the cover above the motor was broken out of the box. (see picture) The machine works fine and does the job well so far, however it's not pleasant seeing your brand new product having broken parts right out of the box. A treadmill is a big and heavy machine and so unless it stops working I do not want to go through the trouble of returning it over a broken cover which makes me more annoyed that now I have to see it all cricked to the side and know that if I want this fixed it'll be a pain in my @$$ to pack it again, return it, wait for a new one, unpack, and reassemble again, PLUS it's super heavy...Anyway, off to the actual review.Pros:Belt size - I'm 5' 10'' and the size of the belt is perfect for my stride.Foldable - It's pretty easy and simple to fold and unfold. Also has a very nice feature that it unfolds slowly and you don't have to use strength to pull it down and fear of slamming into the floor.Preset workouts - if you want to use the preset workouts provided or create your own it's as simple as click of a button.Cup Holders and heart-pulse monitor features included.Cons:Speakers - Weak speakers and if you are running on anything over a speed of 4 you are better off using headphones or different speakers vs the built in ones.Ifit Activation - Seems like there's a lot of treadmill companies who have a contract with ifit or similar companies in order to force you to sign up for their BS plans. The treadmill cannot be used unless you go into Ifit.com and actually create an account and activate the machine and they try to make you sign up and pay for monthly plans in order to keep track of your workouts... First of all I don't want to give me information anywhere, second I already have a Fitbit and ways to track myself no need to force me to go on iFit.Overall plastic feel - there's lots of plastic parts and feels cheaply made, however you get what you pay for.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2021
CommentsContent: Put Treadmill together and found that in order to start it, we were required to set up with iFit and were to give credit card info for monthly payments of $15--LIKE WHAT?? I purchased the darn thing-shouldn't have to pay monthly for it to RUN!! Thank God we looked at the reviews here and the help from another disgruntled buyer-found that all you need to to is hold down on the iFit LOGO for 30 seconds--and it worked!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Really consider paying for that installation...
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 15, 2019
CommentsContent: This is a GREAT treadmill! I am really enjoying it. I have recommended this treadmill to many friends and family. With my recommendation I suggest paying for the installation. The packaging is extremely heavy. As other's said, the box was beat up upon arrival and it was not the shipper's fault. I thoroughly inspected each piece and found everything to be in good and safe condition. I am generally able to assemble big items together on my own and move heavy furniture on my own. Getting this down into my basement and assembling it on my own really made me question my life choices. I should have had another adult around for safety reasons. If you have to guide it up or down stairs, or cannot lift items 50lbs or heavier on your own you should really pay someone to help you put this together - even if it is friend, pay them some how because this thing is a job. Very worth the hassle because it works great!

CommentsContent: When researching portable treadmills, I decided to spend more and get one with a wider 20" tread belt than the less expensive 15" belt of the other popular model.  I also splurged and paid for the installation. Boy am I glad! This is a big, solid piece of equipment, not much smaller than what's in my condo  gym! Even though it folds easily, it's not really portable and isn't going to fit in a close. But it's fantastic!  As far was  the negative reviews about the ifit "scam" in which the machine won't start without an ifit subscription...yes,  the machine comes with red warning signs saying "Your treadmill is currently locked. It will not start until you go to ifit.com/actvate." But the wonderful Amazon servicemen who delivered it just showed me to hold down the sync button for 10 seconds and it was good to go! PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 23, 2020
CommentsContent: I had bought a different treadmill and it wasn't quite what I wanted so I saw this NordicTrack one and at the time was at a great price. It does everything I want and I love it. Easy to use setting with the speed settings and automatic incline. I have not hooked up to the fitness programs yet but I wanted a treadmill since I am not entirely comfortable going to the gym. Instillation does take a bit more time with this one but works great. It is heavy and big so you will need some help with this. There was a damaged piece with delivery but I submitted to them and they replaced it quickly. Great service!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 29, 2020
CommentsContent: Most certainly works. Love the motor...generally smooth and quiet to run on. Settings let you incline to 12 degrees and speed to 12 mph. No decrease in angle which would have been nice.Mostly concerned with the software platform. Looks like it's based on Android 7 which is hopelessly out of date and rife with security concerns. Wifi only...no ethernet.Also the treadmill's instructions clearly state NOT to incline the treadmill when folded...twice now when I left the treadmill on it went through a full up down cycle and made some awful noises in the folded position. The bluetooth speakers also like to go a ghostly beep when a connected device is out of range or some other complaint...which essentially means you need to flip this treadmill completely off when you're not using it...and therefore the power button should not be on the bottom front of the treadmill.Assembly was not difficult but the parts did not fit well together. A couple of the plastic pieces came with broken tabs. The packaging was secure and nothing arrived damaged in shipping...took a huge dump run to get rid of the massive pallet and cardboard...every piece was individually wrapped in thin film plastic.When you run on the treadmill just about everything in the trays bounces and rattles around...so I suppose they're good for a soft towel or two...but that's about that.I'm torn on iFit. Compared with the competition it's a cheap alternative. The instructors and enthusiastic, the programs are well filmed and edited and it's great that the treadmill automatically adjusts to their program. The issue I have is the I am in no way in good shape and the programs are all ridiculously easy. Which means I have to manually turn everything up...slightly annoying. I wish there was a plus 10, 20, 30 percent or some other setting to turn up all the programs globally. iFit shows my weekly stats...but they're my weekly stats from my first week and it's locked up and stuck on those stats. I probably need to factory reset it. It also continues to prompt to update even through you select it and it doesn't do anything.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 7 InchesStyle Name: T 7.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 17, 2020
CommentsContent: I am a seasoned runner currently training for a half marathon and can honestly say this is a good treadmill. We’ve owned it for over a month and have had overwhelmingly positive experiences. There are several workout options besides just manual mode (hills, intervals, speed etc.). It is true that you can bypass the iFit membership by pressing down and holding the iFit button. We had to press it REALLY hard because initially it wasn’t working.There are built in speakers on the 6.5 model that only work with an aux cable. No integrated bluetooth or apps besides iFit. It folds up very easily and doesn’t require tons of space. The power cord isn’t very long. I recommend purchasing a lengthy surge protector to remedy this issue and protect your investment.It took 2 of us a few hours to put together. If installation service is available, I highly advise saving yourself the frustration.For the first couple of weeks we heard a loud clunking noise coming from the motor area; however, that issue resolved itself with daily use.The 6.5 model is an excellent value and well suited for all types of runners. I thought I would regret not purchasing the more expensive model, but that’s not the case at all! I run on it comfortably for 5+ miles at a time.The mileage counter on the treadmill never coincides with my Apple Watch. There is about a 2/10 of a mile difference. I’m not sure which is more accurate. The calorie counters don’t match up either. Not a big deal for me but I realize it may be for some.I don’t know if it’s just me, but the tread seems to move a lot faster than the one at the gym. I had to reduce the speed by .5mph to maintain my usual cadence.Overall, the Nordic Track was the best investment we made for our stay at home gym.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 14, 2020
CommentsContent: I've seen that this is a walking treadmill, but I use it to run on every day! I'm not a world record holding sprinter or anything, but it does the job! It only goes up to 10mph, but I definitely don't need it to really go any faster. I run ~4-5 miles a day on it and it holds up! It folds super easily, its on hydraulics. There's a ledge to hold my phone/ipad and lots of cupholder space.

I thought it needed time to quiet down, maybe like a breaking in period. by that Saturday, my son said that the track was sliding off to the side. I called Amazon on two different occasions for help on both occasions, they put me on hold and returned saying they were unable to get in touch with NordicTrack. The only thing is you need to register to their program. CommentsTitle: Does take time to put together but great product.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 21, 2020
CommentsContent: It’s been about almost 20 days since we received product and the first thing I need to state is that even though it says you have to have ifit you don’t. Just hold the ifit button down for a few seconds and tada ready to use.Putting it together was a bit of a challenge but I had read enough reviews to know this could happen but that I would be happy I did. It took about 1 1/2 to put it all together. We the quality of treadmill we are receiving it is well worth it. Our did come with a broken cup holder but reached out to amazon and they took care of it.We love that the incline works perfect and it’s not so noisy. We felt it was like when you go to the gym and use those treadmills. Just the same amount. We like the 20 in width belt and it was one of the things we were looking for so this was just right our ally. It was shorter than we wanted (5 inches) but still perfect for the price.When it comes to the belt, you may have to adjust from time to time so it won’t rub on the sides. It comes with a tool and it’s super easy to do. We use the incline a lot and notice the difference of the belt and how it is very important to keep that tool so if it does need adjustment. We have only adjusted twice the first time using and haven’t since. Again we are very happy with the product.Excellent but for the price and great for a runner and walker. We do interval running but usually run about 7 and it is an awesome feel to our steps. It doesn’t have long side rails but it just a matter of getting use to it. No big deal about that.Highly recommend you buy the product and as stated before you do NOT need ifit. If it’s your kind of things well you can always get the subscription. Oh and it doesn’t have a fan but still worth the buy.Loving and enjoy the treadmill.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Great machine, don’t fully tighten any screws until it’s completely assembled
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 2, 2020
CommentsContent: Where I failed: don’t tighten anything until you have the whole thing assembled, not just at the end of each step. I was able to get it together though it took some rather strong language and a call to customer service to figure out what had gone wrong. I still managed to get it together without help, but the difficulty I faced in assembly was of my own making.That said, it’s a great machine. It feels completely solid and the ease of moving it even once it’s setup is thoroughly impressive. The menus are intuitive and easy to navigate, and the presence of the quick-shutoff chain is minimal and easy to use when wanted. The only physical things I would like to see different would mostly be with the app functionality, eg the complete lack of integration for iPhone’s health stats app, the lack of a search function in the guided workouts, the inability (to my knowledge) to map out custom workouts ahead of time with sliders or some form of paragraphic interface, and that it can’t turn the unit’s display screen when the app is in use. The incline works beautifully and smoothly, plus is gradual enough to not risk a fall or injury if you aren’t paying attention.Very satisfied with my purchase
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 21, 2020
CommentsContent: Man, I love this machine. It’s great because it’s a common household name for treadmills. Top notch. A friend came to visit and said “Oh you got a NordicTrack, a real treadmill”, as they proceeded to test it out. They loved it. I love it! Nice and sturdy machine and I like the fact that you can run on it and it goes to 11mph. Happy with product and with times like this it’s nice to be able to walk if I don’t want to go outside.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: I now look forward to workouts!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 15, 2020
CommentsContent: Let me start off by saying that I used a treadmill from Walmart for over 4 years before I purchased this, so I was ready for any improvement.I am not a runner or an avid work out person, I wanted a nice treadmill for walking , light jogging, and incline training.I have used this treadmill for a month now and I absolutely love it, I actually forward to working on it.It’s easy to use and comfortable to walk on, no issues at all.I did choose the trial IFit membership and not sure why so many other reviewers have opted out. It’s a fantastic feature! And it’s free for a year, why would you pass it up?Yes, you have to give them your credit card information, that’s typical of any trial product or membership you choose.So far, I have hiked along the Grand Canyon, around Niagara Falls, and Scotland.  The IFit offers activities for all levels, all over the world. Workouts go by quickly because you’re so in to the scenery, and the trainers keep you motivated and offer great training tips.What I really like is that I can manually adjust the speed and incline, if the trainers are going too fast and still follow along.For example, I chose a run across the Grand Canyon , but the trainer was going at speed of 5.1. I can’t go that fast , so I set it to a lower speed and was still able to enjoy the scenery and inclines.I know there are other treadmills that offer fans and a nice sound system and such, but this fits my needs perfectly.I would recommend this and the IFit wholeheartedly.On a side note, it took my wife about three hours to put together.I also paid a little extra for delivery person to carry it downstairs for me, worth every penny!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: NordicTrack T 6.5 Si Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 8, 2021
CommentsContent: My husband & I use it daily , specially my husband -runing - reg and uphill. I use it for walking also flat & uphill.Was easy to assemble if you follow the directions a the video “how to”. I recommend to have 2 persons for assembling even if one is there to help with the steps.This was a god send especially during these times of COVID-19 - gym is not a healthy option.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Love the treadmill AFTER the assembly ordeal was over
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 26, 2020
CommentsContent: PRO: The treadmill is very substantial, heavy, and doesn't move at all on our cement floor. Once we familiarized ourselves with all the steps to activate iFit and started working out, absolutely no problems. I enjoy using iFit, my husband prefers just walking on the oval track and listening to his own music with headphones. It's possible to use it without iFit, but worth trying it for the free trial period. I find it makes the exercise time pass quickly, walking in London, Hawaii, New Zealand, Petra, etc.CONS:  We are over 65, so maybe should have expected we couldn’t assemble this without help. (It took nearly an hour to unpack it) That said, we gamely tried. Got as far as Step 3. The bolts holding all this steel together just wouldn’t go in. Did we have the wrong tools, not enough muscle, who knows. We hired someone who got it up and running in 2 hours. The heart rate handles you hold onto with both hands weren't accurate, 70 bpm? Really? 😂 In no universe am I an elite athlete, lol.BOTTOM LINE:  definitely a good purchase and is perfect for this epidemic lockdown when leaving the house to exercise is not an option for us.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: T 8.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsTitle: Just A Simple Treadmill but Beware of iFit Trick
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 9, 2019
CommentsContent: I see all the commercials with the twenty-year old athletes running on their treadmills with intense trainers engaged with them.  I am too old for that and did not need that.  What I needed was a good quality simple treadmill so I could walk at a good pace comfortably.  I am recovering from triple bypass surgery and my old treadmill of 15 years gave out.  The treadmill market is confusing and saturated, but I feel the NordicTrack T6.5 is exactly what I need.  I have been using it almost daily for a month and am pleased with the quality, performance, comfort, ease of use and appearance.  The one thing I absolutely did not like is the iFit situation.  Per the treadmill instructions, you have to setup a free 30-day membership trial in order to activate the treadmill.  As I stated before, I am recovering from heart surgery and just needed a treadmill and subsequently forgot about the free trial.  I was charged an annual membership of $190.  I called iFit customer service and they cancelled my membership but will only refund $97. I paid $100 for one day of membership.  I would rate the treadmill itself higher than I did, but since NordicTrack wants to bundle iFit into the purchase, then my rating will reflect what I think of that scam.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 12, 2020
CommentsContent: Bolts and screws an absolute nightmare to get in during assembly. Won't line up properly and feels like you're stripping the threads. 2 days running on it and the belt slides to the left and/or right. Followed instructions and it seems to hold for a while then slips again. Then heard a squeaking noise coming from front end. Called Icon customer service and after a video call it was determined that I need a new roller. Attached are pics of the old roller. This is obviously a refurbish, or they just beat the heck out of it during assembly. They offered to send me the roller, a pretty major part, and have me install it myself. I declined and asked to send a tech or I was returning. Good customer service I'll say, but absolutely horrible quality. Pretty unimpressed with Nordic Track and their $1000 treadmill.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: NordicTrack T 6.5 Si Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 10, 2020
CommentsContent: This treadmill was the biggest mistake ever. It arrived smash to pieces, with the screws and plastic pieces everywhere. Assembly was a pain and definitely requires two people. Instructions were unclear looked rushed. Customer service is nonexistent and requires preregistration of product just to get "assistance". It was an ordeal just to get replacement parts for the damaged good that is this treadmill, which took 2-3 weeks to arrive. So I have this smashed hunk of junk just sitting there collecting dust. Once the smashed parts were replaced, the product requires you to purchase an exercise plan just to operate, but that can be bypassed by pressing and holding the blue button on the panel. The treading feels loose and has too much slack, the display is awkwardly low especially when incline is changed, and worst of all, the buttons are not very responsive and slippery. Its always a guess trying to change the speed or incline.This product arrived defective as well. Every time the incline is lowered, there's a horrendous snapping sound that rocks the machine. Clearly not normal and the company refuses to fix or replace this defective part. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT OR ANYTHING SOLD BY NORDIC TRACK. AVOID LIKE THE PLAGUE.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Great machine at a great price.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 7, 2019
CommentsContent: Amazon was great on this delivery. The first one was damaged before I got it- It was returned before it even made it to me and I was notified via email. I contacted Amazon support- the lady was GREAT, she had a new one on the way the same day.The delivery company was great as well, the two delivery guys brought it in the house and down to my family room. Please tip your delivery guys- this thing weighs a ton.Took about an hour to unbox, lay it out, build and cleanup. No need to use a professional setup person if you can read some basic instructions and use a screwdriver and turn a wrench.Once together, it works great. The big reason I went with this over a few of the others that were less expensive was to be able to adjust the incline while using it versus manually setting it. That was worth the extra $200 alone.The only negative- the heart rate monitor seems to read my heart rate at about  50% of what it really is  2/3 of the time. I have a message out to Nordic Tracks customer service so we’ll see if there is a fix. Could be user error but I don’t think so.No need to join the iFit program that comes with it unless you want to pay the yearly fee for it. Hold down the iFit/ Sync button  while powering it on the first time and it bypasses it. Look below a few reviews, there’s one that walks you through it. You only have to do this once. The speakers aren’t very good, but I didn’t expect much there.Overall, great purchase and I’d recommend it highly- if you’re on the fence buy it.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 8, 2019
CommentsContent: There's a reason why Nordic Track has a reputation for high quality.  I wanted a decent treadmill but like most folks on a budget, I figured I'd have to compromise as low price and decent quality is sometimes an impossible match.  This treadmill is everything I was hoping for.  It is sturdy, roomy and well-built. The Ifit membership is a nice feature if you're interested in special training programs but you can still use the treadmill if you are not. Ignore the decals that state that you have to register the machine in order for it to work. Simply hold down the Ifit logo for 30 seconds and the treadmill will start right up - no credit card info or registration required.  I LOVE this machine.  Mega value for the price.  Has all the features I want.  Very happy with this purchase.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Have an extra person to help with assembly.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 28, 2021
CommentsContent: Great tred for the money. Amazon brought it in and we did the rest. Set aside a couple of hours to get it done. Does not hurt to search YouTube for assembly vids, cause the included instructions to build are a bit hard to get. Girlfriend is down on this guy cause she is ready to fly. Luckily, no broken parts or missing bolts.And, skip the ifit subscription if you want by holding the ifit button after powering it on  for 15, 30 seconds, it is  yours without the BS. Will give a more thorough review of the machine after using it for a few weeks.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 6, 2019
CommentsContent: I love it. It was pretty easy to assemble, only took me about an hour or so if you have the right tools. It says that you need to go to ifit.com/activate to use it but you really don't. You can bypass that requirement easy by holding down the fitbit icon for 15 secs and the treadmill will unlock. Make sure you have the emergency key attached once you do it. Overall, I am completely satisfied.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 9, 2020
CommentsContent: Amazon prime delivery was on time and efficient. No shipping damage, all the bits and pieces that were supposed to be in the box were in the box. You do need a Phillips head screwdriver and adjustable wrench for assembly.I, 55f and the only one in the house who reads instructions and makes sure all the pieces are there first, decided to put it together myself. It didn't feel like 2.5 hours but that's how long it took. Did I complain? A little. In Step 6 I carefully loosened/tightened four pre-attached screws in the handrails to get the larger screws/washers in place. Turn the page for Step 8 to read "if there are four screws pre-attached inside ... remove and discard them..." grumble. It's recommended you have a person help you hold to attach the console assembly but it's doable by yourself if you're flexible. I did need the second person for steps 13-15 (of 17) to hold the belt frame up while I attached the crossbar and storage latch.Yes, there are stickers and "warnings" stating that the treadmill is locked and will not start until activated at ifit.com. You do NOT need to enter your credit card information (find the small font that says skip or no thank you). You will still get the one month free trial. I do not like that I cannot input individual stats (height, weight, etc.) into the treadmill directly. Those fancy features come with the ifit app subscription. I did poke around the iFit programs a bit - would have been nice for it to limit what I could see to this particular machine; in other words there were plenty of programs that incline to 18% or 34% automatically - useless for this machine as it only goes to 10%. But, the walks/runs that take you on tours of places are neat. Would I buy into the subscription? Not unless it synchs with my Fitbit which it does not. Speaking of which, the treadmill pulse bar monitor and my Fitbit read are fairly close. I'm not sure about distance/steps because I keep forgetting to check...which is why synching would be nice.The machine lifts out of the way and lowers easily (not a feature we use regularly but it's there if needed). As with every other piece of exercise equipment we've ever owned, the built in speakers are not awesome. The lip at the bottom of the console holds phone/tablet admirably, if I could design it myself I would have it at the top so that I didn't have to look down to see my phone (as the ifit trainer is telling me to keep my head up).NOTE: none of the assembly steps in the manual indicate to attach the safety key. It's just pictured hanging off the pulse bar in the final step (it did not come attached, it's wrapped in a small bag with the screws etc.). You do need to have the red safety key in place on the pulse bar to make the machine work (there's a small indented area with a key logo). The important emergency information on how the *safety* part of the key works (if the clip is attached to you) is highlighted in the manual under HOW TO TURN ON THE POWER. Be safe.So far, we've had four family members of varying sizes use the machine on full workouts - walkers and runners. Haven't wanted to adjust cushioning, there's been no belt slippage and there have been no weird noises. For the price, we recommend it.UPDATE 3 months later: after browsing the iFit programs for a few days I found the functionality between the app and the treadmill to be what I needed in my life. I have an annual subscription (still don't need to leave your CC info with them permanently). Because I'm not just staring at the wall while using the machine I look forward to hopping on 5-6 days a week faithfully, traveling around the world - heck, I've even done a few virtual 5k races! Machine is still solid - I use it the most, but my husband is on it 3-4x/week and a teenager too. No squeaks or issues thus far.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 29, 2020
CommentsContent: Bought this 3 years ago along with a service agreement that had a free lube/maintenance service call as part of the agreement.  They call to renew my agreement which reminds me to ask for the free service.  The service guy comes out does his thing and leaves.  Two days later I go to use it for the first time.  It turns on and shuts off again.  Call Nordik track and she says sounds like the circuit board went out since he was there and you still have 30 days to renew the agreement which runs out in 2 weeks.  I said let's let the service guy come back since it worked before he came and now it doesn't.  She says if he can't get back in 2 weeks you won't be covered.  Why would I renew an agreement with a company that doesn't do right by their customers.  Better to just put it against a new treadmill from a different company since the console was outdated when I got it three years ago.  UPDATE: WHILE THE LADY ON THE NORDIC TRACK "HELP LINE" WAS ONLY INTERESTED IN SELLING ME AN EXTENSION TO MY WARRANTY THE 3RD PARTY SERVICE GUY CALLED ME BACK AND WAS ABLE TO HELP ME TROUBLE SHOOT THE PROBLEM OVER THE PHONE.  YOU WOULD THINK NORDIC TRACK WOULD OFFER TECHNICAL SUPPORT.  Further update: The machine still works well. Looks like they jacked the price since Covid hit tho.  This was a good purchase but the warranty and the company support is worthless.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 29, 2020
CommentsContent: I started walking and using StepBet to challenge myself during COVID quarantine.  As we approached the cooler, wetter weather I was worried that I would have trouble keeping up with my step challenges, so I was happy to find this treadmill.  Reviews here and in other places are great and it is EXACTLY what I needed to keep up with my challenges.  I love that I can put my iPad on the ledge and watch something while I walk, or set my phone there while I listen to a podcast or audiobook. I can walk at a pretty fast pace with no major noise or vibration.  My daughter runs on it and I can hardly tell she is running from the other room.I'll admit it was a challenge to put together... definitely need 2 people, but soo worth it!  I have not activated the iFit membership but I am considering it.Overall, this is a great treadmill to use at home when the weather makes it tough to get outside.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 8, 2018
CommentsContent: I received my treadmill on August 13.  The delivery company was great and was willing to place it anywhere in the house that I wanted it.  I opened the box and was able to put it together by myself.  I wanted one that could fold up so that I didn't lose a lot of floor space when not using it.  My only complaint is that the tiny wheels used to move it are located in the wrong place.  I feel they should be on the front where most of the weight of the machine is so that when I fold it and try to roll it I do not have to use a lot of muscle to get it moved.  With the wheels on the back I have to pull the weight of the machine towards me to roll it.  My previous folding treadmill (different brand) had the wheels on the front.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Great treadmill, got it on a great sale
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 17, 2020
CommentsContent: If you watch the prices, you can get this on great sales at certain times of the year (particularly around holidays). The motor is plenty powerful for what I need it for (jogging and power-walking), and the running surface is comfortable. I am pleased that I can continue my workouts in the colder weather months. You do not have to subscribe to iFit to use the machine, you can always click on Manual Workout. But connecting the treadmill to WIFI is still worthwhile without the iFit subscription, as you do get access to some free "included workouts". Also, I paid for the delivery to room of choice, but the carrier that delivers it will only deliver to doorstep or garage currently because of COVID-19. But Amazon refunded me the $20 that I paid for delivery to room of choice. Can't speak to the ease of assembly, as I paid someone locally to do it (and they ended up taking it to the room of choice for me).
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: T 8.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsTitle: BUYER BEWARE -- THIS IS A NORDIC TRAC SCAM
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 30, 2019
CommentsContent: Nordic Trac shame on you!!!!  Suffered for two days trying to figure out how to get this thing running.  Finally I read another customer's review.  He/she figured out how to bypass this whole rigamarole by holding IFIT button down for 30 seconds.  It bypasses all the IFIT membership BS and starts the treadmill.  I hope it works and is not the dud that other customers say it is.  AMAZON'S CHOICE?????  REALLY???
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsContent: I am so not good at working out. That is before I got this great machine. It has so many wonderful features that you would probably only find in a much more expensive machine (or at your local gym). PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 1, 2020
CommentsContent: After lugging the 250 box to hour 2nd floor then delaying the assembly for 2 months we finally opened it up and spent a couple of hours assembling it. One of the last steps was to mount the display control panel. We carefully opened the box that I was in, placed it, screwed it in and I was going online to activate the ser ice I pealed of the "wait! You must first activate..... To begin using the machine. I was shocked at what I saw under the sticker. A smashed display screen. I know that we did not cause it and now I am almost 60 days past the return deadline. I hope Amazon or Nordic trak will make this right, and soon.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 5, 2020
CommentsContent: It was a long winter and if I was going to look decent in a bikini, I needed some extra help.  Due to this coronavirus, I should be working out after work, but alas here we are. For the money, this was a steal at $600 with tax. I'm not going to be doing anything more than fast walking. Won't be jogging or running because I don't want to die just yet. It folds up nicely and putting it together wasn't too horrible. This is why I have a boyfriend.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Buyer Beware! DO NOT PAY FOR iFIT!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 24, 2020
CommentsContent: At the beginning of installation the manual says to register your device at a third party webpage- which requires the submission of payment information. If you skip this step and complete assembly/installation you’ll unfortunately find your unit is locked and you’ll be prompted go back to the webpage and fork over tour credit card yet again, with your newly purchased machine as hostage. This is deceptive and I’d even go as far as to call it an outright scam. Nordic track should be ashamed of themselves. DO NOT PUT PAYMENT INFO INTO iFIT- you can circumvent this step by holding down the iFIT button for 30 seconds (for free). The treadmill is actually ok otherwise but it really rubbed me the wrong way that Nordic Track tries to take advantage of new customers in such a dishonest way.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Headline number 2. The belt has begun to fold up on one side. After one week.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 13, 2020
CommentsContent: Am I to understand that the only way to operate the machine is to buy into an additional piece of software that will bill me every month? Why didn't the installers show me how to operate the machine, as in do more than say, read the pink sheet and log in to get the treadmill to work? Isn't this an operating treadmill?Not only was the treadmill delivered 5 days late, but the installers were in a rush. They were polite and kept a social distance, but: They.did.not.start.the.machine.  This needs to be corrected without delay. The dispatcher for this crew is named "Sharon." She called each time there was a postponement of the delivery date.Part 2. After one week, I must state that I did manage to start the machine, after seeking information on YouTube. However, after one week, I wasn't prepared for the belt to begin to fold on one side. My request for customer assistance has gone unanswered.Really not what I expect from Amazon. If it cannot be adjusted, just come get it.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 29, 2020
CommentsContent: Really enjoying this treadmill. This is not a reflection of treadmill itself, but there was some not superior service with the delivery company in terms of miscommunication on delivery dates and finding the delivery location. That aside it did take me a few hours to assemble (by myself with hubby helping when I needed parts held), watching some YouTube videos and Googling spots I was stumbled at along the way. A few of the screws were hard to fit in the holes but were able to make it work. Assembly was the thing I was most worried about, but once that was complete it's been a great tread. I've used it so far for running classes on an app and enjoy the quick jump buttons for speed and incline. This model works perfect for what I need it for. Will continue to see how the tread holds up as well an any maintenance needed (hopefully minimal to none).
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 4, 2020
CommentsContent: This is a good, solid home treadmill. Great value for the price. Stable with plenty of power for walking and running.Pros:-Easy to assemble.-Simple to use. (And easy to bypass the iFIT, if  you don't want to subscribe.)-NordicTrack customer support is fantastic. We had some issues and their response was superior. NOTE: due to the pandemic, the phone wait (and wait for an online chat) was over an hour. So I just put the call on speaker and went about my business until they were able to answer.Cons:-Front motor hood accent sticks out too far onto the walking belt and is easy to get your feet caught on and trip.-Side handrails are only 12" long so they do not provide good support, since you have to walk pretty far back, due to the hood accent.-The heart rate monitor is very inaccurate and does not work much of the time; additionally, because the hood accent sticks out so far, it is dangerous to hold onto that for stability, while walking or running. This is not a major issue as I have a pulse oximeter that I use, when I want.-The "key/clip" (that you hook to your clothes to shut off power, in case you fall) is made of plastic and breaks easily.We purchased the extended warranty, but have yet to use that. Our current issues were all covered under the basic NordicTrack warranty.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 7, 2020
CommentsContent: First of all the size of the box is 33" x 73" x 11" and weighs about 200 lbs.  The delivery company was terrible and I had to work directly with Amazon to resolve issues with them.  It took two people to move the platform to the room where it was to stay.  I'm 65years old and was able to put all of it together but the fold bar by myself although I will admit having another person to help with the console would have been nice.  It would also have been helpful if it was noted in the order description that a surge protector was required so it could have been ordered at the same time.  Once I got it altogether I did get it connected to iFit easy enough with my phone but ended up getting an Android tablet to use a bigger screen with it.  I like how quiet the treadmill is. I like that the iFit program automatically adjusts speed and elevation.  I wasn't planning to continue iFit after the free month but I've decided that I like the program.  I think it's a great treadmill that does everything I need and the price was great.  I'm glad I didn't pay extra for the bigger screen version because the tablet was a better buy to work with it and more versatile too. I would recommend this to anyone that is not into aggressive training. You'd probably want a more expensive and powerful device.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 4, 2021
CommentsContent: I paid for the assembly, but it took 2 people approximately an hour to deliver, assemble and say their goodbyes. The equipment works wonderfully! I typically use it 3-4 times each week for up to an hour.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: I like it so far - but where is the pace?
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 7, 2018
CommentsContent: I like it. It's good. It works. My only negative is I really would like to know minutes per mile pace and apparently it does not do this although it is promised in the manual and at least one online description. Here is the manual quote:"The upper half of the display can also show the elapsed time, the distance you have walked or run, the speed of the walking belt, the approximate number of calories you have burned, your pace, and the incline of the treadmill. Press the Display button repeatedly until the desired workout information appears."Did you see that "your pace" in the quote above? Miles per hour is not a pace for a runner or walker. I need minutes per mile. I did press the display button repeatedly and the pace never appeared.Now if someone can show me where I missed it, I will happily change my review to 5 stars. Maybe I can rig it somehow with a smart phone.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 20, 2021
CommentsContent: Nice looking treadmill, folds down and up very easy with the tension rod, it carries the weight so that is nice.  Putting together was a little frustrating as some of the screws did not fit and had to use my own.  I read this in some other reviews as well. CommentsContent: well shipping went well got a tracker app. that showed map and # of stops before me and they texted 1/2 hour before getting here. It is 200+ lbs but NP with 2 floor carts and no steps.  spent maybe 2 hrs putting it together with stopping now and then did it by myself with no problems but if your not mechanically inclined 2 people could make it better. thank God i seen all the post about the way to skip there IFIT crap by holding the IFIT tab for 30 sec.  only bad things so far I see is the heart rate bar is in not the best place should be on the arms. CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 25, 2019
CommentsContent: Let's start by saying" This treadmill is b.o.m.b!!. I got it delevered and had to pay extra $20 bucks to have it taken to a specific area which was the basement. I walked down the streets and inclined pass shops, this is some real live "Jetson Livin." I love it, this is hands down the best investment. Worth every penny.

CommentsTitle: Aggravating assembly... you'll owe the swear jar lots of money
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 6, 2021
CommentsContent: I have assembled many products without issues, but this one was a pain.  Too many screw holes that weren't the right size, along with bolts and screws that were much too difficult to access with tools.After figuring out how to bypass the iFit registration (hold the iFit button down for 30 seconds with the magnetic key in place), I'm happy now.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 30, 2020
CommentsContent: I had reservations about buying a treadmill online without trying it first. I’ve never owned one and only used commercial grade treads in gyms and hotels. I was thrilled that this one feels just as solid and no louder. Assembled by one person, except for one step. It’s really heavy but drug and slid down the stairs easily, ha! I love the iFit app and connecting it via Bluetooth. The speed and incline is controlled via the app. Even if I decide to change the speed manually the app still changes the incline and vice versa. I set my iPad in the console and run through Newport Beach, Germany and Montana. The bed is nice and long. I’m 5’3 and 125 and run anywhere from an 8:30 to 10:00 mile depending on the day.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 9, 2020
CommentsContent: The product itself is nice. The problem is that once you purchase the treadmill you should just be able to assemble it and use it. The assembly is tricky at times, especially alone, but do-able. When the setup is complete you then need to get on to a computer and register it with Ifit, which will require a credit card. Then you have to download an app, watch an introductory video, create a profile, connect your phone to your machine and activate it. I have seen some videos showing people how to unlock the machine by holding the IFit button, that must have been corrected on Nordic Track because that did not work for me. Fortunately, the cancellation process is not very difficult. Ifit.com, hover over your name, settings, membership, end benefits and then end benefits through about 5 more "please stay" menus.Here's the reason for 1*. I don't appreciate being held hostage in the use of the machine that I just shelled out nearly $800 for. Who are you guys? The American government selling insurance? When this machine gets older and breaks down, I can assure Nordic Track and Ifit that I will not be going through their circus again. I don't need to pay $15 a month to be told how to run on a treadmill.The features are nice though, aux in, ipod compatible, speakers, a shelf for my ipad so i can watch basketball or whatever. Nice machine, just feels like a scam when you can't turn it out and run.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 28, 2020
CommentsContent: I was very excited to get this, but when it arrived it was heavily damaged. One of the foot rails(sitting next to the treadmill in the image) was completely broken off and the motor hood has a crack in it along with a very ugly scuff.  Strangely - the shock absorptions looked like they were in bad shape as well, but I think that was caused by whatever caused the rail to break off the treadmill. One of the foot covers(seen sitting on top of the machine) was damaged so bad that I was finding  pieces of broken plastic throughout the box.  There were also minor damaged areas throughout like the motor hood was warped due to the crack making so the hood no longer fit as it should onto the frame of the treadmill, the holes were certain bolts were screwed in were warped, the underside of the treadmill looked like it may have been damaged as well. I have no idea if it had any mechanical issues, so I really cant comment on that considering I did not even get past simply opening the box. This is going to be returned to Amazon.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: It works well and is worth it
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 25, 2019
CommentsContent: Overall great buy. The machine functions well and was pretty simple for myself and my fiance to put together. Took about an hour, instructions were clear and simple to follow.I've been using the machine on all levels, sometimes doing intervals at max speed and then decreasing it. Sometimes longer moderate paced runs. Sometimes just walking. Never have had any issues at any specific speed or setting.Speakers work well, not gonna be of a surround sound quality but for music while running works good enough.My only issue with the entire device is you have to sign up for iFit in order to turn the device on. This requires a credit card to start the free trial (at least mine required it). I immediately cancelled the plan so it wouldn't charge me but I hate being forced to do stuff like that, especially when it's to just turn on a treadmill.Device good, speakers good, overall I'd buy again.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 3, 2019
CommentsContent: I ran 9 miles a day on my previous C600 and if needed could pause at any time and resume a run. I just called customer service to see if I was missing something as I can't resume my runs when I pause them and I was informed you can only do this if you have iFit. Having a feature like this intentionally disabled for an avid runner is abhorrent. I cannot stress how much I do not recommend this treadmill for this reason alone, especially if you do long distance runs.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 20, 2020
CommentsContent: My wife is a gym rat, and with the quarantine going to the gym is an impossibility. She decided she wanted a treadmill and wanted to cheap out with one of the really cheap treadmills on Amazon, but I did some research and decided it'd be better to not cheap out so much and get this NordicTrack instead.I'm happy we did. I wasn't exercising at all prior to getting the NordicTrack but now that we've got one in the apartment we both use it every day to run a couple miles. So far so good! Honestly I can't really tell the difference between this machine and ones I used to use at the gym, so I think it's pretty great.I hear people talking about wanting more expensive treadmills that are quieter, and, sure, this one is a bit loud, but it's not really a big deal at all. If I'm in the bedroom and she's running in the living room, I mostly just hear her foot falls and not the treadmill. If she's in the living room watching TV while I'm running, she just turns up the TV a bit. My AirPod Pros also silence it. So if you're concerned about noise, I don't think you should be too worried about it. Plus we haven't had any complaints from neighbors or similar.This treadmill will be getting a lot of use from us, it definitely won't be turning into a coat hanger. I'll end up purchasing the extended warranty for sure, and we'll see how well it can keep up with two dedicated runners hammering away at it!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: I've been using consistently for almost a year...  Solid Machine
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2021
CommentsContent: I purchased this treadmill just after all of the Covid lock-downs began almost a year ago.  I figured going into this whole situation that I'd either gain 50 pounds or lose 50 pounds.  Ha!  I was about 290 lbs at that time and can confirm at this time I'm about 60 lbs less due to ALOT of walking on this treadmill!  When I purchased, I knew I'd need a solid machine just because of my current weight at the time.  While there have been plenty of cheat days between then and now... I can confirm this treadmill is solid and well powered for my needs.  I'm not a runner but maybe someday.  So, I mainly use for very long walks at a faster pace.  I will toss in a little incline from time to time.  My main focus had been keeping myself in fat burning heart rate (you can look that up... easy to calculate).  I started at just a few miles a day (usually 5 - 6 days a week).  Now, I'm up to 8 - 10 miles a day.  I did purchase the added 3 year extended warrantee because the price was good and I will take them up on their preventative maintenance once I hit the 1 year mark of ownership.  Having used extensively, I can very much confirm it's a solid machine and I feel very good about this purchase.  Good luck to you... just keep walking... or running!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Product came broken and did not work
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 15, 2021
CommentsContent: First the product came with dents and some breakage . I called amazon and they offered me partial refund.We thought the damage just looks cosmetic so product might not still works . So we moved the 300lb trade mill to basement . After hours of assembly we have to know that treadmill just does not start.Amazon tried calling the manufacturer but did not get any response back. Now we had to return the treadmill and the issue is its very heavy and taking it out from basement is just not possible for me.Amazon is saying you have to put it to front porch to get it picked up by carrier.I would recommend not to buy this and buy one from somewhere else that offer free assembly , so it the treadmill does not work you can just ask them to take it back.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Good One but hard to assemble
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 21, 2020
CommentsContent: We like the treadmill. it works well and having it at home is very convenient. First of all, the product is heavy. If you are going to assemble it yourselves, make sure 2-3 people who can lift 200 lbs available to help. The assembly is hard if you don't get the angles right. It took us almost 7 hours to get everything right as the screws won't tighten and console won't fit between the bars unless you get the  angles right. Folding is easy. It is worth buying the assembly for 100$(or 67$ if there is a deal). You don't need ifit but the instruction makes you think you need it. Press on the ifit logo for 20-30 seconds and you can use the manual mode with no issues. Overall except for assembly, we like this treadmill
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 21, 2020
CommentsContent: Along with the NordicTrack S22i bike, I purchased the T Series 9.5 treadmill from Nordictrack.  Just like the bike, I am super impressed with this treadmill.  Prior to purchase, I reviewed a LOT of different types/models of indoor equipment.  I wanted to have an interactive experience that will keep me both entertained and focused on goals while I exercise.  This treadmill does JUST that.  The screen is large, but not massive in size.  That is okay, though - it is plenty big to take in the scenery as you follow your trainer.  There are hundreds of training sessions, with more added all the time.  Feel like walking?  Have a historian walk you around the pyramids of Egypt.  Ready for a run?  Train for a marathon in Utah.  Feeling challenged?  Hike up a mountainside trail!  The trainers encourage you along the way, and when their terrain changes, so does the incline / decline resistance on this equipment.  Onboard stats are right at the top, so you know how you are performing.  I especially like the addition of Google Maps!  I can create my own trail and see the sights in places I have never been.  The equipment has a solid frame, and the overall footprint is not so massive.  Great price for this equipment!  Highly recommend!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 14 InchesStyle Name: T 9.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 1, 2019
CommentsContent: This treadmill was delivered promptly.  I arranged for the assembly through Amazon and I'm glad I did!  The technician knew exactly what to do and it was pretty complicated.  I usually do my own assembly but was glad I didn't this time.  The treadmill is a very solid and serious machine - nothing flimsy or cheap about it.  It has basic functions, which was all I wanted.  I just get on and walk for a while.  The incline feature is a bonus.  I have it placed in front of a TV in my office, so I watch "my shows" while I walk.  The only negative is that it is quite loud - it makes a loud whining sound - enough that I couldn't hear my TV.  I solved the problem by purchasing a set of bluetooth headphones for the TV.  Solution works great.  I'm very motivated to use this machine and am enjoying it a lot!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Great addition to my fitness room
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 28, 2020
CommentsContent: As we move into the winter months I wanted to have a treadmill that I could run on instead of running in the dark.  I've never been much of a treadmill runner, but with COVID-19 I thought this would be a good addition to my "fitness room" (aka my basement).  It arrived a day later than scheduled and I was very worried that it wouldn't be placed in my basement - so worried that I called the company.  Thankfully they still provide this service in VA and three guys carried it to my basement.  The box was damaged and I took a bunch of pictures in case the treadmill was damaged as well.  I was able to unpack and put together 90% of the treadmill by myself.  I watched a YouTube video to get an idea on what I needed to do.  Best advice was to lay out everything, watch the video (although it wasn't the exact same model) and then the written instructions made a lot of sense.  I needed another set of hands for the console and the hydraulic lift.  I received it on 9/23, finished putting it together by 11:30 that evening and have used it three times since, both running and walking.  The right hand cup holder seems to be the only part that was damaged - otherwise it works great (for me).  I have a portable fan set up and I can access online classes either through my phone or TV.  It's basic, the tread is wide and long enough for me (I'm 5' 5") and it feels very sturdy.  Nothing fancy, but I'm happy with the purchase - no buyers remorse.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 22, 2020
CommentsContent: UPDATE: Icon Fitness promised that I'd get a free treadmill maintenance kit if I left a review for this treadmill. The treadmill itself is definitely 5 stars, but the company gets 1 star for lying. I never received what I was promised. It's been over 5 months and I haven't received the treadmill maintenance kit.Original Review:I rarely write reviews for products, but I made an exception for this treadmill. It's everything I could have ever wanted in a treadmill.ASSEMBLY - With the exception of one step (attaching the folding lever), I was able to assemble the treadmill on my own. The instructions were clear and easy to follow. No parts were missing and everything was labeled appropriately.SCREEN AND TOUCH KEYS - The 10-inch screen has a crisp and clear picture, excellent touch response, and is very easy to use. All controls on the treadmill are easy to use and well laid out.MECHANICAL - The treadmill is nice and smooth. I especially love the cushion adjustment which helps reduce or decrease treadmill firmness. It's great for me since I have knee issues. Walking and running on the treadmill feels akin to commercial machines at a gym. My mom even said the quality and size reminded her of something at a gym.iFit - The iFit software is awesome! I will definitely renew my membership after the free year concludes that was included in the treadmill order. Two of my favorite workouts are the Mt. Fuji hike and Easter Island tour. iFit trainers are incredibly engaging and make working out fun and educational. There are tons of other workout options to choose from, including running, 5k training, strength workouts, etc. Plus, new workouts are routinely added.I'm really glad I decided to make this purchase. You will too!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: NordicTrack T 6.5 Si Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsTitle: Nice treadmill as long as your internet is down. Terrible Internet of things implementation
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 2, 2021
CommentsContent: It's a nice treadmill and I like the Ifit trainer options, BUT, serious screen program issuesIF your internet is down it is terribly slow at starting up the screen (15 minutes)No way to turn off the screen, other than to turn off the entire unit.Does not have a local sign in option, like it should. so if the internet is down you can still sign in.Does not store login names. This should at least of a drop down list of sign in names to pick from afteradding a user.Wifi, is not very good. Seems like they could have put a better chip in it.NO bluetooth. This is an obvious add on that it should have . the 6.5s does, but this 6.5si (a more expensive model)does not? My guess this is disable. The wifi chip probably supports wifi and bluetooth like most chipsets do these days. Please enable via an update, if possible.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: NordicTrack T 6.5 Si Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsTitle: Nice treadmill! But amazon’s processing wasn’t smooth
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 20, 2019
CommentsContent: I have only used this once, but the product is great! I love the touch screen. It doesn’t seem any louder than other treadmills. I like how you can select a speed 1-10 and include on the side without toggling up using the arrow. I don’t like that you have to sign up for an iFit subscription in order to activate the machine...it gives 30 day trial free, but I didn’t want to sign up because I’ll just have to cancel before the free trial expires.I also had an issue with amazon not initially shipping my item on time. I had scheduled assembly for the day after arrival, but I didn’t get a notification that the item was delayed...then for some reason the extra shipping I paid to have the treadmill delivered to another room in my house got removed from the order. When the delivery people came, they told me I didn’t pay for extra shipping but I told them I did without knowing it had been cancelled. They were super rude about it, and I went back and looked after ward and saw that it was removed. I wasn’t looking to get something for free, but that shouldn’t have been an issue in the first place when I had already paid.I have 4 stars not because of the product, but because the process with amazon wasn’t very smooth.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 30, 2018
CommentsContent: The treadmill is heavy, and I needed the help of a friend to assemble it; took about 2 hours to assemble, and the instructions were pretty easy to follow. When properly assembled, it's very sturdy. Because of its weight, I don't often move it (the little wheels might work on a harder surface, but we have it on an treadmill mat on carpet), so I placed it in a location where it can stay there for a long time. It folds easily, and storing it folded does save some space. Overall, I am EXTREMELY SATISFIED. The tread surface is wide and it's long enough to jog or run comfortably. The speed and incline controls work smoothly. I tend to use my own headphones rather than connecting to the unit's speakers, and I rarely use the pre-programmed workouts, so can't really comment on those, but they are there if you want them. The tread does make some noise when in use, but I would say it's relatively quiet. The time/speed/miles/calories readouts seem to be accurate. The "pulse/heart rate" readout jumps around a bit, but it still gives me a fairly accurate idea of my maximum heart rate. Bottom line is, this treadmill suits me just fine. It's a gym-quality piece of exercise equipment at an affordable price. I've owned treadmills that cost 2 or 3 times what this one cost (@ $650 USD), and I would rate this one as good as or better than the more expensive ones I've owned. (I'm a 60-ish female ex-athlete who is trying to get back into shape, and this treadmill suits my needs as well as those of my ultra-fit housemate. Would recommend it for beginners as well as seasoned treadmill users.)
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 7, 2021
CommentsContent: This review is just for purchasing off amazon. I have bought Nordic track products before directly from them. It would always take weeks for delivery they would only do curbside unless you pay a bunch extra and when I had issues with my machines they would always get looked at by a technician and they would say nothing was wrong. So I haven’t purchased any Nordic track items in a few years. That being said. I felt safer purchasing from amazon and 2 day delivery hell yeah I gotta get some of this quarantine thick off lol. Paid 655 for a treadmill with auto incline up to 10 miles per hour and the higher weight capacity also meaning it’s more sturdy the price can’t be beaten. Amazons delivery was impeccable they had this delivered to my doorstep up 6 flights of stairs in less then 48 hours without a dent crack or anything.Assembly: I am a single woman so I assembled this alone found a video on YouTube that was super helpful. But even listening to all the tips the heart monitor support bar gave me grief did not align properly. Even tho I had not tightened the bottom legs and could freely move them. Other than that it was pretty easy to do alone expect the safety bar drop system but I managed to get it done.The machine: so after set up I did the Ifit bypass which worked fine. The machine started right up I did here a very faint bang sound during rotation but while on the machine it’s none existent and I don’t know if it’s just this motor very faint. The incline worked great right out of box. I have already done 2 hour workouts on this treadmill and it’s been great sturdy the belt isn’t slipping quiet I can hear my iPad and it’s not even plugged into the console speakers yet. I am 5’7  and the belt width and length is great I don’t feel like I am hitting the sides or going off the back or the front of my feet hitting the motor cover nothing. If you are gonna buy a Nordic track I suggest doing it thru amazon!I took off one star just because like everyone else I do think it’s pretty sleazy to put a red piece of paper saying your machine is locked and Cannot be used until you register for if it.Overall very happy with my purchase already feel better working out! I hope this machine last a few years.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Love it but did NOT love putting it together (wrong screw)
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 13, 2021
CommentsContent: Great treadmill. Love it! Love the incline, love the fold up feature, and love how sturdy it feels. It's a treadmill so it's not whisper quiet but it doesn't sound like a giant motor running either so win!Hated putting it together. Wrong screws, bent parts, and horrible diagrams to follow. Assembly took 4.5 hours with another person. If we were not strong people, idk if we could gave gotten the display bar installed. It had to be forced.We used another screw for the ground.
