CommentsTitle: Sturdy, quiet, great treadmill, super price.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 28, 2021
CommentsContent: Terrific treadmill for this price point. Is it a $6000 gym treadmill? No. Can you run on it at 12.5 mph? No. Does it give a great walking or jogging workout ? Absolutely! Don't want prerecorded people on a screen yelling at you to go faster and push through it? Don't want to pay $15-$50 a month for that privilege? Just need 20 preset programs or none, up to 10° incline and 10 mph with a nice sturdy machine. Then this is for you, like it's for me. Assembly took a while by myself. Pay careful attention to the 3 different size volts used to attach the arms. Very quiet treadmill. Oh and if you don't want to pay for ifit, just depress the ifit logo for 30 seconds or so after you turn on the on switch at the front bottom of the machine. Lastly, only thing I'd like is a little more treadmill space at the front as sometime my foot catches the plastic in the front. Enjoy!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Im a heavy user and it started to malfunction 9 months later
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 29, 2020
CommentsContent: The treadmill is good and I like it, but customer support is a nightmare to deal with. I contacted them on June 18th for support as my treadmill is starting to break down and the belt has started to rip. I have gotten replies for more information shortly after but nothing came of it. Its July 29th over a month later and I didn't get any more replies or any other information about fixing my machine either.In short if it starts to break down like mine then that's it your on your own. The machine is under full warranty but they simply wont reply so what's the point of buying warranty if they will ignore you. They don't have a customer support phone number so your only way is by email. My warranty ends in August and my fear is they will wait till after my warranty end date to say its not under warranty anymore.Beware if you plan on having this for a long time or a heavy user, might be a better idea to go with another brand if warranty and customer support matter to you.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Try before you buy. Loud and bad for knees
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 27, 2019
CommentsContent: I bought this on prime day with professional installation and 3 year warranty.Delivery:Delivered on time. I live on 3rd floor of an apartment and two guys dragged the shipment on stairs to deliver us. Looking at it I was afraid it had any damage and it turned out to be okay.Assembly:Amazon asked for 3 date/time slots for assembly and they chose my 2nd preference. I got an email of the assembly time and contact details. He came on time and the assembly took <1 hr (out time - in time). He also trashed the box. He didn't show me how to skip iFit and make it up & running. He told me to call customer service and they could help. I am glad that I read comment on Amazon and was able to skip iFit by pressing it for 30 seconds with red safety button on.Treadmill:I have used it for 5 days now and I am not liking it much. It makes lot of noise. I never had knee pain before. I am only 125lb and I walk 2 miles everyday in downtown to and from work and I had used lot of other treadmills in gym and I never had this problem. After using this, I was feeling uncomfortable from day 1. I was only walking at 2.8 - 3.5 miles/hour and didn't run at all. I wasn't sure if this is a faulty one OR problem with all. I use manual workout and I didn't find any pause button. Touching other buttons accidentally also stops the workout. It is frustrating.Pros:Wide beltEasy to foldNot so difficult to move for its sizeGood & big consoleCons:Loud noiseBad for your knees.No pauseTouching other buttons might stop the workout.Finally, I am at a point that I would never want to rely solely on Amazon reviews to buy anything as it looks like some of the reviews might be paid. I am very much disappointed with this. I am wondering how these kind of products are approved. I will try for another week and see if there will be any change and update it.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 13, 2020
CommentsContent: Assembly - 3/5. This was a PITA to put together...it's the only piece of workout equipment that we've had that truly required two people for assembly. And it took about two hours to finish assembly.Machine - amazing. I searched and searched for a treadmill, which during COVID is nearly impossible to come by one that's in stock and costs less than $2k. I finally found this one and was so impressed with the iFit screen set up. I want an effortless walking routine where I don't have to pay attention to time, incline, speed, etc. I just want the machine to do it for me, sort of like a natural walk. I'm happy that a one year iFit membership came with this, and plan to continue that membership after the first year. I am also incredibly happy with the quick responses of the buttons, the clarity of the screen and sound, and the size. It's also pretty quiet for a treadmill.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: NordicTrack T 6.5 Si Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 29, 2020
CommentsContent: So for me it arrived on time and they broung it to my apartment which was awesome.The instructions were slightly hard but not too much. I put the whole thing together practically myself besides tightening the bolts or screws then my husband did that part.It took a couple of days for me to put it together given kids and working as well but also I did not have a regular screw driver I had a drill and I did not have a wrench. Even though the instructions told me I needed this I thought I could get by without it but no you cant. The alignment of things is what also became frustrating at times and wouldnt fit so I would have to take a break and come back to it. However all of the parts were there and did fit but it just wasnt as quickly as most have mentioned.The treadmill itself is awesome I use it every other day. I'm 5'1" and 180lbs and my son uses it as well he is 5"11 165lbs. I have used it all the way to a speed of 7 and an incline of 10 but mostly speeds of 4-6 with inclines varying and my son have tried at a 10 speed but not a high incline. So it endures and it is steady. It is not that loud.I thought it would fold all the way up but it cant due to the dash board and the cup holders so I just put it up against the wall. However it does fold up and stays up.Overall awesome equipment
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 8, 2021
CommentsContent: The treadmill is not that great. I broke my treadmill by accidently hitting the stop button in the middle of a run, I then hit the speed button before the belt came to a complete stop and now my treadmill doesn't work. The belt doesn't run but the display's distance readout counts up. The worst part about this is the support for this machine. I tried calling the support number but gave up after being on hold for over an hour, then I tried to use email with support and that took up a week with no results. Support asked for all of my details like name, address, phone, email, machine serial number and I thought we were getting somewhere so I replied within minutes of getting the email. Two days goes by and then they ask for a video of the problem, no worries I sent them a 30-45second video link.  Two days later they tell me the requirements of the video and I have to send it again with 1080 resolution and no longer than 9 seconds long. I send the video again as per their requirements. The next day they email back asking for my name, address, phone number, machine serial number and so. I decided to try calling support again. On hold for 40 minutes, finally talk to somebody and they send me to a the Non-warranty department which is where I am currently stuck on hold while I write this review.I'm about to throw this treadmill out and buy one that doesn't use ICON for their support.The issue with the treadmill:Press start on the display and the belt jerks then stops. Display says the belt is running and increments the distance display. I don't think the treadmill should have let me stop and start the treadmill the way that I did.  The software should have protected the machine from the user (me).
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 20, 2019
CommentsContent: Wow.  It's impossible for me to write a full review because I've been trying to assemble this product for the past five hours.  I'm a reasonably smart guy.  I have an advanced degree and I spent more then a decade turning wrenches as an enlisted soldier in the Army so I thought this would be no problem to assemble.  Couldn't have been more wrong.  This device has the worst assembly instructions I've ever seen.  Absolutely incomprehensible diagrams.  Do not buy this if you plan on assembling it yourself.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 7 InchesStyle Name: T 7.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 22, 2019
CommentsContent: My wife and I love this treadmill even after having to put it together ourselves. The instructions were easy to follow, just make sure you DO NOT tighten the bolts where stated in the instructions or you'll have problems lining things up later. Thanks to another reviewer we activated it without having to register with ifit and giving them our credit card info. Just hold down the ifit button for 30 seconds then everything works.Took off one star due to the useless AHS assembly that was included in the purchase price. It took 18 days to get an appointment, then no call no show after waiting all day at home for them. I called AHS and after an apology was assured they would get back to us with an appointment date. After another 10 days with no appointment date, we put it together ourselves.AHS states, Handpicked Pros, Upfront Prices, Happiness Guarantee. Hmmm, how does this guarantee work? We're not happy.Anyways........ We do really like this treadmill and all the features it has.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 5, 2020
CommentsContent: The product is fine but a part will break after a few months!!! Then it is on back order for 6 plus weeks!! I can not stress this enough this company does NOT care about existing customers. The customer service is NONEXISTENT. Also you will continue to pay for IFIT while you wait for this part.I asked if this sensor issue is common and the customer service person replied "yeah it happens all the time"WHAT?????? Please do not buy this 2,000 dollar paperweight! Get yourself a treadmill with an actual customer service team!!! Please take my warning. I haven't been able to use this in 5 weeks and still haven't gotten an answer when this part will arrive.DO NOT BUY!!!!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 7 InchesStyle Name: T 7.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 7, 2019
CommentsContent: Ordered this to replace an old, dead treadmill. The first unit arrived damaged in shipping. The replacement process was easier than I expected, but the shipping companies (Pilot and Expo) seemed to not have any idea what they were doing. On the first (damaged) delivery by Pilot, the delivery was late, and when I called she said it wasn't even on the truck. Then, it showed up an hour later. On the replacement, Expo was a bit better but showed up way early, and caused some trouble.HOWEVER, as far as the product, we really like it. A bit of a chore to assemble, as expected, but it went together with no fitment problems. It's very sturdily built. Decent sound capabilities for a treadmill (we use an aux cord from the TV). Buttons respond well when pressed, so speed/incline changes are quick. Two manual settings for flex. We use the softest, feels good. Folds up easily for cleaning underneath, and releases with the press of a foot to float back down.My only complaint is that when you "stop" to answer a phone call, hit the bathroom, etc., in the middle of a workout, the timer will reset to zero in about 2 minutes, so if you are meticulous about keeping track of workout times, you need to remember or make note of your time. I find this annoying an completely unnecessary, and  there is no way I can find to fix that (my last treadmill had an option in "settings" to allow you to pause indefinitely.)Except for that, I recommend this unit.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 10, 2020
CommentsContent: First off,1. Assembly was such a nightmare. Some of the screw placements are in so deep places that you will need a head torch to ensure they are going straight. Some of the screws are in places where it's so difficult to tighten it. I can't believe engineers designed it so poorly. On the flip side, there were not too many parts to put together. Once screw was broken so we ended up putting back a screw which was a throwaway one...2. Let's talk performance - In lower speed, you always feel jerk. In higher speed, it moves so much. It says it has capacity of 300 lbs, but I guess it's actual weight capacity is only 200 lbs.3. I don't know if there's a way you can set weight to get actual calories burn. If there is, then I couldn't find it and it's not intuitive. Again, if it's there...4. Cheap material. I paid $700 for this and I don't even think it's half of it. Even after tightening the screws, the handle is not firm.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: "0" stars. Amazon sent 1 damaged/bent/cut treadmill and then another replacement faulty product.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 13, 2020
CommentsContent: The treadmill arrived bent and cut, the replacement was sent and that was electrically faulty. Both were returned via their method XPO, with all pics/proof/receipts by the deadlines. Amazon keeps trying to charge my card, which is in dispute now, despite having an email from them saying they received treadmills and won't bill it! Advice: DON'T BUY!Always keep all proof/pics/return receipts! Their scam is that when they receive items back in their facility, they don't scan them in upon arrival, and then try to say you didn't send in time, and try to keep your money. I plan on holding them accountable for their fraud. So much wasted time on calls to them to address, with no credit to account as they promised. Not to mention the AmEx points I used on some of this that they are trying to steal which =$80+
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 23, 2021
CommentsContent: First I am so so impressed with this treadmill. I love everything about it. It is quiet, easy on the joint, inclines nicely, and 1 year of IFit is a sweet deal.The assembly was a bit hard and it takes about 4 hours for one person with the help of another for the steps that requires lifting and adjusting.I had a delivery issue since I live in small city. So it took forever to get a delivery schedule and it was not flexible because the delivery company only comes once a week in our area and they had an issue the first time and  they left me waiting and they did not call or show up.  it was disappointing but I was able to get hold of them next day and reschedule for a week later and this time they were on time. Other than that the machine works great and I am very impressed with it so far. Love iFit and it is worth every penny for me.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: NordicTrack T 6.5 Si Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 13, 2021
CommentsContent: Easy to assemble, but you may need two people.  It's the quality you would expect from Nordic track.  One point on the IFit activation that was not mentioned.  You must engage the key, turn on machine, hold the IFit logo down for 30 seconds and you can easily by pass registering for the IFit Training program.  You can always sign up later.  We want to use it first to have a better understanding of our needs.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Great purchase for what I needed
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 12, 2021
CommentsContent: I usually run about 15-20 miles per week and needed a treadmill since going to a public gym isn't an option for me right now. Assembly took a couple of hours but it has held up well during my runs. It bangs a little bit when I hit speeds >6mph and I weigh less than 150lbs so I can see where it might make noise if you run faster or are heavier than that. That being said, I don't have a mat underneath it and that might make a difference. Overall, it's absolutely been worth the cost. (Also, you DO NOT need to activate the trial to start it up! Just hold the bluetooth button down until it starts).
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 8, 2020
CommentsContent: Love this treadmill. Had some issues with the belt when I first used the treadmill but after a couple annoying phone calls they sent someone out.  I will say they have a great video app so you can show them exactly what's going on instead of trying to explain it.  Belt is great now, very comfortable walk/jog, decent incline. SmEven with the belt issue I still give it 5 stars. The ifit is awesome. It came with a free year and it was very simple to set up. I read in another review it was difficult  but that is not my experience. They send a gift card with a promo code that you enter when setting it up. Also read in a review the treadmill doesn't work without an ifit membership, this is not true. I feel this is a great treadmill for the price. I would definitely buy this treadmill again and will probably only buy nordictrack because of the ifit. It just changes the whole treadmill experience. Love it!!!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: NordicTrack T 6.5 Si Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2020
CommentsContent: Bought this after comparing quite a few different models.  It's got a few ato workouts programmed into it, and the part which I am enjoying most?  No having to stop every hour.  I usually walk 2 hours after work since I sit and drive all day, and was getting annoyed with the machines at the gym forcing you to cool down and stop every hour.Ifit bypass.  Held the blue ifit button for around 30 seconds, and it unlocks to use.  No submitting the credit card to sign up for anything.Treadmill was easy enough to set up, only had to borrow a second set of hands for assembling the folding mechanism, and the control panel.The control panel has 2 item bins with flat bases which can hold a decent sized water bottle, amongst other things.  There is also a ledge for a cellphone or mp3 player to be placed for music.  Ledge can also hold an e-reader too since I saw that bit on the questions asked.Noise level is pretty equivalent to one at the gym, so it's not excessive and shouldn't bother anyone around.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 11, 2020
CommentsContent: This was easy to assemble and it is easy to fold as well. I like that this has pre set programs to use however it is annoying that if you don't purchase the optional package that comes with it you won't have access to everything and it is not cheap to buy the extra package as it is a monthly fee. It will also ask you every time you try to use it to buy the extra package so that's kinda annoying. The updates are long and serve me no use as I don't plan to buy that package as stated. I am also not a fan of the scenery it offers as I was under the impression it would be better quality than what it is. The buttons are easy to use and you can change the speed and incline easily.If I could go back and purchase it again I probably would have bought a cheaper version as the functions I was excited for are what costs extra. Sometimes spending more isn't the smarter route but if you intend to buy the extra monthly fee to use it then you will love it
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: NordicTrack T 6.5 Si Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 26, 2019
CommentsContent: I am lucky to have a husband who is very handy and savvy about putting things together.  In reviews we read, someone mentioned putting the treadmill together in half an hour.  I would say that was pretty optimistic.  We spent the better part of the day on assembly.Once the Nordic Track was working, it was squeaking very loudly.  We contacted the service number and received timely help from a representative.  Within a few days we had received a replacement roller and silicon lubricant.  The annoying squeaking has all but disappeared.I use the the treadmill for a walking program and it is perfect for the days when outside weather is inclement (all winter in Idaho).  No excuses for not keeping on track!  I enjoy being able to raise the incline to increase the benefit of the walk.  I use the Nordic Track for an hour and twenty minutes every day to accomplish four miles of walking.As a supplement to the Nordic Track, I joined Prime Unlimited music and have dowloaded my favorites into an awesome workout playlist.  I am very pleased with Amazon Prime Unlimited and recommend it highly.I am also very pleased that I can lift the treadmill into the storage position to open up the space where it sits.  For anyone like me who has to deal with weather problems that keep you indoors, I highly recommend the Nordic Track treadmill.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Assembled. Registered. Not Working. Feeling Ripped Off.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 19, 2020
CommentsContent: Okay, here's the deal. We're in a global pandemic. Our Y opens and shuts according to whatever the County says is prudent at any given moment. My wife decides she wants a treadmill. I order this thing. I assemble the thing. I register the thing. I don't give my credit card info. I still can't use the thing.There is no reason whatsoever that we should be hamstrung by the fact that we can't just plug this stupid thing in and use it. Instead, I'm forced to register (okay, fair enough), asked to shell out $15/month for some bozo to coach me (I know how to walk, thank you very much), and after all is said and done, THE THING DOESN'T WORK.Here's the deal: When I shell out this much money for anything, there's no reason for me to have to think about using it, other than to plug it in, press the program I want, and proceed to use the product. I don't want to think. I just want to use the thing. But now, instead of working out, I'm typing this review. Because, I'm not able to just turn the thing on and use it.I'm sure this will be "resolved" within a day or so, and my wife will be happily strolling along.But there shouldn't be an issue like this in the first place. I buy an Apple Computer, and it works out of the box.Buy a NordicTrack, and you have to jump through hoops. Completely unacceptable.NordicTrack: You've gained and lost a customer in one fell swoop.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 13, 2020
CommentsContent: Solid quality treadmill at a reasonable price. Setup was easy (no harder than assembling a tricky piece of IKEA furniture. Having two people helps). It’s been easy to use, has a variety of speeds, speakers aren’t bad, heart rate monitor seems accurate, and has overall been a quality treadmill that has been a lifesaver right now.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Not great for heavy people - belt a little stuttery - but OK
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 13, 2021
CommentsContent: I'm 6'4", 280lbs. I bought the NordicTrack T 6.5 S treadmill. It says it has a 300-pound user capacity, so I'm pushing the upper end. I tried walking at 2 miles per hour and it didn't feel great, belt had a little stutter. As I went up to 3mph it was smoother. I didn't go above 3mph with me on the belt yet. I felt okay walking at 3mph (slightly fast walk for me). Good enough, for sure. I was surprised by how fast the belt stopped when I pressed "Stop". Like, it immediately stopped.The overall feel of the base is fine, but the console is a bit wobbly (just a bit). I suspect it feels more sturdy for anyone under 200lbs. I got the 5 inch screen and the display is super rudimentary, like 1980s sci fi rudimentary.I followed the iFit workaround and just held the iFit button for about 20 seconds and it started. You do NOT need to activate the iFit membership.FYI, I had it professionally assembled (note: I first scheduled through Amazon, those guys never showed, left garbled messages from different phone numbers, super sketchy, so I cancelled and chose a local handyman service). Assembly took almost exactly one hour.Noise: I used a sound meter app on my phone to record noise level. Without me standing on it, phone at hand rail height,: 2mph = 50dBs, 3mph = 60dBs, 8mph = 65dBs. It was never that loud, in my opinion. For context, my microwave was 48dBs and my blender on ice crush mode was 75dBs.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: We really wanted to love this treadmill...
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 22, 2020
CommentsContent: We really wanted to love this treadmill. It is small enough to fit in many areas. It looks like it will withstand for quite some time and it isn’t too noisy when it works properly. However, it started to make a weird sound when we started to use it inclined on the first level and the sound gets worse when you put it down to ground level. Also, the motor hood came broken, we contacted the company several times and received an email asking us about the exact part of the machine that was broken. We replied 5 times and no answer. As you can see in the picture. Very bad customer service and we even bought the extended warranty for it. Really wanted to love this machine since it was affordable and we believed NordicTrack was an amazing company... this is our honest review and hopefully the company listen more to its customers.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 22, 2019
CommentsContent: DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM. Terrible treadmill. The heart monitor does not work. When I called customer service, they said the heart monitors are never accurate. Mine is off by 60-70%. I said if it was off 10% I can live with it. The rep told me they are not even that accurate. If the heart monitor does not function well, why does NordicTract  advertise the unit having heart monitor. Everytime I have called NordicTract customer service, I am on hold for at least 30 minutes. Finally they said they will send me a new heart monitor grip. When the package arrived, it was the handle but not the heart monitor grip. I am 5' 11" and when I incline the treadmill 5%, my hands will not reach the hand grip unless I bend down, not a proper posture for walking. I SUGGEST BUYING ANOTHER BRAND BESIDES NORDICTRACT.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 15, 2019
CommentsContent: Been using the this treadmill for about a month and do enjoy it.  We have had no issues with it so far.  Still trying to use the track "dampeners" to make your step softer when you step down, but to me it feels about the same when they are in use and not in use.  Gave it four out of five stars due to the display seeming a bit out of date (big blue screen with big square dots for the characters).  Also, the grab handles seem a bit short for us.  You have to stand a bit close to the front of the machine in order to utilize these handles.  If you wish to stand back a bit (so you do not step off the tread and onto the front cover on the machine), the grab handles are a bit in front of you.Assembly was not a problem for me.  It does take about an hour or so to complete and there are a few steps to go through.  There are a couple steps where you will need two people.For the price, the above "issues" are minor and would not hesitate to purchase this treadmill.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 7, 2020
CommentsContent: **EDIT**So I would like to update the product to a 2 star, and that is due to the wonderful support that I received from the chat support and will receive a new upright at part of the 90 day warranty within 3-5 days.  I will update further once I can actually use the device...Well, I want to be excited about working out, and would like to make this treadmill not become the dreaded close hanging device, but it looks like I am well on my way to that.Day 1, putting the item together and I get to the grounding screw hole, not large enough for the screw they want you to use, but you know what, who cares I will use the original screw they said to replace.  Couple steps later and it has me try to screw the hand rails to the uprights.  The left side worked, but the holes on the right side were not large enough for the bolts to screw in, so here I am, with a treadmill that cannot even be screwed together.  Day 2, what do you know, still no treadmill because I cannot make the hole larger......
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 4, 2019
CommentsContent: You can lose about 10 lbs just assembling this  machine. It’s no easy tasks but well worth it once it’s done. The advertising of faraway places you see where the pretty blonde is running on the beach or through cobblestone flower lined streets is BUNK! So far the only areas on the workouts are 3rd world slums.... if you want to see some of the poorest populations on the globe while you run then this has the app for you. As for me it’s depressing. There is also a gimmick to sell you a fitness coach for either 39$ monthly or about 500$ annually. The treadmill itself works fine but you’ll be extremely disappointed in the app that takes you to exotic places as you run. Take your own  tablet and tune into some good music and cover the Nordic track screen!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: NordicTrack T 6.5 Si Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 21, 2020
CommentsContent: Absolutely love! Only gave it 3 stars because assembly was a bit difficult but with patience doable, so don't let that scare you. The size isn't huge so it fits well in my space and folds and unfolds very easily.  The wheels also make it easier to move to another location to hide away. It's very smooth to walk on and cushioned for less stress on the knees. I prefer to watch TV during my work out so I dont use the ifit. To get your treadmill going you don't need to subscribe.  Hold the little blue ifit square for a few seconds.  You'll hear it beep and your display will light up. This way you can by pass signing up for ifit. I did register my treadmill.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Good treadmill but beware the install headaches
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 3, 2020
CommentsContent: I would have given this treadmill 5 stars except the install process was highly frustrating. I am fairly handy so I figured I’d do the install myself. It’s certainly easy to do, except for the fact that one little screw that probably cost about 1/10th of a penny arrived broken. Unfortunately it was an essential screw (connected to a ground wire) so I couldn’t go without. I looked it up online and it sounds like a fairly common issue. I had to hunt thru my assorted box of loose screws to find something that would fit.  There were other areas of the install where the pre-drilled screw holes weren’t big enough and I had to get my drill to loosen up the holes a bit and power the screws in. Trying to do by hand would be next to impossible.  Despite these annoyances, I was able to setup the treadmill by myself in about 3-4 hours.The treadmill itself is high quality. It’s sturdy, the belt is quiet’ish, and when in-use, it feels comparable to a commercial gym caliber treadmill.  I was also pleasantly surprised how easy the lift storage feature operated. I was expecting it to be really heavy and cumbersome to lift the base deck up for storage, but with the pneumatic lift arm, it's surprisingly light.The whole iFit thing is misleading and annoying. The trick to hold down the iFit button for 20 sec didn’t work at first for me. I had to power off the treadmill and try it again for it to work.Aside from all that, it’s a good sturdy treadmill for an affordable price.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Great treadmill once you get through the set-up!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 27, 2020
CommentsContent: What a pain to put together! Took 3 hours with two people to get the thing assembled. Some holes were the size of pinholes which required light drilling to open just enough for the corresponding screws. However it’s a great treadmill. Just hold the iFit button for 30s and you can bypass all that junk and get to the good stuff, and by good stuff I mean running (or I’m my case, walking for a couple hours while playing dungeons and dragons over my tablet I can conveniently set on the treadmill and plug in via Aux for some surround sound). Happy it’s finally here!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 9, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this treadmill at the end of September and it arrived in early October. After almost exactly 2 months the screen/console does not work. Seriously-- 60 days in and it doesn't work at all? Of course if the console doesn't work that means the treadmill doesn't move so I can't even manually use it.All in all this has been a very painful purchase that I regret. After some issues with the Amazon 3rd party delivery and installation it has worked as expected until last night. After having not used the treadmill for the past week and a half (it was sunny out so I went outside instead) the console does not work. After trying to re-set it per the instructions in the manual it did nothing. After googling other suggestions on how to re-set the console failed I called customer service. They were very nice but oddly enough she immediately said she was submitting for a new console and would expedite shipping. Of course shipping is delayed due to COVID so the piece won't be here for two weeks and then I have to schedule the technician. So for a brand new $2K treadmill the technology broke after 60 days. This now requires a month of downtime (during winter months which was the main reason for the purchase), 30 minutes with customer service and then the actual technician appointment.I am very disappointed given I had a Nordic Track for 15 years before this and never had a single issue. I regret not spending more and going with Pelton.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 14 InchesStyle Name: T 9.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 7, 2021
CommentsContent: There is nothing wrong with the equipment, it works well so far.But I made the mistake of buying a 3 year service plan. (don't do that) When I registered the treadmill with NordicTrac I couldn't find the way on their website to associate the service plan with the treadmill I registered. So I wrote a customer service request to please help take care of that. The service representative who responded didn't even read my request, just sent a template mail requesting that I make a video of the problem with the equipment. I responded that there is no problem, just update the database please. I got back another email from him demanding a video of the problem. They don't even read what you write them, just send back template responses wasting their customers' time. I can't imagine how bad it'd be to deal with them if I had an actual problem...
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 20, 2021
CommentsContent: So, we were looking at treadmills and various other exercise equipment options to get us back on track to getting into shape. Given the non-stop nature of our jobs right now, going to the gym really isn't an option. It was decided to give a treadmill a shot. It is the perfect addition to the home gym I put together. Assembly wasn't to difficult, and I was able to do most of it myself. I would suggest not fully tightening the uprights until after you get the arms and the screen on and adjusted properly. It needs that little bit of flex. Also, unlike all of the warning labels YOU DO NOT NEED AN iFIT MEMBERSHIP. All you have to do is put the emergency stop key in, turn it on, and press and hold the iFIT button on the screen for up to 30 seconds. It will beep and the screen will come up and you are ready to go. The incline is awesome, and the speed controls are right there. Right now we are averaging 30 minutes each a day, and it is a joy to use.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Very difficult, time consuming product to assemble
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 4, 2020
CommentsContent: A handy person with good tools assembled it for me.  He worked non-stop for three hours following the directions and not wasting any time. Once assembled, it requires connecting to the internet to unlock it.  That makes no sense. PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: NordicTrack T 6.5 Si Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsTitle: Overall Very Good - But Nordic Track is buying reviews
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 28, 2020
CommentsContent: Taking it to 2 stars because the company emails the buyers and tries to "bribe" them to write a good review with promises of free floor mats of maintenance kits.Overall, I like this treadmill a lot.It's very sturdy, seems like it will take a beating and keep on ticking.Packaging was very good, no way was it being damaged in transit !Worked first time out of the box, there was no pressure to buy an extended fitness program membership which I liked.Changes speed and incline very quickly when I need it to, and good selection of preset programs.Couple of minor issue:1. Not sure Calorie count is correct, seems to be higher (maybe the health app i use on phone when walking outside is lower, not sure who to blame but not a big deal.2. It is very heavy, so make sure the room you assemble it in is the room in which you want it to stay ! Also, you WILL need 2 people to put it together.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 31, 2021
CommentsContent: I tried to wait at least 30 days before reviewing this but I didnt want to forget so here goes. I strongly suggest getting the workout mat for exercise equipment whether you have carpet or not. Or at lease put those foam sliders on the bottom to protect your floor. Assembling this thing wasnt hard but I dont recommend anyone try to do it alone. Also, most electronic equipment recommends that power tools not be used. If you want the machine assembly to be tight, use the power tools but with caution bc that lil tool they include will start to hurt your hand after a while. Once its assembled things run pretty smoothly. The fold up is a great feature, works well. The iFit membership is hit and miss. If you already have workout goals, its not necessary to sign up for it. Its just nice to have something on the screen.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 25, 2020
CommentsContent: This unit came with a half dozen bonus screws that you're supposed to remove and throw away. That's odd, but not a deal breaker. Or it wasn't until I found that 3 of them were in there so tightly that I couldn't remove them. I can't budge them by hand, with an electric screwdriver, or with a cordless drill. WD-40 makes no difference.The bonus screws are all in critically important connections, so the unit can't be assembled without removing all of them. So if even one is stuck like three of mine are, the unit is useless. I wouldn't gamble with this treadmill.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 9, 2021
CommentsContent: Living in Midwest means at least 4 months snow and icy road. This is a very basic treadmill, which I'm looking for. I don't want pay a lot more for added big touch screen and etc. My basic economy is that I can do workout. If I want fancy feature, I can just pay separately to buy a tablet. As a matter of fact, you can control this piece of equipment through iFit.Some part of installation do need two persons, the instruction is reasonably accurate. One suggestion is that, don't tight all nuts until you assemble the screen and so on, or you may need to redo it.The speed is quite accurate when I compare to my Garmin.Folding is very smooth, though I don't really need it. For those living in small apartments, it could be a nice feature.One suggestion is that you may need to pay additional $20 let amazon guys to put it where you want in your house. The box is about 6' long, over 200lb.

CommentsTitle: Speed incorrectly calibrated out of the box
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2021
CommentsContent: I have been doing the same workout for over 15 years on many different machines at different gyms, etc.  So I have a pretty good idea of treadmill speed.  My new T 6.5 s felt like it was going too fast and I was having a hard time keeping up.  Most Nordictracks had an "Advanced Calibration" mode to determine speed calibration, but no longer with the new models.  So I determined how many rotations per minute a properly calibrated machine would have at 5 and 10 mph (47.14 rotations at 5mph, and 94.29 rotations at 10mph).  Sure enough my brand new T 6.5 s was running more than 0.2 mph faster than the readout.  It's possible to adjust the belt speed (search YouTube), so it's fixed now.  But otherwise I'm not impressed with the apparent lack of QC out of the factory (or elimination of the Advanced Calibration mode).  A proper belt speed is important.  Otherwise, decent machine.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 14, 2021
CommentsContent: It’s actually very nice product and the iFit is totally worth the money.Our first order got lost and it was such a nightmare to track. At the end we cancelled the order and bought a new one that came the next day.Needs two people to assemble.We will update the review after using the machine for some time but so far we just tried it and it was a wonderful experience.

CommentsTitle: One of the worst things I’ve ever had to assemble
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 18, 2020
CommentsContent: The treadmill looks nice, feels solid, as much of the support is constructed of steel. However, it seems like they just disassembled one and wrote up a partially complete assembly guide, and decided that was adequate for the average consumer to put this thing together.  It’s not.  The parts aren’t always consistently labeled in the text and diagrams, some of the bolts are extremely difficult to attach unless you lift each side of treadmill, and other screws need to be removed in order for some bolts to go in, but that’s not mentioned until two steps later - when you should already have put those bolts in! And even though the assembly process doesn’t mention adding the safety key to the console, it won’t work unless that key is in place!  The single most frustrating experience I’ve had in the past year!!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Great Basic Treadmill (assembly not for 1 person)
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 9, 2020
CommentsContent: We reviewed features/prices.. and decided to go with this model as a solid model from a known brand.  We didn't care about a large screen - basically just wanted it to "go" and provide some basic incline.  This model does that well!This unit is HEAVY!!  Plan to have a delivery service take it upstairs (if that's your plan).  Assembly is not terribly difficult, depending on how handy you are.  Took us about 3 hours with a proper tool set.If you are not handy, I would pay for delivery and assembly.Unit is surprisingly large (a good thing) and very sturdy.NordicTrack's "activation" is ridiculously complex.  Instructions are not good.  You have to activate through "iFit".. but we are not planning to use iFit.  You have to connect to a mobile device to "activate" the treadmill (which is probably just a ploy to get you enrolled in iFit, even if you don't plan to use it).After "activating" (which the instructions don't adequately explain", your mobile device is connected (via Bluetooth) and the treadmill won't work independently until you disconnect from your mobile device.Once we figured that out (which was VERY frustrating for about an hour or so), the treadmill works perfectly as a basic, on/off, faster/slower, increase grade/decrease grade treadmill.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 14, 2021
CommentsContent: I ordered this treadmill because of the weight capacity (don’t judge, you’re looking at treadmills too) and name brand for the price.  Originally I was worried that we would be locked into an iFit membership but holding down the iFit button for 30 seconds unlocked it and we’ve been able to use it with no issues. This wouldn’t be my first choice for an iFit treadmill unless you’re planning to use your own screen anyway. The assembly wasn’t bad, I feared it would be worse based on other reviews I’ve read. All of the parts feel substantial and it certainly weighs enough that it shouldn’t fall apart easily. My wife has used it several times and I tried it last night for the first time. Although it would benefit from a fan, I found a pedestal fan for $30 that works well enough. It’s fine for home use.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 28, 2020
CommentsContent: My wife and I purchased the NordicTrack T Series Treadmill to get a little exercise at home given the COVID pandemic. The delivery through Amazon worked great. I set up a time and two delivery guys dropped off the package. Assembly took a little longer than expected (about 90 minutes) but I will note that I have never assembled one before so I had nothing to really base my expectations on. I am now at the 3 month mark of using the treadmill. The speed and incline functions have worked well. The unit is also pretty quiet which is nice since me and my wife are both working at home. There is nothing more that I really need in a treadmill. I would purchase again.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Quick and easy to put together and set up
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 8, 2020
CommentsContent: Product was really easy to put together.  Instructions call for 2 people to put together but it is doable with just 1 person (but much more difficult and time consuming especially attaching the console and the drop bar underneath; it is also VERY heavy all together). Once it is all assembled,  you do need to activate it online at ifit.com and create an account before you can start using it. However, unlike some other reviews I've read, you do NOT have to provide a credit card in order to use it. It does have a spot to enter your credit card as you are setting up the account but right next to "credit card" it specifically says that entering that is OPTIONAL. I simply skipped that part and finished registering without it. Once my account was created,  I was able to sync my treadmill with the app via Bluetooth and was then able to start using it. As some reviewers have commented,  the belt is slightly noisy as you walk on it, however,  I wear headphones on the treadmill so that is not an issue for me at all (I also only walk on the treadmill, not run, so it may be more/less noisy at higher speeds).
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Easy to assemble, easy to use! Did it all myself.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 14, 2020
CommentsContent: I have had this treadmill for two years and I adore it.  I assembled it myself - fold it and roll it away with ease and enjoy all the ifit features.  I highly recommend it.  The negative reviews that I have seen seem to be about the person who came to assemble the unit for people, and customer service - I personally cannot relate.I also have had 5 back surgeries, 2 foot, one knee, three hand...so working out and staying fit is important to me and this treadmill has been a great option for me.  I have to be careful about high impact workouts but the suspension of this treadmill has been great as long as I build up my workouts and listen to my body.I really enjoy it and the iFit features.Oh - and there is an emergency stop feature for those who are worried about a few negative reviews - so if you follow all the user suggestions you'll be safe and sound.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 19, 2020
CommentsContent: The cons are, the frame is poorly made, a bolt on each side of the arms did not thread at all. Luckily there is 4 bolts and 3 of them hold well on each side. Not impressed about parts not threading. Also, they place screws into parts that need to be removed before putting it together. This was an issue as one of the screws was so locked inside that even a power tool wouldnt remove it. I had to use wd40 along with different pliers to remove it. Took 3 hours to put together start to finish.The pros, it works really well, I had no issue with the motor, no skips, and i ran for an hour straight. I read reviews PRIOR to purchasing, and I was able to avoid the iFit sign up nonsense by holding the ifit button for a few seconds in order to turn on the machine . I will say though, they had about 4 warning labels to sign up or you cant turn it on, however I ignored them all and held the button to avoid it and had no issue. The motor worked great, the elevation worked perfect as well as speeding up and slowing down. As long as the arms hold, I dont care that 1 bolt isnt seating correctly, however it's pretty sad that this expensive machine isnt built correctly. Pretty sad coming from a name brand like Nortic, so I wont be giving a great review. Not impressed.

CommentsTitle: Nice treadmill for the money spent!!!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 7, 2020
CommentsContent: We got our treadmill and prior to purchasing it were skeptical about the 55” length of T6.5si - I can tell you that it is not an issue at all. It makes a treadmill fun and keeps workouts fresh each and every time that we get on it for a run or a trail hike. The iFit trainers on screen are informative and offer tips while the workout plays on screen.We really enjoy the treadmill automatically making incline and speed changes to match the on screen workout  as you go along. This treadmill makes the old, boring, mundane workouts fun as time passes quickly with the interactive on screen trainer guiding you through the workouts.I did a lot of research, and if you want a solid treadmill with some nice technology features you can’t go wrong with this one. CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 9, 2020
CommentsContent: I did research many treadmills and ended up purchasing this one among others.Here are reasons:- Width and length are wider and longer than others (within my budget)- Auto incline feature- I did not want any fitness subscription service- Foldable treadmill- At least speed up to 10 and more AND more incline feature than other treadmillsI am an avid runner and run outside most of the time. Living in Seattle area, during winter season, it is hard to run outside during rainy days, so I decided to purchase a treadmill. Some people commented this treadmill is for entry level or mid-level runners or walkers. It really depends on what people need.I normally set the speed for 9 or 10 and incline level from 5 to 10 (alternate) during my running for 30 mins to an hour. That is more than good enough exercise for me. This treadmill responses quickly when I want to incline and speed up. Number blinks until the desire set incline level or / and speed level is met which is a nice feature to let me know.iFit, I got the help from many people's comment (pushing iFit button for 30 second to bypass).One thing, I've noticed is the inaccurate number for calories that I burn during running or walking. It is quite off from my smart watch. Probably, it is a mix of unable to factor into my weight, height and age plus more.Also some people mentioned about the treadmill's noise level. I don't think it is noisy.Putting this treadmill into a room or even in a garage, yes it does make some noise comparing to treadmills in a spacious healthclub. It is rather a room size making sound louder in my opinon. My health club treadmills might be equally noisier if you put one in a small room (knowing health culb treadmills are being used many hours per day and nearly 7 days a week).Assembling this treadmill will take a while (about 2 to 3 hours depending on your skill). It is a heavy equipment.Here are tips.Unless you place the treadmill box on the exact spot where you want to work out (even then you will have to take it out and assemble), you will have to move it after taking it out from the box and assembling it.Assembling a folding up rod first will help you because now you can fold up the treadmill and moving the treadmill with pre-attached two rollers on the bottom of the frame (I was able to roll the treadmill to the location where I want it to be without lifting it up). This method does not work if your treadmill is deliver to one area and you will have to move it to a different floor.I purchased a cheap bluetooth receiver (which connected to my treadmills aux). Now my treadmill is a bluetooth enabled device. Listening sound from the treadmill's speakers is better than from my phone.One thing that I commonly saw from the reviews (not limited to Amazon), there might be some broken pieces during shipping and handling (or even during packing). Mine also came with a broken cup holder screw housing which I had to modify (it was so minor and I did not want to call either Amazon or NordicTrack).In short, this treadmill is for anyone unless you compete for professional level of running, noise level is similar to my health club commercial ones, and assembly is not hard but time consuming with a well-written instruction.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Poor build quality; foldability needs a two-person install
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 8, 2020
CommentsContent: Nice treadmill—my first. I was able to put it together—mostly. I could not install the spring loaded stop under the treadmill which is needed to fold it up. The reason being the treadmill is too heavy for me to lift up and install that part.Build quality is a meh. There are frayed cables under the treadmill which is worrisome, but I have not had any issues so far. I will update this as I have more input, but this is something I will use pretty much only during the winter months here in New England.And oh, iFit app I don’t care about and it is quite annoying to go through that step.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 28, 2020
CommentsContent: We ordered this treadmill at the beginning of the Covid shut down and I’m so glad we did. Assembly took the better part of an afternoon, though it was not difficult. We followed the steps carefully and found the instructions easy to follow.After several months of near daily use by myself and my husband (who is 6’4) it shows no signs on wear and still performs like new. It is smooth and doesn’t jerk like some other treadmills. Folding the running platform up and down is super easy, too.The only thing to note, and this isn’t really a bad thing, is that once you pair your phone with it, it automatically pairs when the machine turns on. This is obviously a great feature for convenience. However, if two people are going to use it, be aware that if the other person’s phone is paired and the paired phone is out of range, it will beep loudly until it is unpaired. Now when my husband wants to use it, I have to unpair my phone. It’s not a big deal at all, just something to be aware of.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 7 InchesStyle Name: T 7.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsTitle: Treadmill is great; the ifit.com thing should be deleted
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 5, 2020
CommentsContent: This treadmill does everything you want. Sturdy, fairly quiet, good size, runs smooth, fun to assemble, arrived on time. All great.When you turn it on, however, it wants you to "activate" and subscribe" to some jokers at ifit.com. Ummm, NO. In fact hells to the no. If it had ACTUALLY made me subscribe just to make it run, I would have returned it. But, some clever person on a review found out that if you just hold the ifit button for 20 seconds on the consol, it skips over the activation nonsense.  If the app-schmozzle from Iowa teaches us anything it is that machines and systems do not need to be connected to apps to work or work better. Take a lesson out of Commander Adama and DONT network devices, be they voting apps of even treadmills.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: The walking board cracked first year of use
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 18, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this Nordic Track model. I spent $1070 with takes on it. The specifications says it would support someone weighing 300 lbs. I weight 180 lbs and in the first year of use the treadmill broke.I bought Amazon extended warranty for this. I called Nordic Track Service department a week ago. I called again today to find out the status of the repair order and they said the walking board is not in stock , they said it may take another 2 or 3 weeks for them to receive it.I am frustrated with the treadmill.:-(

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 17, 2021
CommentsContent: It took me about 6 hours to take the treadmill out of the shipping carton, read the assembly  instructions, and put it together.  It requires a 14mm socket wrench, an 14mm box wrench, a number 2 Phillips screwdriver, and an included hex wrench.  The provided hex wrench was inadequate given the number of bolts requiring it.Then once it was together, one of the wiring connectors hadn't seated properly and the inclination controls didn't work.  After speaking with their customer service department, I disassembled the control panel again, reseated all of the wiring connectors, and then everything worked properly.If I were to repeat this, I would make certain I had a hex head socket so that I could use a ratchet to install the bolts.  Just that simple tool might have saved one hour.Once it was assembled and working it proved to be a very nice product.  We use it daily. It is quiet and works well in our home.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 7 InchesStyle Name: T 7.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsTitle: Good, solid machine that will last
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 11, 2021
CommentsContent: I did a lot of research and read a lot of reviews before purchasing this treadmill and I was not disappointed. I love it! I love that there are programs to choose from (as I’m not motivated to push myself on my own) and the automatic incline is very smooth. The option to use iFit is nice too, although I personally don’t use it. The buttons are very simple and straightforward. I do wish that it had a speaker to play my music through, but overall I’m happy. The running track is very large and it feels smooth when in use. The display is a little simplistic, but, again, the track and the programs were more what I was looking for and I’m very happy with them. And the warranty is great too. Would definitely recommend.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Difficult assembly, broken parts, but otherwise good quality
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 26, 2020
CommentsContent: Ok, well... My wife took like 3-4 hours to put together and it was driving us crazy. That's mainly because the manual doesn't mention anything about the use of tools. And, the installation video we saw on YouTube recommended hand tightening the screws. Do NOT attempt this. Having a Socket wrench or power tools will make the installation much easier.Some people mentioned something about not being able to log on without activating the iFit free trial. That is true. It is not true that if you hold down the iFit button for 30 seconds that it will bypass this. It asks for a CC for autobilling afterwards, but that's optional.The treadmill seems to be working fine. It has a wide belt and feels sturdy, doesn't shake at all. I had to request a replacement part for the rod that lets you fold up the treadmill. It's been a bit of a nightmare putting this thing together in entirety, but hopefully it's worth it, because it feels like a good quality machine otherwise.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 11, 2020
CommentsContent: Keeping in mind that this is not a "pro" level or gym-caliber model, this unit has no trouble keeping up in terms of speed.  Incline motor has some difficulty keeping up with some of the workout programs and requires some manual re-setting to work.  The quality of the programming on ifit is superb, and it comes as a great surprise given the affordability!  The training is top notch and covers all types of fitness, combining weight training with treadmill exercises and an excellent logging system.  Live workouts are excellent and allow interaction with the trainers.  The programming is so effective you will find yourself staying on the treadmill for double or triple the time you would normally exercise.  Unlike trendy workouts and fitness trends in the "Insanity" or the "Crossfit" mindset, trainers push you hard but also utlize ample rest and recovery techniques.  This results in greater long-term improvement and prevents injury.

CommentsContent: Received this today and I LOVE it!!!!  It took me and my husband about an hour and a half to put it together.  I tried using the Bilt app it suggests however, I understood the printed instructions easier.  I did receive the 1 year iFit - a gift card came with the machine.  I used it tonight and the iFit is awesome.  The machine is not too loud, it is smooth to use and, the incline is smooth.  I would highly recommend this treadmill!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: NordicTrack T 6.5 Si Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 17, 2020
CommentsContent: I've had my treadmill since the end of March without any issues.  It was a COVID quarantine purchase and I use it almost daily.  Assembly was not difficult, but I did require my wife's assistance at the end to install the rods so the treadmill can fold up.  I ended up purchasing another NT studio cycle that came with a year of iFit, so I use my treadmill with the iFit program too.  The T 6.5 S does not have a built in tablet, so I connect my iPad via bluetooth and screen mirror to a TV.  Although, I did not think I would enjoy the automated  resistance and speed changes with the iFit programming, I have found those features enhance my workouts.  The treadmill is very responsive to the automated changes.  The treadmill is quiet and folds easily for space saving capabilities as well.  The incline (10%) and speed (10mph) are adequate for me, but I know my wife would prefer a higher incline for the iFit hiking programs.  Overall, I am more than satisfied with my purchase, and will likely purchase more equipment from NT in the future!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Not much happy with the customer support and the product quality
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 16, 2021
CommentsContent: After using it for around 1 year(before my warranty expired) I had problem with my treadmill belt, console and side bars. I contacted the customer support. They took the photos of the damages. They put me on hold and checked with the support technicians and informed me that they would be sending me the treadmill walking mat alone. The rusted side bars and the console won't be replaced. They claimed it is because of misuse(like placing the treadmill in open or water). Also when I asked about a technician to be sent for the treadmill walking mat, they informed that they cannot send a technician because of the "gross" condition of the treadmill and I have to pay for the technician.I could not understand what would one expect the condition of the treadmill when it is used for an year.    Just assembled mine and used very little and incline suddenly stopped working. CommentsTitle: Activation is not what it seems
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2021
CommentsContent: It took me 1 hour to unlock this machine!  (Kind of felt like a scam...)  Assembly instruction graphics are difficult to make out/see unless you have perfect vision.This machine that I already paid several hundred dollars for, can only be activated by not going to NordicTrack's website, but instead to ifit.com which requires you to sign up for their $15/mo membership.  What the heck?  OK, yes there is a 30 day free trial but you still want my credit card and remember to cancel it after a month.  It all feels shady.  Seriously - tell me its an option not a requirement to just use what I already paid for.  NordicTrack should be the one to unlock my machine as part of the warranty registration process.  Let me use it first before you start asking for MORE MONEY.  I was so annoyed after putting it together, that all I wanted to do was run off some steam.  It took me 1 hour to get this machine to start working!  Two different phone numbers, both of which are ifit, and all recordings insist you MUST register with iFit.com before anyone can talk to you.  Finally I pressed the correct button combo that told me to hold down on a "bluetooth" button until it turned green and it would unlock.  First off the button was NOT the Bluetooth icon or even that name;  it was the iFit button.  Oh and I tried that several times, and once it turned green, I let go just as the recorded message instructed.  Nope that didn't do it either.  Holding the button down for almost a minute did the trick (surprise!) and I was able to use the treadmill.  So easy and simple once you figure that out ON YOUR OWN.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Basic treadmill that gets the job done. Terribly designed for assembly!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 30, 2020
CommentsContent: This is a very basic treadmill that will get to a steep incline, and speed up to a pace that gets you to a moderate job. I and my wife are of average height and it's good enough for us. It is not for people are in good shape and want to do HIIT trainings, or want to get to sprints.Also, I have to say this is a terribly designed product for assembly. When delivered it has four basic parts:- running base- console- two (sturdy) metal legs to connect the base to the console...this should not require 2+ hours to assemble. However the treadmill is plagued with bad design which makes assembly a real pain. I assembled it, it wouldn't turn on and I had to partially disassemble to fix a disconnected power supply cable. Joining the base to the console requires used 3 different screws & washers for the same joining part with the metal legs, and the holes are in the most awkward places - all of which makes the assembly process unnecessarily frustrating and could have been avoided if designers had taken more care.ALSO, AS OTHERS HAVE POINTED OUT - YOU DO NOT NEED iFIT ACTIVATION TO USE THE TREADMILL. IT'S ALL FALSE ADVERTISING TO FORCE YOU INTO A TRIAL iFIT SUBSCRIPTION. TERRIBLE CUSTOMER CENTRIC DESIGN. PLEASE STOP NORDICTRACK....God help me if I have to call in for support.

CommentsTitle: Bastante satisfecho con el producto y su garantía.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 2, 2019
CommentsContent: Estoy muy contento con esta nueva adquisición para mi entrenamiento personal en casa. Es bastante cómoda y silenciosa al Momento de hacer los ejercicios. Me encanta el sistema iFit cardi q viene incluido con la Maquina porque tienen diferentes rutinas de ejercicio que te ayudan a ejercitarte de múltiples maneras. Actualmente estoy disfrutando del mes gratis de este programa y comienzo a pagarlo a partir del segundo mes, por lo que estoy aprovechandolo al máximo para decidir en ese período de prueba si realmente quiero quedarme con esta aplicación, lo cual si me gustaría porque es realmente impresionante. Al momento en que llegó el técnico a hacer la instalación de la máquina en mi casa, luego de desempacar el producto de la caja pudimos notar que la tapa que va encima del motor estaba dañada, pero esto pudo haber sucedido en el momento del envío, inmediatamente tome foto de esa parte e hice el reclamo directamente a la fabrica y ellos atendieron de inmediato mi reclamo y en tan solo dos dias me dieron respuesta de que ya la pieza había sido enviada a mi domicilio. Por lo que me da una gran satisfacción de poder contar con la garantía del producto de manera exitosa con esa gran atención al cliente de parte del personal profesional de Nordic Track. Me gusta la forma automática de inclinación que tiene, al momento de hacer los ejercicios si el programa escogido en la app tiene subidas y bajadas, así como incremento o disminución en la velocidad, todo se hace de forma automática. Puedo medir mi ritmo cardíaco colocando mis manos en la barra. Pude ubicarla sin problema en mi sala de estudio de frente al TV. Recomiendo este producto con la mayor satisfacción que tengo por haberlo adquirido.

CommentsContent: I bought this treadmill eleven months ago and have experienced nonstop issues with it. CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 5, 2020
CommentsContent: It took a little while (almost 3 hours) to get it set up but it was worth the effort. The feature I like most about it is; I can see the trainers walking ahead of me and if they go too fast, I can adjust the speed to my convenience. What I also like is the volume, I can turn the sound off or on. While off, I can watch TV without getting distracted. The areas which the trainers show around the world are very exciting and interesting to view. They show me places where I have never been but would like to visit. The free IFIT membership does wonders for me because they have training programs that suit every need, even live. PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: T 8.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 29, 2019
CommentsContent: Writing this 90 days after having this unit—  There are so many units to choose today all with plenty of features and capabilities.  To put this review in context, I have a gym membership and go four times a week and use their commercial equipment .  By far I am not a health nut or exercise fanatic .  I mostly go to stay in basic shape.  What I realized is I was spending the majority my time at the gym (and driving back and forth) just to hit the treadmill and bicycles for cardio.  So I opted to purchase this unit and a Schwinn cardio bike for home, both for less than $800.Happy with my choice, saves me time in the morning, kids use it, can just hop on it anytime.  That said if you’re looking for a solid treadmill that does most everything you need that feels very close to the weight and stature of a gym model this unit has really impressed me.  It’s heavy duty, belt is lighter than a gym model but still solid, cushions are just right for aggressive runs, deck it a good thickness (I weigh 195lbs) and it feels much like a commercial unit without the $2k and north price.  I would suggest that you not overspend and buy a unit tauting a bunch of bells and whistle‘s that you ultimately will not use.  The T6.5S has all of the core features every treadmill offers.  It has iFit, don’t use it, and solid program options to vary the work out.  What it lacks is a lot of hi-tech features that I personally think are what most of us really don’t use because we have better alternatives at home.  Example is Bluetooth.  No BT on this unit.  It has an 1/8th jack and speakers in the console.  To be honest no treadmill can out perform my little $150 Bose Sounddock mobile speaker or BT headphones connected to my phone.  So why pay for subpar audio equipment.  No cooling fan.  I use a far more functional Vornado fan when it gets warm that circulates air throughout the room.  I would have liked to have it Polar compatible so my pulse chest strap would feed the console.  I have to wear the watch.  Btw, the console is great, simple, easy to read and has several modes and rotations to monitor different aspects of your run.  Ok, so no complaints on this unit at all and I am pleased that it was extremely inexpensive.  Highly recommend for a near-commercial home unit.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Great Treadmill - delivered in great condition.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 21, 2018
CommentsContent: We had a very very old sears treadmill that didn't have any bells and whistles. We wanted something with programs and ability to incline - I love that it does this automatically. I went with this unit after doing a lot of research on different models and ultimately the warranty and brand name had something to do with our decision.The unit arrived by carrier and we paid for the extra so they would put it in our basement. Delivery service was very nice and professional. The unit arrived well packed and in great condition. It took about 2 hours to put together. Having a second person helped a lot - especially when attaching the bar to support for folding. I would suggest having a socket wrench to make the installation of bolts quicker and easier. I loved how the screws, bolts, washers and nuts came on a card with the step numbers, so when your looking in the manual to put together you look at what step your on (say step 4) and you look at the card for step 4 and there are the screws or bolts you need. I think we will be very pleased.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 7, 2020
CommentsContent: My husband and I gifted this to each other for our New Years resolution of getting healthy. I am in love with it. I searched high and low and did so much research to end up back here. It is affordable and does not feel cheap at all. Assembly takes 2 people no doubt about that. It is heavy so having the delivery people place it in the home and assemble is probably the best bet if you dont have any extra hands. I read all the negative reviews about iFit. First of all you can bypass it by holding the button down for 30 seconds. Second of all I would not use this without my iFit app. I LOVE IT! I do not work out I hate running so having an app that can control my workout keeps me motivated. Plus on days I dont want to run or climb I can do yoga or weight training with it. It’s $15/month. Cheaper than the gym member ship I wasted for 2 years and never went. The box was damaged upon delivery however the product inside was not. If you’re actually serious about using it, this is an amazing option. If not you’ll have an expensive place to hang your laundry.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 7, 2021
CommentsContent: This treadmill is great. Folds easily and it has a slow release when you let it down. Really like that. The belt is wide enough you don’t feel closed in and it is a smooth ride. The incline is amazing and the speed seems to be right on track to what I was doing outside. I love it!As for the iFit subscription. You do get a 30 free trial. But all you have to do is hold down the iFit button until it beeps and your on manual with 20 preset workouts or you can manually go from there as you prefer.Don’t hesitate. Buy it!  It’s wonderful!
