PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Unreliable quality and terrible customer service
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 9, 2020
CommentsContent: The treadmill worked ok a bit over 10 months (look, right before warranty expires), then the front puller started to produce some metal abrasive noise. Submitted a maintenance ticket to them. Apparently NordicTrack outsourced all their customer/maintenance services to ICON fitness and, well, the ICON service is TERRIBLE! (It's so terrible that I am willing to repeat it another 3 times: TERRIBLE! TERRIBLE! TERRIBLE!) The maintenance ticket was completely ignored for about 3 weeks. Then I finally had to follow up since my warranty was about to expire. Their phone call never worked. You get different phone numbers from different places (NordicTrack website, ICON website, maintenance ticket email), and none of them work. The automatic phone system just hold you for 30 minutes and hangs up. I had to contact them with online chat. Thanks god at least that worked after a 30 minutes wait, and there was one good (and the only time they were good) representative who helped me troubleshoot and ordered the replacement part. Then it was another 3 weeks of wait and I still don't have my part delivered. No correspondence at all in the mean time. I went to their website and entered my order number for tracking; the response was empty (404 not found). I had to go for online chat again to check the order status (with another 20 minutes wait), and after hearing my question the representative just said "your warranty expired so talk to another department with phone nuwber xxx-xxx-xxxx" and immediately cut my chat session (of course it expired thanks to the long wait!). I had to reconnect and said the order was made when I was covered under warranty, so he checked the order number and told me it's "in process". I asked about the problem on the website for order status checking, and he said "I don't know why it does not work for you" and cut the chat session again. Very awful experience chatting with this guy.My take: the product is probably worth the price if you can get it fixed to make up for its unreliability. But with the terrible service, I would strongly recommend against buying it because the likelihood of you either end up with an unusable treadmill or have to go through a terrible customer service is quite non-trivial.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 19, 2020
CommentsContent: Based solely on the assembly experience, I would recommend no one expect to assemble this themselves.  We encountered every possible problem.  Some screws the wrong size for the holes.  Openings were misaligned.  Several bolt sites were inaccessible, making it impossible to use ratchet sets or even conventional channel locks.  We had to leave out two screws altogether in the plastic holders alongside the display panel because there were no pilot holes in the receiving surface.  Worst of all, one of the bolt holes was blocked by a metal spur so that we had to ream out the hole using a homemade tool.  All of this took more than three hours and required us to devise makeshift tools to accomplish the assembly.  This item might prove to be functionally excellent, but it was extremely poorly engineered and shoddily manufactured.  We would never buy it again.  So why did we keep it?  Because there was no feasible way to return a 200+-pound item.

CommentsContent: The treadmill took some time to assemble but it's not ridiculously hard. Toward the end of assembling, it does help if you have one person to help you with attaching the monitor/controls and the folding mechanism. The free year of ifit is a great benefit and really is a $300+ value for a family membership. It makes exercising a lot more fun and interesting. I also like the larger screen size on this model. My friend has the previous model and the screen size on this model really makes a difference especially when using ifit.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: NordicTrack T 6.5 Si Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 10, 2019
CommentsContent: We have had this treadmill for 4 months now and we really like it. The box came pretty banged up but there wasn't anything wrong with any of the parts. A few days after we set it up and started using it, we noticed a loud squeak whenever it was stepped on, we contacted Nordic Track and their support team walked us through what could possibly be wrong. Turned out it was just a loose screw by the motor - an easy fix- but they were very nice and helpful as we tried to troubleshoot the problem.My wife uses this treadmill about every other day during our kids' nap time. She really likes it. It's pretty quiet for a treadmill and the ledge under the display screen is perfect for holding a phone or an iPad.Overall, if you're looking for something to run on during the winter months and don't want to spend an arm and a leg, this is a great purchase!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 15, 2020
CommentsContent: This is the best pandemic purchase ever!!!!! I am so happy with my treadmill and LOVE IFit!  It's amazing!  The only thing I don't like, why I didn't give it 5 stars, was the screen takes several minutes to turn on and get to the workouts.  It's VERY slow.  Although, I still need to register the machine and could probably call the manufacturer to see if it needs a new one or if I'm doing something wrong.  Pretty minor overall.Ps.  If you're debating over the 5 inch or 10 inch screen, like I did, go with the 10 inch!!!! I can't imagine how tiny the IFit training workouts would look like on a little screen.  You WANT big.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: NordicTrack T 6.5 Si Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 22, 2021
CommentsContent: Arrived broken. Large plastic piece on the bottom front has a crack in it nearly its entire length. One cup holder was broken. Side speaker piece broken. Wires broken and not attached so it wouldn’t turn on. Instead of sending it back my husband rewired it (luckily he’s great at that stuff) and it works perfectly fine now. I realize this probably voided the warranty. If everything wasn’t broken I’d give it 5 stars. It’s actually a great treadmill for the price. Maybe it’d be better to buy directly from the company instead of amazon.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 17, 2020
CommentsContent: I purchased this treadmill about a year ago and have been fairly happy with it, aside from two major issues.NordicTrack ships this unit in an unusable 'locked' state.  They will not unlock it until you sign up for a trial of their $15/mo iFit service.  If you forget to cancel within 30 days, they will bill the next year in full ($180) to your credit card.The treadmill worked properly for 9 months then stopped running.  Still under warranty, NordicTrack replaced the control board, but they took approximately 3 months to do so.Given the forced sale of their iFit product and the failure of the unit within the first year, I can't give this product more than two stars.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: BEAUTIFUL PIECE OF EQUIPMENT....HOWEVER YOU DO NOT NEED TO REGISTER TO ACTIVATE! SCAM!!!!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 30, 2021
CommentsContent: The delivery was horrible....truck took out both our drive way poles that indicate with a light to stay on driveway!  Then they did not ask me as I was downstairs and did not hear them so my 93 yr mother told them to leave it inside so we had to get it downstairs!  They should always ask for whom the delivery is for!  THEN IT SAYS WE HAD TO ACTIVATE IT AND SIGN UP FOR THE IFIT. WHICH IS A CREDIT CARD CHARGE OF $15 A MONTH UNLESS YOU CAN FIGURE OUT HOW TO CANCEL.  WE WERE ABLE TO BYPASS THIS SCAM BY READING PREVIOUS REVIEWS.  THE MACHINE FANTASTIC BUT NORDIC TRACK HAS SOME ISSUES.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Didn't work and Nordictrack won't resolve
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 26, 2020
CommentsContent: Just purchased from Nordictrack directly via Amazon. Received treadmill and has a defective roller. Treadmill doesn't work. 3 hours(no exaggeration) on hold and told there is NO GUARANTEE because I bought it through Amazon EVEN THOUGH THE SELLER WAS NORDICTRACK! Horrible company. Told me I can't return it and get a replacement. So I bought a 6 ft paperweight. Don't make my mistake.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 3, 2020
CommentsContent: Pain to assemble, but the instructions are actually quite good and all the bits and bobs you need are nicely packaged and labeled with the number of the step to use them at. I liked the organization. Follow the instructions exactly i.e. don’t tighten bolts until the instructions tell you to. For example, if you tighten the bolts at the bottom of the right and left uprights — which are the first things you put on —  it becomes impossible to attach the pulse crossbar later! So you have to go back and loosen the bolts so the upright poles are loose enough to wiggle back and forth and attach the crossbar to.All the complaints about the iFit “scam” are valid — it is quite misleading; but if you call the customer service number, a recorded message tells you to hold down the iFit key for 30 secs. If you go to iFit.com/activate, you can enter a garbage name and email, skip the credit card, then on the next screen they tell you to download an app — ignore that — just scroll down to the small print where they give you an option to activate without an app — click that. THEN they FINALLY tell you how to hold down the iFit button for 30 secs. Sheesh!However the most important thing — don’t forget to attach the red magnetic key before trying to activate the treadmill, otherwise it simply doesn’t start! The activation instructions on the secret web page do mention the key, but the printed assembly instructions don’t. It is obvious, but oops, I didn’t attach in the key and the darn thing simply wouldn’t activate. Glad I finally realized it before losing my mind!It’s a decent treadmill overall. My kids love it too. It’s fun to run on — I feel like I’m at the gym.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 22, 2021
CommentsContent: This is a great treadmill! It has the best features, Bluetooth (connects to IFit) foldable, not too complicated to assemble, and great price! The only con is it was a bit larger than I thought (my fault). We have a large IPad so a giant screen was not necessary. Really. Buy this. You will not regret it.And do yourself a favor and get the IFit membership. The family membership allows my three teens and I to walk, jog, exercise in beautiful locales. My daughter has explored castles in France, another has run around ancient forts in Portugal and I’ve walked the beaches in Hawaii then sat and meditated as the sun went down. We are all loving it!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 7, 2019
CommentsContent: In multiple places when you open the box this treadmill tells you that you need to register the product online to use it. Initially I was okay with this thinking that it was a warranty thing or something. However, this means giving your credit card information to a secondary site and agreeing to a subscription service which you will then have to cancel. Or not as they surely hope. After further research this is apparently not true even though packaging throughout the machine tells you this multiple times. Had I known that the machine came with such predatory practices built in I would have not bought it.It is rather overly complicated to assemble and that's coming from someone that is mechanically inclined. The packaging is frustrating and there's more tape than you can imagine. Bolts are odd sizes that don't snugly fit quality wrenches and that's not confidence inspiring.It does not stand straight up when folded and the mechanism that holds it up feels flimsy.Again I cannot overstate my disappointment with the machine in the sense that it demands that you register for a paid subscription service to even be able to use the machine at all. The machine that you've spent a lot of money on. And although this is apparently a lie and there's a workaround that seems to make it worse considering the instructions DEMAND you to register. This coupled with a rather complicated assembly and so so operation gives you a disappointing product.I am very unhappy with this purchase and I will not consider a Nordictrack in the future.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 7, 2020
CommentsContent: Great treadmill. We purchased during quarantine and have been very happy with it.  The only think I recommend is not paying the extra money to have it brought into the home, they dropped it in my garage and I have yet to get my refund we paid for the extra service.  We just took piece by piece to location.  But over all exactly what we needed
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 24, 2020
CommentsContent: This treadmill far exceeds my expectations, especially for this price range. The flexing frame significantly reduces stress on my knees and shins. The programming flexibility is awesome and allows me to customize my runs just the way I want them. Quiet and smooth.  We hsvexrhisxon our second story and I do not hear it running on our first floor when family members use it.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 24, 2020
CommentsContent: so ive waited about 7months to review  to give you all a good idea. For the money this treadmill is awesome it has held  up well and that says alot being that i am 6'3 and 250lbs the deck could be a little bigger but for easy of storage its great. My only  gripe  is you have to set it up and the  stupid fitness app it trys to make you download is a pain
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Nice treadmill for price easy to avoid registering for iFit
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 13, 2021
CommentsContent: I purchased this treadmill after reading reviews and seeing most of the infrequent complaints were about registering for iFit. I had it assembled and was happy with service. Read about holding iFit logo button for 30 seconds to avoid registering for iFit and worked like a charm no problems. I’ve used it 4 times now and have been happy with operation. Treadmill is solid and quiet works smoothly and folds easily. Beware that as far as I can tell if you want to use Bluetooth with speakers you need to go thru iFit. Purchase a 3.5 mm male to male audio cable to get around this, easy fix. Didn’t give 5 stars because time always determines how happy I am with any product. Will update later.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 17, 2021
CommentsContent: I read all the reviews and - getting past those about the fitness membership - I decided it sounded good enough to give a try. Unpacking it, my heart sank a little - it seemed kind of cheap and flimsy! We set it up per the instructions (which were a tiny bit more complicated than maybe they could have been), disabled the fitness membership (as the other reviewers recommended), and I hopped on. I couldn’t believe that I was on a treadmill in my own home because it felt JUST LIKE the ones I’m accustomed to at the gym. I got the less-expensive model, so it doesn’t have the fancy display (or a fan), but the deck is solid and flexible just like those treadmills that are 3x the price. To combat the lack of fancy display I mounted an extra tv on the wall in front of it and plugged in a FireStick so I could access virtual running videos on YouTube. Many mornings I now run on Waikiki beach or the Golden Gate Bridge! Oh, and I set up a small fan in front of the treadmill to simulate those ocean breezes. This thing has been a lifesaver this winter helping me keep up the mileage when temps have been lower than ideal. Just for reference, I’m a slightly better-than-average runner (9-ish minute miles, about 20 miles a week) - and this treadmill has been PERFECT. Trust and believe: there are still good deals out there! :-)
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: As advertised, works great, the iFit is actually pretty engaging
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 4, 2020
CommentsContent: All in all, this is a great treadmill. I have zero complaints. I did a lot of research prior to the purchase and I get that there are better treadmills out there, quieter, stronger motor, etc, but for the price and what you get, it's a great buy. Unless you're specifically looking for something that this treadmill doesn't have, this treadmill is more than enough for most people.The year of free iFit is great. I thought it would be an afterthought, videos and whatnot seemed like they wouldn't be for me, but when you're actually doing a guided run/hike, it's pretty great. The treadmill automatically adjusting speed and incline based on the video is so awesome.My wife and I are probably 100+ miles in, and the treadmill is working great, zero complaints, definitely recommend.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: T 8.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 7, 2020
CommentsContent: We purchased this product as a result of COVID-19 and being stuck at home with minimal activity. It is the perfect size, not too bulky and quality-made. What I liked most about this model is the 10 inch screen for the lower price. One thing I wish I knew prior to setting it up though, is that you need a strong internet connection for it to work. When first assembled and turned on, the screen was stuck on the iFit triangle logo. To fix the issue, perform a factory reset according to the manual. This is done by inserting a paperclip into the tiny hole at the top of the machine while another person flips the switch from off to reset. Once we did that and connected to a stronger WiFi, the product worked like GOLD!! I love the iFit feature, it keeps me entertained and inspired during my workout. Awesome treadmill.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: NordicTrack T 6.5 Si Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 4, 2019
CommentsContent: The Good: Great treadmill, easy assembly. Solid, works great. Great treadmill for the price. If not for the iFit membership, I'd happily give 5 stars.The bad: You have to create an iFit account to turn it on. I then had to call to figure out how to run the treadmill without the iFit membership.  (Push and hold down the iFit button for 15 seconds)The ugly: Nordic track called me a few days later and offered me an extended warranty if I create a positive review. They also offered to cancel my iFIT membership and at the end of the call, they confirmed my membership was canceled. A few weeks later, my credit card was billed for the iFit membership.  Now I have to call them again and try to get the charge reversed!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Serves it's purpose well... but dealing with NordicTrack will send me elsewhere on my next purchase.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 15, 2020
CommentsContent: Most frustrating part of the purchase is having to deal with NordicTrack to get this device initialized and up and running.If I had known about having to give them personal information including a credit card just to make this machine active I certainly would have looked else where.  You have to sign up for their iFit program in order to get your treadmill to work then you you have to cancel iFit prior to your 30 day free trial.... They make it easy to sign up but MUCH MUCH MORE difficult to cancel your subscription.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: A bit noisy, but overall great machine
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 9, 2019
CommentsContent: I was surprised at how easy the assembly was. I am 5'4 and put the entire machine together by myself. I recommend putting the standing bar at the bottom on first instead of waiting until the end. The machine can easily be flipped to the side to put it on. This process is just easier before putting on the arms of the machine, especially if you are doing it alone.Overall the machine is sturdy and the free membership to IFIT adds value. The screen is big and crystal clear.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: NordicTrack T 6.5 Si Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 2, 2019
CommentsContent: I purchased this treadmill in July 2016 and have been using it regularly for three years.  I am a consistent runner and use this treadmill two - three times per week for most of the year. I prefer to be outside, but when I can't run outside, this treadmill does the trick. It is a sturdy, strong work horse. I run between 5.5 - 9 miles per hour for endurance, interval training and speed work (up to an hour-ish per session) and have found no issues with the machine. Changing speed and inclines is simple and quick. Set up was fairly easy but it did take two people. My husband and I assembled it ourselves, with a minimum number of bad words. No, this treadmill is not as "soft" as commercial versions, but it is very serviceable.  If you are looking for a well-built, workable treadmill, this one will be perfect.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 12, 2021
CommentsContent: After finally getting it professionally assembled, I love it.  It’s user friendly, ease to walk on and definitely beats walking outside in the cold and/or rainy weather.  It also does an excellent job keeping track of your workout.  I have not tried the iFit program or other features as I only wanted it for indoor walking.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 18, 2020
CommentsContent: I purchased this treadmill because I'm not comfortable going to the gym anymore due to the pandemic. As a Type 1 diabetic with other health conditions that place me in the "high risk" category, I just can't risk it. So, I turned my third bedroom into an in-home gym with an elliptical, treadmill, and weights. This particular NordikTrack model (around $800) was steeply discounted as the newer version (around $1,200) recently came out. This is a substantial machine. Not the least bit flimsy or cheap feeling. I can't speak to the ease or difficulty of assembly as I hired someone to put it together for me, but the treadmill arrived in perfect condition (no cracks, dents, or scratches) and functions like a dream. Thanks to the reviews I read before making my purchase, I was able to bypass the iFit registration frustration others warned about. It's true; if you hold the iFit button for 30 seconds, you can bypass the iFit registration trap and immediately begin using your treadmill. Overall, I am very pleased with this purchase! This treadmill is well worth the money.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 22, 2020
CommentsContent: My husband told me I was crazy to buy a treadmill. He said I would never use it. He was wrong. It gets used almost every day. (even on nice weather days, we run outside and inside). This treadmill came with the iFit membership for a year in which 5 people can be on the account and create their own file, selecting their own workouts. Training with an iFit trainer is so fun. My 12 year old is using it as well training to get his time shorter on his next real live 5K. The treadmill works well following the trainers in speed and incline. It has a 10% incline. It is easy to assemble as my 12 year old and I (a 53 year old woman) put it together ourselves. Easy to fold, but we don't really fold it because we use it so often. Getting it when I did at 40% off, free financing with Amazon credit card, and Prime delivery it was an overall win for us!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: NordicTrack T 6.5 Si Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 24, 2020
CommentsContent: We've had this tread for a few months now and are really happy our purchase. The machine itself is quite compact for storage purposes and very easy to fold and unfold. I prefer running outside but between really hot summers and snow in the winter, having a place to run indoors during those times is great (very much looking forward to using this winter). I particularly like the incline/speed buttons! I think as far as home compact treads go, this is one of the best options out there!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Just the thing we needed to get our morning exercise
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 16, 2020
CommentsContent: I wasn't really sure that we would use a treadmill, but knew with the weather turning hot and humid it would be better than walking outside.  But, we use it almost every day;  especially with the Covid virus closing down our recreation centers.  Now we can walk and get our exercise while listening to music piped through the speakers or listening to the radio.  This machine seems to be holding up very well.  I had one slight problem, which will occur eventually — the belt eventually moved slightly.  One quick email and I got a prompt response with instructions on a simple fix.  I would definitely purchase a Nordic Track again if ever the need occurs.  But, this one will probably last a long time!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 5, 2020
CommentsContent: We had our treadmill for over a month now and we can honestly say it’s a good machine. It was a little hard to assemble by yourself and needed two people to help lift the machine out of the box and hold up the control panel.The machine runs smoothly from slow to fast. The only issue we had is a clicking sound when you just sped up and activate the incline. But as long as we don’t do both back to back, it’s fine.I use it for speed walking, hubby uses it for full on running. The delivery was simple and they came and delivered it into my room of choice for free.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2021
CommentsContent: I really like the treadmill as it has multiple different features you can use to exercise. I mainly use it to run and I like how it keeps track of my stats so that I know what I've accomplished. My wife likes to use it to walk whenever we aren't able to go outside due to the weather. She enjoys the incline feature as it is realistic for us living in Arizona. Overall the treadmill was a great buy especially with the COVID pandemic and working at home.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Works great! DOESN'T fold up worth a dam, so not for you if you want a fold up one for space!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 3, 2020
CommentsContent: Delivery was by third party with only 1 person when it's HUGE so wasn't handled properly and box was tore UP! Good thing packing insulation kept from most damage. Couple scratches on bottom  frame, nothing major.Also, nordick TRY'S to make you think that your treadmill  is locked with a big red sticker of warning saying it will not start UNTIL you go to .com/activate where it's just to make you pay for a subscription for a bunch  of programs through them, which  is fine if you  want them. But  if NOT just  press and hold the  iFIT button for 10 seconds and it will unlock and be ready  to go without  having to pay ANYTHING!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 30, 2020
CommentsContent: I was looking for a treadmill to run on as gyms were closed and to avoid people outside during these unusual times. I was expecting a decent treadmill, but my expectations have been exceeded with this treadmill.The treadmill was delivered into my garage and I assembled it in about three hours. I only needed help from my son to hold it in the folded up position as I installed the pole that keeps it up.  I did take some time making sure it was level, as my floor is not. The rear legs adjust out to adjust the rear height of the deck. The running mat did not need adjustment as it ran centered and does not slip.I'm a fairly experienced runner, and was in the middle of training for a marathon which of course is now cancelled. I'm now running about 25 miles a week on this treadmill, and about 25 outside in the course of a week. What has surprised me is how much I love iFit. There are an endless variety of instructor lead workouts as well as the ability to create your own maps anywhere in the world. It really does take the boredom out of treadmill running and by creating a schedule for the week, makes you accountable to finish them. I just completed the Boston marathon series which was broken down into five runs, each of 5-6 miles. Really enjoyable and I let iFit do the pacing and incline as it seemed just right to me.... challenging without being impossible. I also like the onboard fan - really works  well. Speakers are not great, but quite sufficient.Because of that, I wish I had spent $300 more and got the 10" screen instead of the 7". It would be totally worth it with the incredible iFit content.Negatives other than screen size - the HR sensors on the grip handles are woefully inaccurate, but not a big deal for me since I have my own HR monitors that sync with the treadmill. No downhill incline on this model, not something I ever thought I would have wanted, but lots of iFit workouts have downhill sections.In summary, I'm very happy with the $1099 price for this, but now wish had bought the next model up for a larger screen.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 7 InchesStyle Name: T 7.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsTitle: Excellent Treadmill with a few imperfections
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 21, 2020
CommentsContent: In full transparency, I have been offered a treadmill accessory by ICON Fitness to write a positive review, however everything I am writing below is 100% authentic and accurate.The positives:This treadmill is high tech and works beautifully for everything I want to use it for. We use it in our home and it is amazing for walking and running both inclined and flat. It comes with a year of iFit membership which includes video workouts for both running and walking, and while I haven't used them yet, they are easy to access and the treadmill tracks my weight, workouts, and calories burned for all past workouts. I have even sprinted on the treadmill and it works flawlessly (and I am over 200 pounds).The 2 drawbacks to my experience with the treadmill are:1) When I first used the treadmill the belt would "stick" a little when I walked. After over an hour of troubleshooting on the phone I was told that the belt wasn't properly lubricated at the factory and that I would have to pay to buy their specific lubricant from NordicTrack (you are not allowed to use silicon based lubricants, which is EVERY SINGLE lubricant on the market). This seemed wrong to me. If the factory didn't properly lubricate the belt, I don't understand why I am now obligated to fix that problem by spending more money with the manufacturer. I was assured over the phone that there was no way around this and it was now my problem to fix.2) As cool as the digital screen is, there have been a small handful of times when I have turned on the treadmill and the software failed to load and I could not start the treadmill, even by pushing the manual start buttons. I was forced to shut it down and power it up again in order to get it to start. I worry about what happens if eventually the screen doesn't load and there is no way to start the treadmill. I would have been just as happy without the screen and the software, like the treadmills at the gym where you just press "start" and the belt starts. There is an upside to the bells and whistles, but I worry that some day there will also be a downside.That being said, the machine works beautifully and I am happy with my purchase.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 7 InchesStyle Name: T 7.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 22, 2020
CommentsContent: When I received this product, after assembly, I could not use "my" machine! For it was locked by the manufacturer. To unlock, I was instructed to go to a web site, once on the web site, I was given no choice to unlock or register, instead I was forced to enroll in an exercise program (which was advertised to be free for a month), but alas like all fly-by-night businesses they demanded my credit card number! Which I refused to do, I did not want such a valueless service. So I tried the numbers provided in the manual, and assembly instructions, also went to the internet under "Nordictrack" for more numbers. In one of the numbers, they told me the process to unlock the machine with out having to establish an IFIT account, that worked. All was well, until my console component had a defective finish, it worked well but looked bad. So I tried to contact Nordictrack and not IFIT for resolution of my defective product, at the end of days of fruitless attempts they all ended that in order to receive any service one has to have an IFIT account! I went back to Amazon for assistance, I can tell you that Amazon has an exceptional customer service staff, unlike the non existent Nordictrack, Amazon had difficulty getting them to contact me and wound up giving me a rebate on the machine. From here on, I will never buy another Nordictrack product, especially that now I know there is no support unless you pay for a valueless service (sure the first month free, but by the second wham you get hit because  you forgot to cancel it)
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 9, 2020
CommentsContent: Do not buy a Nordictrack.  They forced us to sign up for “iFit” at $30 a month just to use the damn treadmill we paid $$ for.  We are furious. CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 5, 2020
CommentsContent: We had technician Robert set this up, which was a super experience.I love the features of creating your own walk/run using Google Maps on the IFIT app.  Didn't take long to get the hang of how to design the walk of your dreams and I have been visiting various neighborhoods in Paris each day.  The treadmill itself works perfectly and I feel 1000% better getting in some exercise.Contrary to a few negative reviews you DON"T have to enroll in  IFIT  if you just want to do your own workouts, but the first year was free anyhow. The only issue I had was the belt was rubbing which created a irritating noise. The tech came back the next day and  adjusted the belt and now it runs smoothly. I love love the IFIT option and will continue to use it after the 1 year subscription is up. Overall it adds to my home gym and I couldn't be more satisifed!!!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: NordicTrack T 6.5 Si Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsTitle: Good product, bad shipping, tough setup
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 10, 2021
CommentsContent: I purchased this and scheduled a specific delivery date because i could be home, it was delivered early when no one was home leaving an expensive piece of equipment unattended for hours, fortunately it wasn’t stolen. But when i arrived home the packaging was in tatters, it was clear that the moving company utilized to ship it had literally thrown it around, boards inserted for support were completely broken, and sticking out the bottom of the package. Fortunately upon inspection of the item the only damage the treadmill itself had incurred was a small crack on the bottom casing that seems to be purely cosmetic in nature.Assembling was another monster, this is a two person job. And while the instructions all call for a 3/8ths ratchet every bolt included is actually a 9/16ths so make sure to have that unusual size handy.Then you have to activate your own property through an app you’ll have to download and it will keep trying to get you to sign up for their monthly service rather than actually activating the treadmill so that is a problem in and of itself.Once you get it up and running though it does work very well, and you can fold it single handed to reduce the area it’s taking up while not in use.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsContent: I haven’t used it much but the few times it’s been in use, it has functioned fine.  So, I am grateful. Pressing the foot pedal to lay down or raise up, is really easy, even with aching body parts. Incline goes to 10.0 with only point is that there’s a crackling sound like there’s something inside in it way.  But I’ve notice the conveyor belt is slightly off to the side.  I wasn’t here during install and it never bothered me until I tried to put it on 10 incline without loud music in my ear. When not in use, I’ve stored it upright and it’s collected dust (lol), if/when it wasn’t covered by the treadmill cover.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 13, 2020
CommentsContent: I have been using this everyday since we assembled the treadmill.  I recently had hip replacement surgery and with COVID and temps over 110 I have not been able to get the workout therapy needed to build up strength in my hips. PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 25, 2020
CommentsContent: Purchased this a month ago and love it!I used to go to the gym daily, but due to Covid, I haven't been back since February. I started to run and walk outside, but the concrete was starting to do a number on me. I'm still not ready to venture back to the gym to use their treadmills, so I decided to get something for home.I did a lot of research on treadmills and finally decided that this was the one.NordicTrack is a name you can trust and they make a very sound and quality product. This unit also has a very impressive manufactures warranty. This treadmill is great for the price, especially if you compare the features to other treadmills in this price range and below.Lower price treadmills had two features that turned me off. First, was the width of the belt. Seems that lower priced treadmills had a 16" wide belt or less. That made me concernned that my arms were going to hit the support bars. This treadmill has a 20" wide belt with plenty of room to feel comfortable with either running or walking. The other issue that cheaper treadmills had were that their incline levels were manual. So before you ran, you had to physically lift the treadmill up and adjust the incline, which were usually 3 levels, and those levels did not provide an adequate incline. This treadmill has an electric generated incline with 10 levels and that is a far better option. It also has 10 speeds, which at this price level, is pretty impressive.Assembly took over three hours. There are videos on YouTube that help walk you through the process and are very helpful. Some of the screws did not fit, but eventually got them to fit. I assembled this by myself. Having two people helps, but you can do it with one person. Worst part was the very last part installing the hydraulic arm. Just use a chair to hold up the belt and rollers and you should be fine.Make sure you maintenance the belt and rollers with silicon, which can be found for purchase on Amazon. The more you use it, the more friction is going to affect the belt. Needs to be lubricated every few months. Not expensive.Only complaint is the display is a bit bright and bare bones. And like most people havd said,the subscrition to iFit seems fishy, but that can easily be bipassed by holding the iFit button for 10 seconds.Are the treadmills at the gym better? Yes, but they also cost thousands of dollars. And this treadmill does not feel cheap or inferior to those you would find at a gym. While running, its almost impossible to tell the difference. If you miss the feeling of running or walking on treadmills at the gym, this is what you need.I would definitely recommend buying this. No regrets, except wish I would have purchased it sooner.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Don’t buy, I didn’t listen to the reviews and now I’m regretful!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 20, 2020
CommentsContent: The set up drives me insane! I just want to get on the flipping treadmill and run. You have to wait forever for the screen to load and then it doesn’t pick up the internet and then you have to continue without wifi. The actual treadmill, once you finally get it to where you can keep track of the laps and the time, isn’t so terrible physically.  I think I’ve discovered I would rather have something simple. I’ve caught myself wanting to punch the screen a couple of times because I can’t believe I’ve made this purchase. I would not suggest buying this if you just want to hop on and go because believe me you will get tired of it quickly. The loading process is just terrible. If you have to have the fancy screen which sucks and you want to attempt for the wifi to pick up then sure.

PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 2, 2020
CommentsContent: Assemble - it was a little difficult to align the holes with the screws and to tighten it up.Folding - it is easy to fold up but tricky to unfold because of the area where you need to “step” on to release.We have this treadmill in front of our sliding door looking outdoors. Being it Atlanta, the weather can get too hot and pollen count high. The incline and speed is like your “normal” treadmill at the gym.We decided to do the iFit subscription and the synchronization from the app to the treadmill is great. I would recommend this subscription along with the product to enhance your workout.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 29, 2020
CommentsContent: I did a lot of research before I selected this treadmill. I didn't want to spend a lot, but wanted a treadmill with at least a 20" X 50" walking/running surface. This one works well for me with a 20" X 55" surface.The treadmill arrived quickly but had several broken plastic pieces (side rail and associated parts, parts of the motor hood, and the base under the motor/belt drive). This is a very heavy item, but I think the packaging could be improved to help prevent damage on the sides and corners, which is where most of the damage to my treadmill occurred.I was able to order the broken parts within and hour and a half of delivery. It took 30-45 minutes to get the Icon Fitness customer service rep on the phone but once I did she was courteous and very helpful. The parts were delivered free.I assembled as much of the treadmill as I could while waiting on the replacement parts. The assembly instructions were very good and I only needed assistance with another person when installing the lift assist cylinder. It took me no more than an hour and a half to assemble. I like that the parts/screws/hardware was packaged with their part numbers and corresponded to the assembly steps in the instructions.My replacement parts arrived in three separate shipments which ultimately took a month to get all of them. I was able to begin using the treadmill after the second shipment of parts arrived.Startup was easy with the hints given by others to bypass Ifit.I have the 5 inch screen and it is perfectly fine. There are 20 workouts (5 each for calorie, intensity, incline, and speed). The speed and incline are controlled by the treadmill during the workout but you can override them to suit you or just make all settings in a manual mode. The incline is working well and can really make you work harder during your workout.I wish the warranty were a bit better on the motor which is why I did not give the treadmill 5 stars. There are other similarly priced treadmills with better motor warranties.But overall I think this is a very nice treadmill. I was able to get it at a very good price. If you ae considering it I suggest checking the price on Amazon each day and waiting for a sale.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Amazing machine, but interferes with wireless headphones.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 31, 2019
CommentsContent: The treadmill is amazing! But one thing you should know is that if you plan on using it with bluetooth headphones(completely wireless) you won't be able to. I have the jabra elite 65t active and I bought them just to use them while I workout. But when I use them on this treadmill, it interferes with my headphones and I just hear static the whole time. I found out it does it with almost all types of bluetooth headphones that are completely wireless. So that's something to keep in mind, wired headphones work fine, but completely wireless will mess your ears up and won't be able to hear your music comfortably. Also, keep the pulse reader clean, it seems to be some cheap metal that gets rusty fast. The speakers on the treadmill are bad, don't even think about using them for music. Lol. Other than that The machine is amazing though, highly recommend it.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Worst buy I’ve made on Amazon
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 6, 2021
CommentsContent: This treadmill is by far the worst thing I’ve ever bought on Amazon. The treadmill never functioned properly and was even scuffed up (plastic motor cover) like it was a refurbished product though I bought brand new. The belt skipped so bad my husband almost hurt himself attempting to run on it. Icon fitness refused to send a replacement machine and only offered fixes like “let’s try having you lube it.” They finally agreed to replace a part after my second or third call on hold for hours. The part never arrived. When I talked with a rep I was told the past was in “quality control.”Thankfully, Amazon customer service was awesome and agreed to take the treadmill back despite being past their return policy.I don’t know why this piece of junk is Amazons top pick, but I’d imagine it has more to do with a contract then people actually rating this treadmill 5 stars.Do not buy this treadmill. I repeat DO NOT BUY THIS TREADMILL!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Great machine for a reasonable cost
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 5, 2020
CommentsContent: Overall the treadmill was easy to assemble.  I did it by myself after we got the pieces moved to the  basement.  The platform part is quite heavy and I had to have help with that (I'm a 64 y.o. woman).  Once I got it 90% assembled I quit.  I cannot move it anywhere else and folding it up is unnecessary so I did not do that part.  It works very well and is very enjoyable to use.  I have never used any other treadmills, so I can't compare it.  It came with the iFit membership which I didn't like and won't use, but it isn't required just to use the unit.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 22, 2019
CommentsContent: This treadmill is everything I was expecting it to be and more!Not only it runs smooth and it's very quiet, it also has an enormous variety of workouts pre-loaded and great videos of runs in different locations that will make time pass fast even when you're working out at home and we all know how boring that can get.It also comes with a free 1-year membership to iFit which for a fitness committed person is a great perk!I was reluctant at the idea of buying a TM because I hate not running outside but I've had a lot of fun on this machine and I think we'll be friends for many years to come :-)
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: NordicTrack T 6.5 Si Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 16, 2020
CommentsContent: This is a nice treadmill.  It is basic with no bells and whistles.  It is not blue tooth compatible unless you buy the Ifit plan, but that is not a big deal for us.  There is no fan, which is also not a big deal for us.  We chose to pay to have it assembled and the assembly team arrived timely and were very nice.  They didn't try to sell us on the Ifit plan, they simply told us to hold the Ifit button down for 30 seconds and the treadmill would work.  We have used it a lot and we like the 20" belt as opposed to a smaller one.  Very satisfied with the treadmill.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: treadmill locked till you call ifit.com!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 18, 2021
CommentsContent: I am a fit female and it took 3 people to set this up and 5 hours!  After set up, machine was locked until you subscribed to minimum $15.00/month program. That is the push, don't fall for it. Push and hold bluetooth button for 30 seconds and it will unlock. Had to get a customer service to tell me this.  A bit of a scam if you ask me!!! Not too happy with the thickness of belt, seems flimsy. Not impressed with Nordictrac for $1100.00!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 14, 2019
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   This treadmill is great.  I got free assembly from Amazon.  I was able to start it manually just by holding the iFit button for 30 seconds.  I didn't have to create an account.The floor is firm, yet has a nice cushion to absorb pressure when running.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: You do NOT need to register with iFit.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 30, 2020
CommentsContent: 3 STARS for misleading packaging disclaimers re: iFit. Treadmill arrived today, assembly instructions well written, straightforward. No real time spent on it yet, so cannot attest to overall quality (will review after time), but seems very solid for an entry level treadmill from a reputable company. THAT BEING SAID: There are MULTIPLE disclaimers on packaging indicating unit will NOT function until you register/sign up for an iFit plan. THIS IS MISLEADING/FALSE. TO BYPASS: Once assembled, power on unit>HOLD iFit logo on front panel DOWN for appx. 20-30 sec. This bypasses any need to register unnecessarily, and unit will function as intended. Again, the packaging would lead you to believe you MUST register with iFit. This is misleading and incorrect. Unusual that NordicTrack, a company with a very solid reputation would do this without informing consumer.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Does what it’s meant to do
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 21, 2021
CommentsContent: This treadmill is a fine purchase. Don’t bother paying for additional shipping options. We paid to have it delivered to the room of our choice and got it left at our door. Amazon would not refund our money. That aside the machine does the trick. Not a lot of bells and whistles but provides a smooth run. I’ve had it up past 9mph with no problems. We also bypassed the iFit program by calling the number on the treadmill and saying we didn’t have internet access. My only complaint is that once you center the belt it moves with use and becomes off center. You just have to adjust it every so often, not terrible. Overall, pleased with the purchase. Does the trick when the weather is bad and I don’t want to run outside.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2021
CommentsContent: very poor customer support. shortly after purchasing I one day started to hear a squeaking sound. customer service refused to send a tech to look at it even though it's under warranty.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 22, 2020
CommentsContent: I got my treadmill in about 2 weeks before I broke my hand. Thankfully it is so easy to fold that i can do that with 1 hand! As for ifit, I have never found a program that makes me so engaged as the ifit app does. I don't even care to try to figure out how to use the machine without the app because there are so many places to explore and so many talented and knowledgeable trainers that keep me 100% engaged. I love being able to do a work out and then get so wrapped up in learning about the geology, history, and views of foreign countries and cities that all of a sudden the work out is done! I am currently doing the Iberian Beginner Running Series with Tommy Rivers Puzey and i can't recommend his program enough!The machine is nice and stable and I have had very minimal glitches with it. Mostly, it occasionally doesn't want to start the video right away and I have to close the app and reopen it. NBD.Very satisfied, very much worth the price.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 19, 2020
CommentsContent: For the amount spent on this treadmill I feel like their should be a little more into it. It was heavy and a little annoying to put together as expected but the plastic and some parts feel too flexible/ flimsy you’d think it would be strong heavy duty plastic. Although once together it feels a little more sturdy. I really wish it was a little more tech advanced like with Bluetooth enable and able to have apps like YouTube. It’s a little loud too while warm up walking but once running it’s not too annoying. I really like this treadmill but I think they over priced it a couple hundred.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: NordicTrack T 6.5 Si Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsTitle: Great Sturdy Treadmill Is Easy To Assemble/Store/Use
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 7, 2020
CommentsContent: I was looking for a treadmill that I would actually use not just as a clothes hanger, and I quickly realized the cheaper options were not going to cut it. I came across this model, and the description sounded perfect to me. Wide belt, automatic incline, easy assembly, free delivery, and hydraulic-assisted unfolding! The motor is quiet, and powerful enough for my needs (speed 6/10:00 miles), although I can take it up to speed 10. Customer service is great, as I already used them soon after my delivery. The hood cover broke during shipment/storage, and I called to see about a replacement. Both Amazon and Nordic Track were on top of it, and they shipped out a cover within a few days free of charge. One complaint is the display is a little hard to read if the lights are not bright enough. Sure you can read the time and distance, but if you want to change speed or incline, I have to really look hard. The other complaint is that with this kind of money spent on a treadmill, they couldn't even add a charging port for my phone. SMH. Great treadmill otherwise. Would buy it again.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 18, 2020
CommentsContent: I’m giving this three stars due to several factors.One of the screws included in the assembly packet was a defective screw. Once the product was assembled it was still not very sturdy and it also was not level.  The process to get the machine activated and to use it without iFit is a headache.I wouldn’t reccomend it but if you do go with this treadmill be sure to pay the extra for expert assembly to save you the headache. Also be aware of the hoops you have to jump through to activate and then deactivate iFit if you are not interested in a monthly premium workout program.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 22, 2020
CommentsContent: Just got this machine yesterday. Assembly was relatively easy, and the machine itself runs smoothly. The major issue is with start up. Nordictrack wants you to sign up for its ifit service, which is $15 a month. My wife used it first and the treadmill easily paired to her phone. She was able to start up the machine and take off after just a few minutes. I went next and had a completely different experience. I downloaded the same app, but my screen looked completely different than hers. I also wasn’t able to pair until my wife disconnected from it first. Even paired to the machine I could not get it to start.I went online to try and troubleshoot and Nordictrack’s website which indicated that something Was wrong with equipment and needed to replaced. Fortunately, my wife found on a review that if you hold down the ifit button for 20 secs the ifit system eventually shuts off. This is indicated by the light turning from blue to green. Once that happens the machine works exactly as it should.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 2, 2020
CommentsContent: I've been a runner for 10+ year but I admit that running in high hear, bitter cold or heavy cold rain is not my thing. I was looking for a treadmill that won't break my budget and helps me keep going. A friend got this one and highly recommended it so I bought it. Best decision ever. My significant other installed it in an afternoon. We have been using it for the last 3 months regularly. He's mostly power-walking but I'm running, hiking, you name it. The IFit app keeps me entertained and gives me the opportunity to virtually travel to places where I only dream to go while I train. Highly recommended.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 17, 2020
CommentsContent: It has been about 2 months since I've been using this nordictrack treadmill, so far so good. I like the folding technique as it is fairly easy to store when not in use. It runs smoothly and the incline is a nice touch. The only downfall would be the set-up process. It took me a couple of hours to setup but if I had someone else helping me it would of taken less time. Overall, a pretty nice product.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: T 8.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

If it wasn't so large and already assembled, it would have been returned. I can't blame Nordicktrak. It was probably damaged in shipment. They do have our money, and I am still walking outside.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Their support is terrible and you must do all maintenance yourself
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 28, 2020
CommentsContent: Do not order a NordicTrack unless you are prepared to do all the work on it yourself.  My belt wasn't adjusted properly on install. You have to disassemble the whole Treadmill to do this.If you are an expert Treadmill technician then go for it.  Otherwise do not purchase a NordicTrack.

CommentsTitle: A COMPLETE pain to put together
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 21, 2020
CommentsContent: An extreme hassle to put together, takes way longer than expected and not too many of the pieces/holes actually line up. Not all the told are included. Instructions get a little iffy. DO NOT toss any of the screws they tell you too until you are completely finished. (You will be asked to reuse some of them later on, I always keep mine just in case). Theres an additional wire on the base part of the treadmill and the screen that is not listed anywhere in the instructions or online. Do we connect this? Or not? Also weighs 250 pounds so I'd pay someone to deliver it and bring it in. Will take two people to put together (someone you trust and can politely feud with over the idiotic design of how to put this together). Not everything is tight and not all screws will go in. I would start with step 16/17 first as it has to do with the bottom on the treadmill. They want you to put the entire thing together AND THEN put the bar in on the bottom that holds it upright for its store away design. Don't be fooled, someone will have to manually hold it up as someone fenagles the putting together of the bar set up. It isn't fun. It's heavy and arduous.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 7 InchesStyle Name: T 7.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsTitle: Nice when it works but... Stopped working after a month
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 18, 2020
CommentsContent: I purchased this treadmill to use during the winter months, given that gyms are closed. The treadmill is great when it works. Nordic track customer service was unable to help and directed to me to a third party called ifit who determined I probably needed an entirely new console. The console will take 2-3 weeks to get here, and they did not guarantee it will work. The treadmill will not turn on at all. This means that after 35 days of owning a treadmill which I used maybe 10 times, I already cannot use the treadmill. Will update if there is any improvement with new console.

CommentsContent: The assembly was a pain. When I got to the upper part of the treadmill the pulse bar would not align with the uprights. I tried hard to make it match but it was impossible. After 1 hour of trying to align everything, I found out that is was a part error and I was given two identical handle bars. I had two cheap proform treadmills over 10 years. with no problems. I upgraded to a better brand, just two find out that Nordic Track does not know how to include the correct parts for their treadmills in the factory. Very Disappointing!!!! I called support but they don't work on Saturdays, of course! Stay clear of this sloppy company.

CommentsTitle: Broke down in a month and customer service very poor

I guess I should have been skeptical and put a little bit more faith in the critical  negative reviews. It broke down after a month and customer service is very poor. CommentsTitle: Great Treadmill Despite Some Cheap Plastic
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 23, 2021
CommentsContent: First off, pricing on this treadmill was a great deal. I have rated it 5 stars as 4.5 is not possible. I love how easy it is to fold up and drop down. I also put a lot of pressure on the locking strut without lifting the base any further to test how it would hold up if it was accidentally bumped; it didn't budge. You actually have to push the base up a little more to disengage the lock.Assembly was fairly straightforward and the instructions were very detailed. I marked it 4 stars under assembly as the box was not holding together very well once delivered and some of the plastic pieces are cheap/fragile. Navigating downstairs with a heavy treadmill no longer in its box proved difficult. The plastic cover for the motor incurred a little damage to 2 of the 5 internal screw hole locations. Luckily the nuts used are the little metal clips that are slid on. There was still about half the plastic for them to hold onto, so I was able to put the cover back on with no visible damage or issues. Other people may not be so lucky. So be careful with the plastic parts if you are assembling this yourself.As for actually using the treadmill, it is great. The incline action was a little louder than my wife expected, but doesn't bother you once you are listening to music. The speed adjusts quickly and we love the quick select options to adjust the speed even more quickly. Great for manual interval "sprints". If you want to bypass the iFit on this particular model, be sure the emergency cord is attached and then just hold down the iFit button for like 10-30 seconds.I highly recommend this treadmill for others than want quality without all the unnecessary bells and whistles of some others.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: Great Treadmill Just press and hold iFit
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 11, 2020
CommentsContent: I had a cheap and flimsy treadmill because it was free, and I didn't want to spend money if I wasn't going to use it.  Well, I didn't use the cheap and flimsy one because it was too hard to use.  You definitely get what you pay for.  Assembly took my spouse and I 2 hours.  I want to thank everyone who left reviews before us.  You do not have to register with iFit or anything before you use the treadmill!  We put it together, pressed and held the iFit button for 30 seconds, and have been using the treadmill with no problems ever since.  I have been using it every day for the past week.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 9, 2019

CommentsTitle: Luv this machine!!! Makes Shelter in Place easier to endure!

CommentsContent: I absolutely LUV this machine and once COVID-19 hit and the shelter in place begun, I was extremely happy I had it! CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2020
CommentsContent: My main goal is to walk. I’ve lost 35 pounds by just walking and counting food points. I’ve have 100 more to go. The weather isn’t always cooperative where I live and I don’t want to join the gym. The treadmill is easy to use and has various preset walks without an iFit subscription. I use my iPhone to track my steps which ends up in my pocket and it tracks my mileage/steps for WW activity points. The iFit is an app for an iphone/cell or pad, not super thrilled to pay for a subscription to watch scenery on my phone plus not have it sink with WW. Other than the iFit subscription which one doesn’t have to have, this is a perfect set up.

CommentsContent: Buyer Beware! You CAN use your treadmill without registering with iFit. Don't get scammed!You can get around registering for iFit.TO GET AROUND THIS SCAM, hold down the iFit logo on the treadmill for 30 seconds and your treadmill will work.IT WORKS

CommentsTitle: Good product but underhanded way to force you to sign up for iFIT program!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 12, 2020
CommentsContent: Took a while to receive but fully met my expectations!  Only problem was that it came locked and the instructions stated the only way to unlock it was sign up for iFIT program which requires a credit card and includes automatic monthly renewal unless canceled by purchaser.  Fortunately I read reviews which explained how to bypass that by pressing the hidden switch underneath the iFIT logo.  Now works like a charm without the hassle of canceling the iFIT program or paying a monthly fee.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 7, 2020
CommentsContent: The treadmill comes preloaded with iFit (an ICON brand) which is effectively subscription ransomware. NordicTrack (another ICON brand) tries its best to make you think that you need to sign up for an iFit subscription before you can even use the treadmill. Luckily, other reviews on here pointed out you can hold the iFit button down for 30 seconds to clear the system and actually use it. I feel like I should make a trip to 1500 S 1000 W Logan, UT to have a little chat with them face-to-face. Regardless, I'll never buy anything associated with ICON ever again.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 20, 2020
CommentsContent: You cannot get a human voice by calling 800-862-3348 or 866 608 1798. If you go to norditrackservice.com you will see ad announcing that the name "NordicTrack" maybe for sale. If you go to ifit.com you won't find any useful information. Forcing customers to subscribe to an unwanted service in order to unblock a machine you paid good money for should be illegal.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 23, 2020
CommentsContent: Free 12 month iFit membership was what helped sell me on this product. So I bought it. Delivery came with a promo card for the 12-month membership. The promo card was declined as ineligible on the iFit website. I've reached out to Amazon and the manufacturer to fix this, and I've received nothing but triangulation and passing me to the other entity. Shouldn't be my job to fix this problem. I paid $1K for this, and now I'm spending my spare time trying to fix their problem. Figure it out or don't offer the service. Will likely return unless I get some help from someone soon.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 10 InchesStyle Name: NordicTrack T 6.5 Si Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 29, 2020
CommentsContent: We are thrilled with our Nordic Track purchase! It was a big purchase for us and we've been thinking about for a few years. We are so glad we finally did it.I love the interactivity with iFit, the videos and trainers are a blast. I especially love being able to walk and see places all over the world when it is bitterly cold and cloudy outside here. Getting it into the house was a trick, and getting back where we needed it required some ingenuity, but it wasn't too hard. Make sure you get the delivery people to get it inside your door. We then opened the box and took the pieces to the room we wanted.We saw comments about not being able to use it without iFit, but I use it on manual mode often. A member of our family is working through long term illness so sometimes they need control over speed and incline. The manual mode is ideal for that.Again, we're super happy! If you want to walk or run inside, this is a great machine!
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 14 InchesStyle Name: T 9.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 16, 2020
CommentsContent: Home gym for two adults and one pre-teen. It's been two months now. I run daily 2-3 miles. Hubby and son walk daily 1-2 miles. Nice and steady at a fast pace (my max 7). Great incline, but not as high as others. Speakers suck but that's not what I bought it for. I was more worried about loud squeaking noises (hasn't happened yet). Display is nice. ifit was nice to have, but I don't use it enough so it's been cancelled. The built-in intervals (without ifit) are awesome!! I put it together myself, but I would recommend that you have someone around to help. I would not hire someone to do it because it's really not that difficult. I will update this review if anything changes..
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 26, 2020
CommentsContent: Delivered on time. Paid extra to have it delivered to a room. Put it together by myself, I felt like not tightening screws per instructions, was the key to get parts to fit...particularly by the console. Take care to not pinch the cords. Follow the directions! Read many reviews before buying this treadmill, and this was my third choice: first was a 1600.00 Bowflex, second was a 1100.00 Nautilus, then this one. Three hundred dollars off was too good to be true and the reviews were very helpful. Bluetooth works great, fan is ok, relatively quiet. Did not use iFit and probably won’t due to the negative comments. Added maintenance plan for 2 years.Overall I am very pleased. “Exercising” patience helped me get a good deal.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 7 InchesStyle Name: T 7.5 S Treadmill + 1 Year Membership

CommentsTitle: Take care of it, it takes care of you.

Don't do dumb things. Lost 20 pounds so far. Now I hate days I don't workout. Amazing machine for the price.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsContent: Excellent treadmill, fairly easy to assemble with some care and time. Product is extremely heavy which tells you that it has good bones. Not very easy to maneuver especially if you don't want anything to happen to your wood floors or heaven forbid linoleum flooring. Just take your time and be patient if you have to move it. Ideally you have a second person to assist you so as to ensure no damage. Overall, product is far better than anticipated. Works very well with multiple adjustments you'd expect from a high end treadmill. Which in my opinion this is.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: You DON'T need an iFit account to make it work!! (use the red key, blue button)
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 18, 2020
CommentsContent: You DON'T need an ifit account to make it work.  Make sure he RED key is in place, and then press the Blue ifit button and it starts immediately.  Nice little machine. Delivered on time. Needs 2 people to assemble. Me and the hubby finished in about an hour.  It folds up and has a great feature where it folds open slowly instead of slamming down, which made me worry (I have littles) Can't wait to use it.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 15, 2020
CommentsContent: If you are looking for a relatively compact, inexpensive and functional treadmill for your home gym, this is a great choice.  We have been using it for the last three months and it has been a great experience.  We use it on average 4 to 6 times a week for about an hour each time.  Some negative reviews mention the iFitness setup after installation, there is a way to bypass the iFitness app by holding down the "iFit“ button for longer than 30 seconds.  I learned this by reading the reviews before purchase and it worked like a charm.  If you don’t take the time to do your research online and read the reviews before buying a product like a treadmill, you should not be shopping online.  The speed and incline setup is very easy and straightforward from 1 to 10.  The cup holders are big and nice for me to put down a water bottle and a towel.  When I am running on it, it is very sturdy and doesn’t shake.  It is just big enough to feel comfortable on it but not too big where it fits nicely in the basement corner.  You can fold it up if you need extra space when not using it – it is very easy to fold and unfold.  Personally I don’t need all other frills that come with the treadmills that cost $1500+ such as a built-in fan or TV screen.  For the price of under $700, we have been very satisfied with this treadmill.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

CommentsTitle: They push a $180/year membership on you - VERY DECEPTIVE marketing
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 16, 2020
CommentsContent: NO EASY START BUTTON - I seldomly write a review, but this really made me angry.  While other reviews claim you can start your equipment by holding a button 30 seconds, I wasn't able to do it.  So I had to create a "free" account to get the machine started.  Well, the ACCOUNT IS NOT FREE.  It's free for 30 days, then they charge you $180/year membership - A VERY SNEAKY WAY TO PUSH A MEMBERSHIP ON YOU.  Beware when you purchase, and if you do, and want to cancel - go to your Name on top right corner of page, click on settings - then on membership plan.  For this reason - this product deserves a NO STAR - as it is deceptive.
PurchasemModel_Size: Display Size: 5 InchesStyle Name: T 6.5 S Treadmill + 1-Month iFit Membership

It's solid, not too noisy, no detectable smells,. I'd say it's very near the "feel" of the higher end "professional/gym" models which is quite amazing based on the significant price savings hereThe iFit was very unpleasant to have forced upon me but luckily you can hold the ifit button to bypass/decline it. I may or may not check it out but anything that is forced upon me by a manufacturer (cough, laptops, cough) has a bad headstart.I'll be back after a while to update my review, even if it's to say how good of a coat hanger it is (hopefully not that)
